name: Restful Retreat right in the city!
description: Beautiful, eclectic, peaceful oasis minutes from all sport stadiums in city, OSU campus, downtown.  Bike path and river at end of street. Spacious loft style home. Large wooded garden/yard. Deck. 1 car max. off street parking. One spot off street. House is a beautiful get away right in the city. All one floor, artsy, interesting and quiet. One full bathroom ( private use of guests) with spa tub and shower located adjacent to bedrooms.  Shared house with owner couple and small no-shed, hypo-allergenic dog. Laid back, good vibe space. One half bathroom on same floor. Full kitchen. Wood floors and architectural salvage throughout. 8 min. Drive to OSU, Short North, downtown, convention center, and Easton Miles of bike paths at end of street. Guests will have access to bedrooms, central common spaces, kitchen, sunroom, deck, patio and large gardens/yard. Guests will have high speed internet access. Vegan household. No cooking of animal products. Guests will have privacy in room. 2 bedrooms
host_about:
I'm a raw food enthusiast. I own a small batch RAW kale chip company and lead food innovation  for a local cold pressed juice company.
 I love to travel and stay at Airbnb's across the globe!

name: Tulsa #5 Bedroom, large
description: Quite bedroom in basement
host_about: Nice guy

name: Tulsa #6 Nicely Priced Bedroom
description: Affordable private room in a large quiet home on the north side of Columbus.   Lower level bedroom with all amenities you will need including free laundry facilities.  Close to Easton Towne Centre, Polaris Fashion Place, and Ohio State.  Convenient to the bus line, shopping and restaurants.  Clean and affordable and waiting on you!    (Close proximity to:  Worthington, Clintonville, Westerville) One private bedroom with locking door.  Share the rest of home with other professionals just like you.  There are two living rooms, kitchen, and a dining room. Guests have access, and the use of the entire home, which includes both living rooms, kitchen, dining room, laundry facilities and yard.  Not included are the other guests private bedrooms or garage. Owner does not reside at the property.  Management is available upon request professional cleaning is done weekly for the common areas.   Although we do not enter the rented rooms to clean.  Tenants also clean as needed, and cleaning supplie
host_about: Nice guy

name: Beautiful Olde Towne East Home close to Downtown
description: I live in a lovely an charming (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Queen Anne's house very close to Downtown, the Ohio Theater, the beautiful and historic German Village and has easy access to most convention sites. There are popular (and delicious) local eating establishments only a 5 minute walk from the house. I provide light breakfast snacks.  Easy entry via lock box. Check out my other listing. The home is full of charm.  A lot of people spend time just looking at the art, etc.  The room is small but delightful.     My other listing: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/34445753?location=columbus%2C%20ohio&adults=1&check_in=2019-06-25&check_out=2019-06-26&source_impression_id=p3_1560797295_iQ4G1XrZBBCkDd8P You can access the bedroom and bathroom. If you want to use the kitchen, please request ahead of time. I really enjoy meeting people! and will help guests as much as I can as they navigate the area. My neighborhood was at one place the homes of James Thurber and the Robber Barons of old.  I
host_about: I am a friendly person who enjoys getting to know others.  I love to read, work in the yard, sing, sing, sing and snuggle with my dog--when he let's me. I love tea, love Italy and enjoyed Ireland and enjoy movies shown at art cinemas. I don't watch much television but when I do it's usually PBS. I don't smoke.  I really enjoy travelling and have been on package tours and well as trips where I hunt out hostels.  I appreciate having different people around!

name: Private room near German Village, Downtown
description: Our place is close to German Village, Nationwide Children's Hospital, Schiller Park, Downtown, Berliner Park, Lower Scioto Greenway, and great German Village restaurants and destinations (Barcelona, Schmidt's, Thurman's, Katzinger's, the Book Loft). You'll love our place because of the price, the personal touches and the friendly atmosphere. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers - especially people who love good beer, movies and music... and of course cats! Duplex with high ceilings and lots of natural light. Walls decorated by original art and classic movie posters. Private room has a huge closet and a comfy four-poster bed! Nice front and back porch. Access to the whole house (except our bedroom). We have a cozy living room, a large kitchen, and washer/dryer in the basement. The front and back porches are lovely, and there's a fire pit and grill out back. Shared bathroom. We're happy to give recommendations for food and night life. We are also well t
host_about: I'm a geologist/claims analyst who walks everywhere. My husband and I love to travel - we've met some of our favorite people through Air BnB! We both love books, art, movies, cooking and good beer. We love hosting AirBnB because we get to meet really interesting people!

name: Newly Renovated Upstairs Apt. in Olde Towne East
description: Newly renovated!  This handsome apartment is in the fashionable and up-and-coming Olde Towne East neighborhood.  One bedroom, plus a fold out couch, sleeps a total of four.  Edwardian character, eclectic art on the walls, and a funky mix of antique and modern furniture. After years of happy guests staying in this unit (see the reviews!), we decided to make her even nicer. She has updated kitchen and bathroom, and new paint throughout.  This is now our finest airbnb apartment. Second floor apartment in a century-old house in Olde Town East. This unit is an entire separate apartment, with its own separate entrance.  Access is by electronic combination lock. We live a few blocks away, so are generally available in the event of any issue that may arise.  We do travel frequently, however, so we always make sure to have someone available in our absence. Olde Towne East is one of the most up-and-coming neighborhoods in Columbus, popular with artists, hipsters, gays, young families, and other
host_about:
Jay and Michael are newly married, traveling through life and the world together.  Nice, respectable boys both of them.  

Interests include old things, good food and fine wine, dogs, Lana, art museums, history, video games, antique shops, fashion, second hand bookshops.  Priorities:  eating delicious things not eaten before, seeing beautiful places not seen before, meeting extraordinary people not met before.

name: Fabulous apartment inside beautiful home
description: Tastefully decorated  living room  including wet bar, microwave and mini refrigerator, large screen TV with cable and netflix access, Queen size hide a bed that sleeps (2),  shelves with extensive  cookbook collection.  Private bedroom with Queen size bed , bathroom with a shower.  Beautiful garden w/Koi pond that guest are welcome to enjoy. This unit does not have a full kitchen. This beautiful space is private and tranquil. To be specific it is inside the foyer and downstairs within the house. It does not have a full kitchen more like a mini bar with small sink and mini fridge. Upstairs sitting room and garden.  Full Kitchen facilities upon request. I am available to give advice and information on our great city. Walkable neighborhood and centrally located with many shopping centers, movie theaters and restaurants nearby also close to Sciota river parks. Bus stop at the corner where on COTA bus line.   Park on the street after you have unloaded in the driveway.  We are approximately
host_about: I am a fun loving person and avid gardener. I have been a business owner and have traveled the world.  I love books, movies and cooking and I enjoy hosting parties and celebrating life.

name: Private Master Suite with Balcony
description: Master suite with sky lights and french door that open up to second floor balcony. The suite is Beautifully decorated with sitting area, TV, large mirrored bathroom and walk in closet. Additional sitting area with baby grand piano, backyard garden with Koi pond, private balcony overlooking garden. Sitting room with piano, garden. I am a social person happy to give directions and suggestions on where to dine and visit on your stay in our great city. Very centrally located to Parks along Scioto River, many retail stores and several malls nearby and abundant dining options.  Within walking distance to Sawmill health club with indoor/outdoor pools and extensive gym equipment.  Approximately 10 miles from OSU campus. Public transportation within walking distance of COTA bus stop, many taxi services available to choose from, grocery store within walking distance.  Free parking in our driveway or on street. High speed internet available, cable TV.
host_about: I am a fun loving person and avid gardener. I have been a business owner and have traveled the world.  I love books, movies and cooking and I enjoy hosting parties and celebrating life.

name: Big 3 Story House Downtown Columbus
description: 2000 sq ft, 3 story updated house w/ 3 bedrooms and 3 full baths. Walking distance to Convention Center, OSU, Short North, LC. 6 beds & 3 available blow up queens. Kitchen w/ granite counter tops. 2 Off Street parking spots & back yard. TV w/ stereo.  2 Night $1000 Weekend Minimum.  This house typically rents to larger groups of 10+.  Price and 1 day booking negotiable if property available within 5 days of booking date. 3 bedrooms with 6 beds in total. Large upstairs bedroom has 4 beds (3 fulls and a twin) w/ plenty of room for addition air mattresses and a huge full bath. 2nd floor bedrooms each have a queen mattress and their own full bath. Downstairs has and updated kitchen w/ granite counter-tops. Living room has a large 3-piece sectional and a dining table. Backyard has 2 offstreet parking spots. Have a keycode entry for guest access In the Victorian Village Community. Across the street from the best breakfast/brunch food in Columbus, Katalinas. Walking distance to most attractio
host_about: Lived in the Columbus area for 30+ years. My home is nearby the rentals, so I'm easily accessible if assistance is needed.

name: Short North Hidden Gem
description: Jewel box of a townhouse, situated on a gorgeous city park. Dog and cat-friendly. 1000 sq ft. 2BR, 1 bath, end unit with a fenced backyard and street parking.  Walk to OSU, cafes and shops, and Convention Center or stay home and enjoy the neighborhood amenities. Situated along #2 and 4 bus lines and walking distance to COTA airconnect bus line (ride the bus from the airport!) 2 dedicated parking spaces plus free street parking. COGO rental bikes available at park 24-7. This was previously my residence and it is now a dedicated Airbnb. It's lovingly decorated with upcycled materials, original prints and drawings.  Connect to the outdoors with a fenced yard, patio, porch and park outside. Big tub for soaking and relaxing. Fast internet, but no cable channels. The television is in bedroom #2, not in the living room.  This is a charming older townhouse. Woodwork has layers of paint, doors are creaky, and the wood floors weathered. It has a lived in feel and eclectic decor.  Sometimes the b
host_about: I am a Media Designer, dancer, and I enjoy bicycling, yoga and food.

name: SHORT NORTH STUDIO. 1 minute to HIGH ST.
description: Studio apartment in a home in beautiful Victorian Village.  Walk to High Street (2 minutes). Walk to OSU. Convenient to Convention Center and Fairgrounds.  Small kitchen with oven, stove but NO MICROWAVE. Small coffee maker (espresso boiler for the stove-top).  Murphy bed. Shower looks a little old/ industrial, but it is clean. Great front porch.  All of the excitement and great restaurants and bars of The Short  North await you. Studio apartment.  Queen size Murphy bed. Short North, OSU This is my personal residence.  I live here part time.  Respect my space please. LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION.  Close to the best parts of Columbus COTA. Uber. Car2Go. Walking. SMALL SMALL SPACE!!! Cozy but no room to dance!
host_about: I love to travel, and will take every opportunity to do so. I LOVE the concept of AirBNB, and have had numerous wonderful experiences in many different destinations.

name: SHORT NORTH: Spectacular-ART-tastic home & room
description: Stay in the heart of the Short North in a beautiful private bedroom in Victorian Village.  Walking distance to all the High Street restaurants/shops/bars, OSU, convention center, downtown and so much more. My kitchen and bathroom was just remodeled.  I'm reopen for guests (so sorry to all of my regulars who had to wait due to the renovation). The house is just a block off High Street and has beautifully updated features with an incredible outdoor patio along with a contemporary look and feel.  The kitchen and bathroom were just remodeled this spring (completed as of May 19). Guests will have access to all common areas in the house and the patio. I live in the house, so you'll be seeing and interacting with me.  Not to worry.  I'm friendly and fun!  I'm more than happy to give you insight as to what you can see and do around town.  The neighborhood is "the place to be." It's artsy, eclectic and a great walking neighborhood.  Gooddale Park is just two blocks away. Restaurants, bars, nigh
host_about: Professional gay male that enjoys traveling and hosting others.  I'm on the run a lot -- but when not, love to relax over a glass of wine.   Love to kayak, bike and kickback.  Enjoy grilling out, hanging with friends and the theatre.

name: Quiet location close to Easton
description: Our simple home is a split level- the entire downstairs is yours, plus use of the rest of the house. Laundry, kitchen, wifi, yard, tv, peace and quiet. You will share the home with me, but your bedroom and bathroom are all your own.
host_about: I run a Fair Trade non-profit organization as well as my own Fair Trade wholesale organization. I travel frequently and for the specific purpose of trying to make the world a little better.

name: Chic MotherInLaw in my ShortNorth/Downtown house
description: READ EVERYTHING BEFORE REQUESTING TO BOOK This is a MotherInLaw suite with 1br 1bath 1 den 1 kitchenette IN the lower level of my home, built in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) in beautiful&safe Harrison West (shared entrance). Located in the Short North, house is within walking to Downtown, Grandview, Nationwide Arena, the Convention Center, Ohio State/Schottenstein, pubs, cafes, & coffee shops. Come for WORK or PLAY! It doesn't get easier! Free ample parking, things to do, walkable, and friendly dogs to make you smile! You will walk into our home, past our living room and to the basement stairs, which has a gate. I do not have a private entrance but the stairs are not far from front door.  You can choose to interact with us or not, since there may be occasional "running into" each other (shared front door, washer and dryer in basement), but generally speaking and from others' experience with their stay, the accommodations we provide are generally completely independent and private fr
host_about:
J is from Ohio and Mara is from Colombia, we are a multi-faith married couple, and we welcome guests from all over the world!

We thoroughly enjoy hosting on Airbnb. As wanderlusts ourselves, we are blessed to be able to provide my guests a place to stay when they pass through our proud city! Always happy to provide advice around town, and we are excited to meet and greet you as new friends. 

We strive to provide a 5 star experience; you can see that we are a 5 star listing and are super hosts. This is a means for us to make a living, and it is your home for the time you are staying with me. With that, PLEASE make sure you approach us with any issues during the stay so we can resolve them DURING your stay! We want you to have a 5 star experience, and communication is key--there is nothing worse than knowing your stay was less than satisfactory through a bad review, and we could have made a difference during your stay.

name: Victorian Home in the Short North Neighborhood
description: 4 bedroom, 1.5 bath, Victorian home in the Victorian Village/Short North neighborhood available when we travel. Charming details throughout, hardwood floors, chef's kitchen, nice outdoor space. Walking distance to OSU (1.4 miles/20 min walk to the stadium; 0.8 mile/16 min walk to the oval), shopping, bars and restaurants, and all that the Short North has to offer. Free on-street parking for 1 vehicle. Beautiful 1880s Victorian home with large, open living space and two outdoor spaces (a large front porch and a back deck with grill, smoker, and large garden). We are a short walk to the OSU campus oval (0.8 mile) and stadium (1.4 miles), two blocks from Kroger grocery, and walking distance to all that the Short North and Italian Village have to offer. Easy on-street parking for one vehicle (there is permit parking, but we will provide a guest code for you). If you have a second vehicle, a second pass can be provided for $6/day. We are two OSU professors who travel often and rent our home
host_about: Amanda, originally from Alabama, is an assistant professor of politics at Ohio State University, and conducts research on the politics of sub-Saharan Africa (with a focus on Malawi). Joachim, who is Belgian, born in Germany, raised in Holland, is an assistant professor of earth sciences at OSU. We both love to travel, read, and eat good food.

name: Peaceful home in the Dublin area
description: Rest easy with views of the lake in a quiet NW neighborhood or get anywhere in greater Columbus quickly with easy access to 270.  OSU events, Memorial Golf Tournement, Columbus Zoo, COSI are all an easy drive and lots of shopping available. Columbus city requires all guest to pay an excise tax of 5.1% which will be added to your fees once you book.  This home complies with the required licensure for short term rentals   in Columbus, Ohio and the license number is (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The entire main floor of this ranch home is available to the guests.  There is a basement apartment and laundry room that is off limits.  There is a separate entry for the two levels.  There is driveway parking available on the right side of the drive leaving the left side open for the owner to come and go from the garage.  There is street parking available for additional vehicles. I can be reached by phone or text even if I am not available in person.  If I am traveling I will have others avail
host_about: Quiet individual who enjoys meeting people from all around the world. I have hosted foreign exchange students in the past and have traveled Europe  and central America.

name: Private Room in Artist's Home
description: This listing features a cozy bedroom in the back of the house. The window overlooks a large backyard. Inside the room, you've got a SmartTV (Netflix! HBO Now! Hulu!) and postcards to send to your friends. You'll have full access to the living room and kitchen. Common space is common space. If you're staying more than a couple days, I'll make sure you've got some space in the refrigerator.
host_about:
I live in Columbus, OH with my small bichon, Leo. I'm a graphic designer and studio artist. I work from home, but I'm often in and out for client meetings.

I love sports. I run and play softball regularly. I also enjoy watching football. I'm addicted to cards and board games, so I guess I'm a competition junky through and through.

name: "The Coop"  Near Easton Town Center Columbus, OH
description: "The Coop" is conveniently located 10 -15 minutes from John Glenn Columbus International Airport, approximately 20 minutes to downtown and practically across the street from Easton Town Center with great shopping, restaurants and entertainment! We are situated on 8 acres and you may wake up to see several deer grazing in the back yard.  If you are a bicyclist, the Alum Creek bike trail is easily accessible.  You will love "The Coop" because of the views, the location, and the ambiance. Enjoy this country space, just inside the 270 outerbelt, within walking distance of Easton Town Center, 10-15 minutes from the airport and approximately 20 minutes to downtown Columbus. "The Coop" provides a flatscreen smart tv, with wifi throughout.   Coffee and tea are provided. Bathroom provides a shower, sorry, no tub. Two bedrooms, one with a queen size bed (note: walls do not go to the ceilings), the other bedroom is small with a slanted ceiling and provides a twin trundle bed (probably more suitab
host_about: I love to travel, especially in Europe.  Italy is my favorite destination.  I love to read and my passion is knitting!  I enjoy hanging with others who enjoy the same.  I do like good food, good wine and having a good time!

name: Traveler's Adytum`
description: Conveniently tucked away in a quiet community yet, close enough to shopping (Easton Mall), good restaurants, major freeways, Port Columbus and outdoor recreation areas, enjoy this quiet retreat after a full day of work, family or friends. Large first floor private room with full size private shower/bath, closet space, sitting area, writing table and TV. You have full access to the kitchen. If I'm not here to greet you, I'll make sure that you are well taken care of and have everything you need when you arrive. The neighborhood next door provides a convenient 2-3 mile walking area with green space, gazebo and woods along with access to the park down the street on Thompson Rd.  Restaurants and pubs are within walking distance at the corner of Thompson and Hamilton Rd. There are 3 beautiful ponds on the 1/2 mile property and access to the fitness room can be made available to you.

name: LOFT~2B/2Ba & Patio~Free Parking @ Easton~Airport.
description: Contemporary 2B/ 2ba & patio. Free ample parking. 7 min from Downtown & 10 min from OSU. 5 minutes from Airport~CMH & Easton Town Center Mall (Restaurants, Pubs). 7 minutes from Crew/ Maphre Soccer stadium. 15-20 min from the CBUS zoo. Free wifi/cable/ESPN for your favorite shows/games. Brand new/spacious apt. 5 min from airport-CMH. 3 min from Easton. 7 minutes from Downtown. Free ample Parking. About 1k square ft. Everything inside the apartment and patio plus laundry room~washer & dryer. Only per guest request. Close to Easton Mall, downtown and Airport. Lots of restaurants and pubs close by. Great Cinema & Comedy Central at the mall. Safe and new. Minutes from OSU/ Crew soccer stadium/ Nationwide arena/ Airport/ downtown/ short north/ Zoo/ fairgrounds/ Polaris Mall/ capital university and more. Yes. Bus line is only a short walking distance + Uber/Lift are always few min away. Gym/ swimming pool can be used. Pls give me heads up.
host_about:
Love to travel. Try new adventures and new opportunities. Laid back and chillax. Live your dreams and dream BIG. Shoot for the sky and if you don't reach, you'll still have your roof to fall back on. 
I love music ( Reggae, hip hop, rap, RnB, country, oldies, hip life, jazz, techno, etc. )
I study and respect all religions as I must respect and appreciate all people regardless of culture or race. 
Work smart and party hard because tomorrow may not be promising. Thanks.

name: Teenie-Weenie Sleeping Nook
description: Unique 5x7 feet (35 SQ FT) room. Twin-size bed: ONE PERSON ONLY. Self Check-In, Lock+Keys. Dark & Quiet on 3rd floor. Parking: 3 spaces behind home and on-street. Free WiFi. Continental Breakfast. 2 Bikes Available. This is a tiny room built inside a closet. It is perfect for sleeping in the dark during day or night. The ventilation is excellent and there is shelving for your luggage and other belongings. The Wifi extender is inside the room. Note: large luggage may not fit inside the room but you're welcome to store it in the basement. There is no TV inside the room but a large HDTV is available for your use in the living room. The room has a twin-sized memory foam mattress. Accommodates one person only (sorry, no exceptions). Immediately upon booking you will get individual house & room access codes as well as the WiFi code.  You have access to 1st floor common area including the kitchen and your 3rd floor room, as well as 1st and 2nd floor bathrooms. There is space in the basement f
host_about:
We have been long-time hosts and are passionate about hosting travelers of all varieties, when we cannot be traveling ourselves. When we aren't hosting, you may see Brandon or Sam (our trusted friends) helping out around the house, as Jenna is a full-time nanny and Ethan is a full-time landscaper. Although we are not born natives to Columbus (Jenna originates from just north of London, England and Ethan hails from Cincinnati, Ohio), we have adopted Columbus as our own and would be happy to send along any recommendations about our lovely city.

Please do not hesitate to contact us, as we would be delighted to host you.

name: Historic Home- Olde Towne/Franklin Park- Map Room
description: Enjoy a beautiful private room in this large house on historic Bryden Road.  Comfortable queen bed with plenty of storage in the room along with a fireplace and a tv with DVD player. Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu. Nicely updated home in a quiet location close to downtown Columbus.   The bedroom:  Large private room with a comfortable queen bed with luxurious bedding, plenty of storage, TV and DVD player, Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, fireplace and ceiling fan. Shared bathroom. I have another room available to book if you have a group or should this room be unavailable for your dates - check out the Gray Room! The house:  All brick 2500 sq ft craftsman built in 1914 and had a major face-lift on its 100th birthday.  Gleaming hardwood floors throughout, living room, dining room, den and updated open kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances. Sun-room and balcony overlook the back yard on the second floor. Laundry available in the basement. Large fenced in back yard and onl
host_about:
I've been an Airbnb host since 2014 and since I love to travel I have also been a guest with other hosts in the US and internationally. People always ask if it's weird to have strangers come and stay in my home with me and the answer has always been "not once!" I really love having the opportunity to share my home and city of Columbus Ohio with travelers from all over the world. So far I have welcomed people from 6 out of 7 continents coming from more than 40 different countries.

When I bought my home in 2008 it had broken plumbing, boarded up windows, and had been the ugly house on the block for a long time. It's taken a lot of time and patience but a house that was forgotten and uninhabitable became a warm and charming place I like to call home. 

I'm proud of the work I've done to bring a historic building back to life and update it in a way that kept much of the original character. Be careful asking questions about the process because I may not stop telling stories for a while.

name: Peaceful Eco-Friendly Meditator's Home
description: A simple quiet hOMe with few distractions has been created where you can rest and rejuvenate, or intensely focus on what you want, while being supported in a spiritually focused, healthy, eco-friendly environment. There is a dedicated yoga and meditation room, and you can enjoy the backyard wildlife garden in this urban setting. Welcome to a  sanctuary, that fosters living joyfully and well. Your private room has a single bed with organic pillows and natural fibers, and receives sunlight during the day. The desk is situated so you can connect with the earth, sitting on the floor on cushions (zabutons and zafu's), or you can work at a table and chair in the shared space. The Himalayan salt lamp creates a beautiful warm light, as well as purifying the air and facilitating relaxation. You have use of half the closet and a shelf for your personal items. An iron and ironing board are available for your use. Please note there is WIFI access but no T.V. If you would like to listen to music, p
host_about: I am grateful to my parents who first took me to Europe to explore the rich history there and ignited a flame to want to explore and learn more. A year volunteering to teach English in what was then Czechoslovakia opened my world to new and different ways of seeing and being in the world. University studies led me in Solo, Indonesia, and to South India with yoga and meditation with Sadhguru and the Isha Foundation to begin my inner exploration. Now,  I find myself following what I love and have been fascinated by many things, which has opened up so many opportunities and brought wonderful people into my life!  I started as a piano and theory teacher, occupational therapist, national yoga and movement instructor, Ayurvedic practitioner, motor scooter rider, and now gardener. Most of my activities now involve growing organic food in the backyard for myself, the folks in our neighborhood, with methods that are supportive of our pollinators and wildlife and eco-friendly to our planet. I love sharing my love and experience to anyone interested in it and enjoy hearing what others have experienced. I have a personal Isha yoga and meditation practice with Sadhguru who has provided me with tools that have been transformative for me living a more healthy, joyous, and vibrant life. It is a privilege to be able to have a hOMe for others to join and share in this journey.

name: 3 Bedroom Italian Village/Short North Home.
description: In the heart of the Italian Village/Short North, this is where you want to be!  Walking distance to the Greater Columbus Convention Center, businesses, restaurants, bars, shopping and entertainment.  Nestled in historic Italian Village one block off of High Street and only 10 minutes from Ohio Stadium.  This home is literally walking distance.  Don't be fooled by other listings that say they are walking distance unless you want to walk 2 miles.  This location is a half block from everything. This is a historic home with wrap around front porch and porch swing, hard wood floors throughout and lots of character. You can access the entire house except the basement.   The basement is not finished. I bought a new house just up the street.  I am available to answer questions, and/or make recommendations or show you around on your visit. Short North/Italian Village/Arena District is the main historic and entertainment district in Columbus.  Beautiful old Italianate and Victorian architecture

name: THE SIELTH LOFT MASTER- DOWNTOWN
description: My place is close to restaurants, dining, family-friendly activities, public transport, nightlife, the airport, and malls. Ideal for large groups (up to 6-8) and or the individual or couple that enjoy a larger MORE spacious than a 'standard bedroom'.  Is this you? PERFECT.  BOOK NOW TO ENJOY YOUR OWN 1000+ sq. Ft. MASTER LOFT during your stay here in Columbus! Our beautiful 1920 American Foursquare home basks w/ character hard wood floors & original wood work & trim. This home is peaceful, a quiet oasis! A well landscaped garden & patio w/ deck out back. 5 minutes from Downtown. *EVERY GUEST GETS SLIPPERS! Enjoy the over sized 1000+ sq. Ft. bedroom with living space; open 3rd floor MASTER LOFT in this quiet oasis. A spacious bedroom on the 3rd Floor of the home, with your own potentially shared full bathroom on the 2nd floor. You will slumber on luxury thread count linens. Under your feet is newer soft plush carpet. Large windows with great views of the neighborhood.  There are additio
host_about:
Greetings!

I enjoy music, traveling going to the theatre and spending time with my family, specifically my nieces. I am a professional Social Worker/ Criminologist. I own my own photography business and I run my $5 jewelry business out of my home.

I can't wait to meet you to share my wonderful city with you regardless of your length of stay or what brought you to Columbus you are bound to enjoy the food, shopping, parks, beautiful evolving downtown city scape and the architectural detail of the buildings and homes! 

I love aroma therapy and on any given day you can inhale the high end scents of White Barn and Bath & Body Works Candles and Wallflowers throughout my home. 

It will certainly be a pleasure to host you in my home which I love very dearly. I acquired the home in February 2015 and are consistently updating the amenities to provide a more comfortable experience for my guests. Imagine staying in a 1920 American square home with beautiful detailed woodwork, an updated kitchen with granite counter tops and top of the line stainless steel appliances, a matchless decor foyer, living room, dining room. 

:::That is just the 1st floor!:::

A beautifully landscaped backyard garden filled with amenities such as a fire pit, barbecue and beautiful lounge chairs. What I love most is when we get visits from various butterfly species, and especially the state bird the Cardinal. It really brings a smile to my face with all of the efforts, time, passion invested in the landscape garden. 
* I am open to roommates just inquire

name: THE SIELTH MASTER KING QUAINT STAY- DOWNTOWN
description: Beautiful 1920 American Foursquare home w/ character, hard wood floors & original wood work & trim. A well landscaped garden & patio w/ deck. 1.5 mile from Downtown.*EVERY GUEST GETS SLIPPERS! You will be sleeping in your own PRIVATE bedroom on a KING size bed on the 2nd floor of the home. This room has two large windows overlooking the back yard garden oasis and one overlooking the front side of the well groomed and landscaped yard. Your private bedroom is right next door to the bathroom. A spacious 600+ sq. Ft. room in the Northeast corner of the home. You will have access to a shared full bathroom just next door to your room. You will slumber on a BRAND NEW KING SIZE Memory Foam bed with luxury thread count bedding. Under your feet is NEW soft plush carpet.   The room is an eclectic space recently renovated, freshly painted a neutral color. There are three large windows, with a beautiful view of the newly landscaped backyard.  We acquired the home in February of 2015 and are consist

name: Modern Industrial Loft Space Fully Renovated
description: Unique modern and extremely clean loft space. Walking distance to OSU football games. 15-foot ceilings, new high end appliances, leather sectional sofa, new washer/dryer, dishwasher, rainfall shower, private 12x12 patio with chairs/table and off street parking for 2 cars. TV with Netflix/Hulu/HBO. Building was previously a commercial garage/body shop that was converted into living space. Very unique and brand new modern loft feel with extremely open floor plan and 15-foot ceilings. All high-end appliances with a breakfast bar in kitchen. Open shower and loft bedroom with very large stainless closet set for luggage/clothes. Private parking is provided off street for two cars if need be. Brand new private deck just off back door measuring 12x12, and a couple chairs and a table on the patio. One queen Simmons Beauty Rest mattress and a very big and comfortable black leather sectional sofa. This unit has available the entire living space, a private 12x12 outdoor patio with a propane grill,

name: Unique Spacious German Village Gem
description: Spacious single family home in the best neighborhood in Columbus, OH, German Village. Chef's kitchen, 75" Sony 4K Ultra HD TV, claw foot tub, & spacious back yard patio for entertaining . High end furnishings throughout from The Painted Lady Chicago. This is our second home. We spend most of our time in Chicago, IL, and as much time as our schedule permits in our Columbus, OH vacation home (only 1/2 kidding.)  Our home is beautifully decorated by the owner. All furnishings from bedding, paintings, and furniture is from The Painted Lady, a high end furniture store in Chicago, IL. It's an excellent place for family and/or friends dinners, or just relax during a long weekend get away.  Our kitchen is right out of a French Villa with hardwood counter tops, white tile floor, and commercial grade stove. Spacious living room is made for entertaining (we have the track record to prove it) with 4 comfortable couches and a 75" 4K Sony HD TV. Master BR includes a king size bed and bath with a cla

name: Loft-Bed Studio, Short North & OSU
description: Great little "pied a terre;" for 2 or 3, fully private - 5 blocks to OSU in the Short North Arts District.  Private entry, shower bath, full kitchen, real queen bed aloft;  hardwood floors, ornamental fireplace + blowup bed for 1  & access to patio. Cozy Studio in Columbus' Short North neighborhood.  Loft-Bed Efficiency Apt. on 1st floor.  Sleeps 2 + blowup mattress for 1.  You have to be comfortable with heights and going up and down the ladder to get to the loft bed.  Entirely private entry and bath, hardwood floors, 11 foot ceilings.   Apt. has a small, well appointed, kitchen.  "Eastlake House"  is an 1880's brick Queen Ann, less than one block from High Street at the head of the "Short North," home to a slew of restaurants, galleries, shops and live theatre.  5 blocks from the Ohio State University campus (10 blocks to the stadium). Park the car and walk everywhere -- hop the FREE C-bus or snag a CoGo bike rental at the nearby kiosk into and around downtown Columbus, including the
host_about: Hello, I am a married  father of 2  recently grown sons. My wife, Julie, and I are now offering part of our overgrown Victorian house to Air BnB guests.  By day I am an attorney in general practice and landlord; Julie is a psychotherapist. By free time, we are musicians (mainly a cappella vocalists though with some harmonica, clarinet, a very little tuba and hand drums thrown in.  We  enjoy jamming and improvising with others). I am a motorcyclist and lover of small affordable British roadsters, a mechanical tinkerer. We  are rehabbers/restorers of old houses with avid interests in music of all kinds, art, books, film, food (the more local and authentic the better), all manner of whiskeys and especially conversation.  I am  French by birth, and still fluent. I would say we are  Midwestern/progressive  by long residence and disposition; usually gregarious, though sometimes quieter and observant. We like to travel fairly light, although we are probably  a little "long in the tooth" to be truly "spartan."  I suppose our  style of Air b&b hosting is to  provide a comfortable safe staging ground and general guidance from which guests can explore on their own.  Current life motto might be something like "The best revenge is living engaged!"

name: Private Entrance on CityPark Massage Chair&refrig!
description: The front door is your private entrance, you can park in the front or on the side of the home, the room has a queen size bed and a full size comfortable futon, a twin memory foam mattress can be added for larger groups, remote speaker light bulb, massage chair and smart TV complete this room for a relaxing night after your favorite event in Columbus, house is  conveniently located near all major highways and near bus line and several restaurants in walking distance. City park outback.of the home...the home is all Airbnb (Website hidden by Airbnb) there maybe another room occuipied .. Floor just upgraded to vinyl plank (Website hidden by Airbnb) TO 49in upgraded with retro refrigerator.. The front door is your private entrance as you enter the foyer complete with a clothes rack and lidded trash can.  The motion light should greet you and give you enough time to either see the flashlight on the stepstool, or reach the floor lamp just around the corner. As you enter the room I've put in a
host_about: Hello I love to travel and meet people from all over the world.  I enjoy hosting or helping people save money.

name: East Columbus Suburbs with private bath
description: Safe suburban Columbus area. 20 min from the airport, and Easton mall and shopping, our room has ample closet space, mini fridge/freezer, Microwave, coffee pot, full shower and bathroom and comfortable pullout queen bed with a top of the line SleepAir Dream Ultra adjustable mattress system.    WiFi and Cable. There is a recliner as well as work space desk and a computer.  We provide some initial snacks and hydration as well as toiletries for anything thing you may have forgotten. The top of the line air mattress on our pullout couch is very comfortable. We have received numerous praises on the comfort. We have all of the features of a nice hotel room but in a quiet private setting.  We provide some initial snacks and bottled water as well as disposable plates, bowls, and utensils. Front door has a keypad entry. Each guest gets their own unique pass code. Camera/security system at entryway.  Guests have access to washer and dryer on the same floor if needed for longer stays. Let us know

name: The Hangar- Crow's Nest in Short North near OSU
description: Spacious attic crow's nest 5 blocks from OSU and steps from Short North nightlife, public transport and city center. Comfy beds, high ceilings, private kitchen and bath - Cozy and roomy. This is a very large 2 bedroom, 1 bath, attic apartment (about 1100 sq. ft.) nestled in the eaves of a monstrous 1880's brick Queen Ann in the Short North arts district in Columbus Ohio.  It manages to be cozy despite nearly 10 foot ceilings because the entire attic is lined in unfinished poplar wood and floored with rustic wide plank pine.  The "Hangar" has 2 big bedrooms at opposite ends of the 70 foot long apartment; one with a Queen size real bed the other with a Full size real bed.  In addition, there are 2 twin trundle beds and the living room futon which unfolds into a full sized futon bed for sleeping.   There is a full-function kitchen with gas stove, 2 under-counter refrigerators and microwave.  No dishwasher.  The living room is outfitted with futon couch, armchairs, 42 inch flat screen TV w

description: Clean, simple & quiet neighborhood. This space is all about location and its cosiness: Ohio State University, Nationwide Arena, COSI, Greater Columbus convention center, Ohio Expo Center, Grandview Event Center, Short North and German Village are only 8 mi away. Casino only mile away! Also, 2 bedrooms are on the main floor so no stairs to climb. Classic arched entry ways lead you throughout this spacious home featuring gorgeous original hard wood floors.   The front porch is screened in- for you to enjoy early morning sunshine as you have your morning coffee and still have privacy.  Decent size living room comfortably seats 8. This listing is for- Main floor: has a living room, dining room, kitchen with a nook, bathroom and  one queen bedroom.   Basement: has one studio bedroom, with full bath and a wet bar with beautiful wood tree trunk countertop.  ***This listing doesn't include the attic. Therefore the attic is locked at all times.*** You can find other amenities in the house to ma
host_about:
Hello! I am Rue. I love early morning sunshine, travel experiences, aged wine, fresh coffee, nature and its beautiful endless skies.

After working with various corporates for more than a decade I decided to start my own business. Since we moved for business, I was able to use my home on AIRBNB.

While decorating this house we kept comfort and design in forefront of our mind. I open our home to Airbnb guests from all cultures, backgrounds, and nationalities. I look forward to building wonderful new friendships with people around the globe. Thank you for considering our place to stay, hope to talk to you soon. :)

description: 1st floor 1 BR, 1 bath PRIVATE apt (NOT shared) completely furnished,  fully equipped kitchen & comfortable bedroom. Fence enclosed off street parking. About 1 mile to downtown and the Convention Center, 1 mile to Franklin Park Conservatory, 5 miles to The Ohio State University or the John Glenn International Airport (about 11 mins by car). name: Single room in 3 bed house (30 day min)
description: **Due to changing laws in Columbus I will only now be doing 30day and longer bookings until I see if I can get the permit since I'm renting!*** This is a smaller room with a full size memory foam bed in a house with 3 other bedrooms and 1.5baths and kitchen, laundry and wifi Keyed lock on room door "There will likely be other guest in the other rooms" Walls are insulated between rooms to cut down on noise! Chill space close to OSU and Riverside Hospital. It's a nice space but an older home so not a Marriott! Have the potential of other guest in the house as well. Lockbox on the front door and key knobs for the bedroom. This is a smaller room but real comfortable memory foam bed. Walls are insulated between the rooms for a quieter experience. I work to travel and sometimes travel to work! I have a production company filming weddings and events. Also have a handyman business in Columbus and travel some for that as well. When I go into a town the first thing I look for is the good coffee shops and local breweries!
Looking forwarding to meeting fellow travelers and host!

name: Spare bedroom in the Short North
description: This is the spare bedroom in my condo in the heart of the fantastic, Short North Arts District.  The room has a brand new full size mattress, and its own locks for privacy. Mi casa es Su casa. Feel free to hang basically anywhere, from the living room, to kitchen to private patio, no need to feel stuck in the room. Only place I'd say to please avoid would be  my room. : ) I have a spare key to the front door that any guest will be able to use. This is my primary residence so I will likely be here quite a bit during your stay. However you want to interact is cool with me. I can stay out of your way or we could be chatty, whatever you're comfortable with. Also just a heads up, I have a cat, she's very friendly and nothing to worry about. But she might say hello too. The neighborhood is amazing. By far the best part of this listing.  Loads of fantastic restaurants and bars all within walking distance.  Plus we are situated right between Ohio State University's Campus, The Arena District,
host_about: I'm an easy going guy who loves to explore new towns and places.

name: Charming in historic German Village
description: Quaint home situated in the heart of German Village. Brick lined streets that will take you to locally owned shops, restaurants and bars. Whether you're looking for a quiet getaway or to explore the city, German Village offers something for everyone. Charming home located in the historic German Village neighborhood. This one bedroom condo comfortably sleeps two guests with a queen size bed. The space features exposed brick walls and a modern kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. The condo also features a washer/dryer, TV, and high speed internet. You will have access to one free parking space directly behind the home. As much or as little interaction as you would like! Steps from wonderful restaurants, bars and shops. Stroll the brick lined streets and tuck into a coffee shop, bakery or bookstore. There is a free circulator bus (known as the Cbus) that allows for convenient travel between the brewery district, downtown, arena district and short north. The ne

name: Cozy luxury bedroom w/ private bathroom
description: I have a cozy quiet room with a queen bed, TV, internet, cable, sofa/full bed, and private full bathroom. No smoking and no pets in house. Limited access to the kitchen and dining room (to prepare your meals or snacks only). Please clean up the common areas as you got it. Thank You!!! Interaction with Guests I've lived in Columbus long enough to know every inch. Feel free to ask me any questions and I'll help you make plans or suggest things! Quiet, friendly, and near highways. We have a great pool to relax in! Near highway 315 which leads straight campus, Short North and  Downtown 15 minute drive to Columbus airport  Located close to the beautiful Olentangy Trail and recreational activities along the Olentangy River. Nearby are some of the city's hottest dining, nightlife and shopping areas A
host_about: Easy going, respectful and friendly.

name: Historic Townhome in Heart of German Village
description: Vintage 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom end-unit townhome in the heart of German Village, a one-of-a-kind neighborhood featured on the National Register of Historic Places.  Located across the street from Schiller Park! This townhome has all of the charm and architectural character you'd expect from a German Village home including rustic, original pine floors, beautiful unpainted woodwork and moldings, newly renovated bathrooms, tall ceilings, and comfy yet elegant decor to make you feel right at home.  In fact, it was featured on the 2017 German Village Haus Und Garten Tour! There is about 1200 sq. ft of living space inside the unit, which includes a living room, dining room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms.  Each room was designed and decorated by the owners with a mix of high-end furnishings from Crate & Barrel + Restoration Hardware, antique/vintage finds, and fun artwork. Fully stocked kitchen with granite counters, shaker style cabinets, a fridge, gas range & dishwasher.  Private f
host_about: We're Bryan & Catherine, a married couple with a love for entrepreneurship, interior design, & travel.  We have been hosting for five years now and have welcomed more than 1500 guests into our properties.  You can find out more about us, our businesses and our work on Instagram @beginninginthemiddle and on our blog, Beginning in the Middle.

name: Lovely "Greening" Clintonville Cottage Near All!
description: Warm and inviting home in the heart of Clintonville, funky family neighborhood only 4 miles from OSU campus and 15 minutes drive from all the best Columbus has to offer: COSI, the Short North Arts District, Downtown, Scioto Mile, the Brewery District, the Franklin Park Botanical Gardens, German Village, and so much more! THE HOUSE This large family house can comfortably accommodate 2 couples and as many children who want to sleep upstairs.  On the first floor two Queen bedrooms and a full bath are in a suite, separated by a door from the front living room.  This floor also features a well-equipped galley kitchen with new appliances, a central dining room, and a family room with a comfortable couch and a TV w/Roku (Netflix, Amazon). In this room you'll also find two desks and chairs as well as a printer. Upstairs there are 2 single beds and room for air mattresses (available on request), as well as half-bath.  Central A/C throughout the house, though the 2nd floor can get hot in summer
host_about: Writer & therapist

name: Private room near OSU/Downtown!
description: Private room in the Grandview Heights area with modern decor and a queen size bed!  This area is known for its walkability with an array of shops, restaurants and bars to see.  We are just a quick trip to OSU, Short North and Downtown areas! Private room with new decor and a queen size bed!  We stock the room with some snacks and drinks, and some extra blankets and pillows.  The bathroom is just out in the hallway and is stocked with towels, toiletries and all bathroom essentials you may need, including a hairdryer and iron/ironing board. Guests have access to the bedroom, a full bathroom, and living areas on the first floor. Andrew and I will be available to help with anything you may need but are often running around enjoying our great city!  Let us know if we can be of service in any way during your stay! We live in the charming Fifth by Northwest area of Columbus.  We are just a very short drive or nice walk from the Arena district, Short North, OSU, and downtown areas. Within just

name: Quiet, Clean, Restful Stay/ Continental Breakfast

I am an Ohio State alumni and proud Mom to 4 fellow buckeyes. I love to give tips on how to best experience Columbus and the state of Ohio.
As a licensed realtor I am also happy to help anyone looking to relocate and find a  home in Columbus .
 My husband and I have hosted more than 500 guests over the last two years with Airbnb, because we enjoy sharing our home and meeting travelers. We recently made an addition to our family - an adorable Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Jack is very friendly and well behaved, loves people and children. 
We look forward to your stay with us.

- Ingrid, Mike, and Frances, Co-Host 

Our life motto- Live like someone left the gate open!

We have had guests from all over the world.  We know you w
host_about: I'm an outgoing type who values the experience of travel.  Airbnb helps me to afford to travel more.  I love meeting new people.  I actually grew up in a Bed & Breakfast so hosting seems to come very naturally to me.

name: Retro "Duckroom" Den Retreat!
description: Our favorite space in the whole house! A cozy, intimate den featuring mid-century modern antique furniture, a twin-sized daybed, vintage couch, and full retro scholar/dad's den set-up: Planner Group windowside desk & alarmclock, bookshelves, moveable Danish side-tables, and a huge-ass portrait of a mallard! :) The most unique room in our house, the Retro Duckroom Den Retreat combines all the charm of a vintage den/study with the comfort and coziness of a compact little bedroom -- cozy bed, convenient dressing table with room for your suitcase, and great little couch and vintage reading chair/lamp for any lounging needs! For graduate students or lovers of MCM furniture, or those wanting a room that features a whole lot of amenities and the privacy of chair/desk/sofa/closet/bed all in one retro space, this is your room! You'll be watched over by our house mascot ducks and original paintings of Columbus infrastructure by my brother Jake. Your room is a cozy, all-inclusive retro den -- you
host_about:
hi there! i'm jess -- a folklorist, oral historian and  columbus, ohio native with a really amazing border collie pup, named isaly. 

my partner jeff & i are both currently grad students -- he studies the history of industrialization and labor in the u.s. south through a history of science & technology phd. program based in philly, and i'm a folklorist and oral historian who works on the history of sustainable agriculture, food & environmental justice, & everyday perceptions of environmental toxicity. that means i get to road-trip around this fine state alot, asking people questions about how they connect food and environment health, and how they've had their lives shaped  around those questions. 

as a folklorist and oral historian, i believe in the power of everyday people's embodied and lived knowledge and experience; and my work is in documenting, interpreting and helping to present these powerful perspectives to wider audiences, to create conversations for change. i try to bring these passions to everything in my life.

i'm interested in the ways people connect food, health and environmental concern; and movement histories and futures of activism around the stuff that makes us sick, and the stuff that makes us healthy. basically, if you wanna talk farm magazines from the 1950s or the poisons & boons of various audio recorders or just like food in general, i'm yr grrl! 

because of my own history of exposure and chemical sensitivity, we try to keep (as much as possible) a non-toxic home, free of meats, chemical cleaners, and scents. and, if you come in summer or fall, you're free to help harvest goodies from our bountiful yard garden! (the "yarden.") it can get a bit weedy this time of year; but it's all chem-free and very well loved.

columbus, ohio is my hometown (and my favorite city on earth), and we're so blessed to get to do cultural work in and around the good and environmental systems in this lovely place. we absolutely love showing people this city -- from cultural tours to the best nature spots to restaurants (even pokmon)! 

our wonderful brilliant border collie isaly will be your prime host -- she loves our guests and will happily throw you some tricks (her newest one is "step up and kisses") and some cuddles. we also have a lovely matching kitty named nella. 

we love meeting people from all around the world, and sharing our love for our little city and its wonderful culture. we can't wait to meet you!

name: Private bed & bath 10 mins from DT
description: This location is 10 minutes from downtown and 5 minutes from Easton Town Center. There are multiple restaurants and establishments within minutes of the condo.  Guests will have their own private room and personal ensuite bathroom. Perfect size space to host guests as the guest bedroom is huge with a large ensuite bathroom and closet. Common areas are always clean and I am available as little or as much as guests prefer. Guests will have access to the entire apartment including the washer and dryer if needed. WiFi is also available! I am always available to suggest restaurants and places to go. The amount of interaction can be as little or as much as each person prefers. Getting around is so easy as the highway is about 1/4 of a mile away. Uber and Lyft are both in Columbus as well as local cab companies. I do have a 4 year old whippet mix named Stella who loves to give kisses. She normally has free roam of the house but I can put her in my bedroom when I am not home if guests prefer.
host_about: Hey there, my name is Tarah and I love to travel! I have a dog named Stella who I love taking to parks and lakes to go hiking. My favorite type of music is EDM and house music. Really enjoy doing things outside with friends and am up for trying anything new!

name: Quaint 1920's Townhouse
description: Comfortable living space in historic Merion Village, with 800 sqft it's the perfect get away for two.  Within walking distance to several bars and Schiller Park. A 10-12 minute drive to Downtown, Brewery District, Arena District, Short North, and The Ohio State University.   - 19 minute drive to the main airport   - 13 minute drive to the Convention Center   Located just around the corner from the bus stop.  There is a Kroger and a CVS available for groceries. This is an older home dating back to the 1920s.  Ceilings are tall, rooms are quaint, stairs are steep.  Please respect the dated property, and enjoy it's character.   There is no garbage disposal in the kitchen sink, please dispose of food in trash.   New HVAC has been installed, temperature should be acceptable as set.  There is a fan/heater in the upstairs landing for possible use while in the bedroom, as temperatures vary in the home.   Plumbing is fragile given the age of the home.  Please do not flush anything other than to
host_about:
I'm hosting on Airbnb because I no longer live in half of my duplex property, and I enjoy sharing it's charming space with visitors looking to be just outside of downtown Columbus.  I enjoy all kinds of art, music, dance and food.  Wine, shoes, and dessert are my weaknesses.  I love traveling of all kinds, short road trips or long vacations. I hope my guests enjoy the passion and warmth I've put into my century old property. Thanks for your inquiry!

Throughout my busy days, I enjoy taking a moment to breathe in the world, and no matter how stressful or challenging life can become, I always find time to admire how huge and beautiful life is around me, and my challenges don't seem as extreme anymore.

name: 1BR 1-person Clintonville Apt, (5-day min rental)
description: This is a pleasant 2-level apartment that is perfect for a single tenant. The minimum stay is 5 nights at $60/night.  Longer stays (28 days or more) are $38/night.  It's an ideal place to stay if you are traveling alone, and a great option if your planned visit to Columbus is a bit longer than the typical "vacation". This is an attractive and comfortable apartment for a single person who is in Columbus for an extended but relatively short period of time, or is in the process of moving to Columbus and needs short-term housing while searching for a long-term rental.  There's no long-term lease to sign, no roommates, your own private bath, kitchen and laundry, and utilities are set up and included in the rental fee.   The apartment has a bedroom, bath, and a small closet on the entry level; and the living room, dining room, kitchen and laundry space are on the basement level.  It is attractively furnished, and includes linens, dishes, a TV, washer, dryer, and small appliances.   The bedro
host_about: I have lived in Columbus off and on since coming here to attend Ohio State University in the 60's.  I have a degree in Architecture from OSU, but my real interest has always been in renovations. I have a son who lives in San Francisco and I love to visit there several times a year.  My husband and I have 3 grandchildren - one in California and two in Michigan.  I recently retired from OSU after working there for 18 years.

host_about:
We are a couple living in the historic German Village of Columbus, Ohio. A few things we love: art, design, architecture, photography, real estate, playing host,  laughing, local food & drink, the great outdoors, camping, exploring new places, meeting new people, Game of Thrones, and some good R&R with friends and family. Chelsey is a copywriter and Sonny is a graphic designer/developer.

We love our gem of a city. The Columbus scene offers more than you might expect, with awesome people, local food, unique craft breweries and funky small businesses around every corner. We are always excited to share the all that Columbus has to offer with others. 

Our perfect date night (recommended):
1. Stop by Curio for some seriously unique and delicious cocktails.
2. Visit Third & Hollywood in Grandview for amazing seasonal cuisine. 
3. walk to Jeni's Ice Creams for dessert
4. Hop over to Seventh Son Brewing for some of our favorite adult beverages.
5. Uber down to 16 Bit Bar (BARxARCADE) and meet friends for games.
6. Jump next door to Dirty Franks for some late night snacks.
7. Walk home 
8. Sleep =)

host_about:
Hello! I'm a friendly, outgoing professional and very social. I have a cute Australian shepherd that's my best buddy. We like to go hiking and take photos of nature and our adventures.

In my downtime at home, you'll find me outside on my deck with Gigi, watching for hummingbirds to come to our feeders, or keeping up with my social media on the couch. I'm also addicted to listening to true crime podcasts.

host_about:
Hello!

I am an Ohio native now living in New York City - Brooklyn, to be specific. I love to travel as much as I can - there's just nothing like exploring new places or coming home to old ones. I am a true explorer - I love maps and am always the person that asks a million questions while on a tour (or while just walking around). I enjoy reading (The New York Times, Game of Thrones, BuzzFeed, you name it), cooking up food from my local food coop, eating out at one of NYC's many wonderful restaurants, biking in Prospect Park, and doing a healthy amount of yoga. I actually met my partner in a yoga class, and now we love to travel together.

I can't wait to meet you!

host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

description: 1.5 miles to the heart of down town. It was built in the 1950s, as a church in the back yard of my home. The master bedroom was the podium. A second room is set up as an office or as a private bedroom.    Great for business travelers, and everyone else, including families! Franklinton is  in transition with some run down homes and remodeled homes selling for high prices.   When taken as a whole, Guest's reviews portrays our area well. This has all the amenities of home. A well equipped kitchen has a dishwasher, microwave and washer and dryer, and of course a full sized range and refrigerator.  And you can use the clothes line. The dining table expands to seat 8 and the old pew from the church podium provides some of the seating. A futon pulls out to be a double bed and another lays flat for a single bed. The office has a desk, a reclining leather easy chair and high speed internet. The bedroom closet is very functional. Guests have use of the whole building, The entrance is from the al
host_about:
Bruce and I recently married after some time as a widow/widower, in our 70's and enjoying time together and with family.  I like gardening and cooking and having friends over. We are very active in the community and  own and manage a number of rentals. 

Airbnb is now familiar and it's all good after our first year - we hope to expand to more units.  We can be about as involved as hosts as guests would like - from "here you are, have a nice stay" - to cooking dinner. We live on the other side of the patio which you are free to use. 

We really try to host folk who need longer stays - weeks to months, hence the 4 day minimum,  but that sometimes leaves a few days between bookings - often  on weekends. So feel free to inquire about shorter stays at short notice. 
 
We travel quite a lot and usually stay at Airbnb sites - so much nicer than fancy hotels. 

This asks for languages I speak but does not allow me to claim American and English/Australian as different.

name: Miss Paula's B&B
description: Business and family friendly! Basement apartment, onsite parking and entrance, 1 bedroom w/2 beds and 1 bathroom, living room, kitchen and eating space. Close to activities in Clintonville/Worthington.  Less then 10 miles from OSU/Short North/Downtown Columbus - MAPFRE Stadium, Nationwide Arena, The School, Ohio Expo Center,  Convention Center. Centrally located to all major highways, Polaris Fashion Place, Easton, Tanger Outlets, and IKEA. Easy highway access to major hospitals. My space is a beautifully renovated downstairs basement apartment adjoining my home with your own driveway and private, remote keyless entry.  Check in is 4:00 PM EST unless otherwise requested at time of booking.  Check out is 11:00 AM unless otherwise requested by 10:30 AM.   It has 1 bedroom with 2  beds (1 queen and 1 full) and a large couch, a dressing/sitting/living room, a full bathroom and kitchen and eating space with a table that has leaves for business working.  Laundry facilities are available for
host_about:
I am a retired lady enjoying pursuing my own interests now - and running an Airbnb space is one I've really been looking forward to doing.  I used to house hearing impaired students from all over Ohio in years past and have had several friends renting this space and they all loved it!  Now that my daughter and her husband have moved out it is time to share once again.

I have 3 wonderful little animals in the main house - 2 cats and 1 dog.

The cats are never in the basement area of the rooms I am offering up for use, but Janey occasionally goes down with me to do the laundry and clean, but she is never allowed when I have guests.

My home and life is non-judgmental and open to all races, religions and genders.  

I hope you will enjoy your visit should you choose to do so!  Have a wonderful day!

name: In the Heart of German Village
description: Truly in the heart of German Village.  Steps from Lindey's, Club 185, Harvest Pizza, G Michael's, Pistachio Vera and Katzinger's.  Convenient to downtown, OSU, Nationwide Arena and Nationwide Childrens' Hospital. Newly remodeled authentic brick cottage with off-street parking.  Fully-equipped cook's kitchen with Carrera marble and s/s appliances.  Entertainer's dining room and large living/family room.  2 cozy bedrooms up, each with queen beds and TV's.  Wi-Fi throughout, full cable.
