host_about: Nice guy

name: Classic & Convenient in German Village
description: Classic & Convenient - 884 Macon is a charming single family home located in the heart of German Village!! Minutes to the Convention Center and home of the Buckeyes-The Horseshoe & the Schottenstien Center, a stone's throw from Schiller Park. The house is ready for any of your plans: Dishes & cookware for a family meal? Check.  Speakers throughout to enjoy & relax? Check.  Strong WiFi & desk to crank some work out? Check.  Ultra comfy beds for ZZZs? Check Whatever you need - we're on it! 884 Macon, known to us as "The Treehouse", is a piece of continuing history for German Village and our family. The house was built in the 1860's and the layout has remained true sans a sunroom added in the 80's. Thomases have lived here since the 60's and each of us has several stories that are close to the heart; from a first listen of a Simon & Garfunkel album to annual Christmas parties packed to the gills to an indelible late night conversation. It's German Village, Thomas style. The house stands a
host_about: Mother & Son combo! World traversed together, now hosting a 100% unique German Village experience, Thomas style.

name: Modern townhome just steps from the Short North!
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. There's an energy and excitement in Columbus that's going to hit you as soon as you arrive. Big things are happening here, and you're invited to join in. Nationally acclaimed distilleries work together with brewers, coffee roasters and high-end cocktail bars, black box stages, music halls and dive bars to deliver unforgettable nightlife. -Renovated in 2016: custom white cabinets, granite counter tops, new hardwood floor throughout entire first floor, new carpet on second floor, updated bath with ceramic title surround, and fresh paint throughout.  -Just steps to the Short North filled with the best food, night life, and more!  -Queen Bed provided & door has private lock - Charming streetscape & friendly neighbors  -Eat-In Kitchen with Coffee, Tea, & Filtered Water provided. Also included, a light breakfast (yogurt or cereal) and fresh fruit.  -2 bed, 1 bath townhome w/basement 1200 sq ft -This is a private room ren
host_about:
Greetings! 

Thanks for taking a moment to learn a little bit more about me. I'm a young professional who works in the Real Estate business - often times it consumes my days and nights; weekends too! However, I wouldn't have it any other way and I'm very passionate about what it do. 

Five things that I can't live without: 

1. My iphone! It's on your top 5 too! ;) 
2. My dog Tyson (Sheltie) - 5 years old & 18lbs 
3. Coffee - it's the first thing I do in the morning! 
4. Laptop - Personally/Professionally 
5. Toothbrush/Toothpaste - clean and nice teeth are a priority to me. 

I enjoy having Air BnB guest because Columbus is my roots and I get to share that with someone visiting. However, it does not stop there; it's a two-way street I get to meet people from all over the world, with stories, culture, viewpoints that I have never been exposed to in my lifetime. It's fun! I like to entertain! Of course, the few extra bucks is nice too. 

I'm Not Your Average Joe!  Look forward to meeting you in person. 

Be well & talk soon, 

Joseph

name: This place is very quite and private.  New Apt
description: This apartment has new carpet and is very clean.

name: Columbus (Private room & Bath)  Medical/Business
description: My goal is to make you feel as comfortable and at home as possible. Perfect for medical students and business travelers. The guest bedroom, bathroom, downstairs living room with a fireplace and a Smart T.V.  are located on the second level separate from the kitchen and other upstairs bedrooms.  This allows for a lot of privacy.  A separate fridge is provided and a shared kitchen is available anytime.  Outside there is a firepit, porch swing, grill, and a garden.  My house is your house. Smart T.V. with Hulu, Netflix, YouTube etc, Fireplace, Downstairs living room, bathroom, and bedroom. Downstairs there is a private bedroom and bathroom.  There also is a shared living room and office.  Upstairs, there is a kitchen, dining room, and the rest of the bedrooms. We love to talk and interact with our guests, but also respect their privacy and need to rest and recoup from their work or travel. We are in a nice family friendly neighborhood. 15 minutes from downtown Columbus. 3.5 miles from Doc
host_about:
Our family is originally from California. We have three kids, 1 dog, and one cat. We homeschool and love camping, hiking, and music. We are a Christian family and consider God and our faith as the center of everything we do. 

We love to host friends and guests in our home. Hospitality is very important to us and we love to serve others in this way. Dinner parties, game nights, and grilling out are a regular part of our lifestyle.

name: Sweet Little Room off I-71 @ I-270
description: Our place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers.  Close to I-71 and I-270 North, it's the perfect location for across country stop.  Our home is also at the center of major points of attraction: 7 miles from Polaris Mall, 8 from Easton Mall, 7 from Ohio State Fairgrounds and Mapfre Stadium, 8 to OSU, 10 from the Greyhound station, and 14 from the Airport. If you must eat healthy, no problem! our local health food store and diner, Raisin Rack is just 2 miles away. Located on the 2nd floor, this little room is bright and inviting ~ Enjoy the use of your own Coffee machine ~ Choice of teas ~ Your own space heater or Air Conditioner. I give my guests space but am available when needed Our home is located in a peaceful neighborhood, at the end of a peaceful court. Close to I-71 and I-270 North, our home is at the center of major points of attraction:  -	6 miles from Polaris Place,  -	8 miles from Easton Mall,  -	8 miles easy commute to OSU, -	2 miles from our local health food
host_about: My husband is from Japan, an amateur radio lover, sushi chef, and excellent cook. I grew up in a tiny village of the French Alps, enjoy the outdoor and everything to do with personal growth. I keep learning and reaching out to expend my friendship circle all the while taking care of my family and grandchildren.

name: Dapper Downtown Diggs!
description: Great downtown space in German Village! Private patio, blocks from downtown and great bars! Two bedrooms and eat in kitchen, full size washer and dryer! Long term or a quick retreat, this space is a perfect getaway!

name: German Village gem close to it all!
description: Great space blocks away from it all! Unique bars, and one of a kind restaurants are just a short walk or drive to this amazing space! A block outside downtown you are near the heart of the city! Available for short and long-term!

name: Huge 4 BR, 1.5B, FREE Parking & WIFI, Near Mapfre!
description: This colorful, 1600 sqft apartment w/ 2 parking spots is a quiet escape in the city and a short Uber to the Short North. Located on N. 4th St. N of 17th St. near I-71 & 670. Please read listing & rules thoroughly before making a reservation. Additional $45 fee per person/night for 4th guest & up apply. Proximity:  Ohio Expo Center/Fairground- 0.8 mi OSU- 1.3 mi Short North- 1.5 mi Maphre Crew Stadium- 1.5 mi Schottenstein Center- 1.9 mi Convention Center- 2.8 mi Downtown- w/in 3.8 mi radius Have a large group?  Check out the sister listing on Airbnb & our other apartments. Additional Guest Fee Groups of 4 or more are $45 per person per night.  We offer an apartment at cost effective prices for small and large groups.  The quote breakdown shows the additional guest fees when entering the number of guests and dates for your trip. Food for thought- local hostel is $25 -$50 per person for a shared hostel bathroom. Refunds for additional guest fees, if guests cannot make it, are under the H
host_about:
Mike and Ingrid met in Japan, moved to Columbus in 2009, and have been loving it ever since!  Both are experienced travelers (25+ countries on 5 continents between us) & enjoy renovating historic homes and building new homes.

"We love being hosts- providing a comfy home and delivering a unique experience when visiting our city. We know quite a lot about Short North entertainment & food establishments- there is so much to do here, feel free to ask!"
- Ingrid, Mike, and Frances, Co-Host 

Our life motto- Live like someone left the gate open!

name: Beautiful spacious suite with gym.
description: Our beautiful spacious basement suite is complete with gym equipment and a private sitting area.  We are located on a quiet brick street in Historic Italian Village which is close to the the Short North, Downtown Columbus, and free public transportation. We are located on a quaint brick street that's far enough from the excitement of the Short North to be quiet but close enough to be able to walk to the areas bars, restaurants, and shops. The room is spacious and well appointed.  We want your stay to be as comfortable and worry free as possible. Guests have access to the main floor (kitchen, living room, dining room, dinette, and powder room) as well as the gym, bedroom, sitting area, and attached bathroom on the lower level. We are lifelong Columbus residents and we love our neighborhood.   We are happy to help with suggestions and arrangements.  We are here to help you have an amazing time while you are here. We are located in Italian Village which is an historic neighborhood just no
host_about: I am a lifelong resident of Columbus, Ohio. I love my city and I know a lot about its history. I love meeting new people and I want to make sure that your bust is comfortable and enjoyable.

name: Short North Loft with Parking
description: Based in the heart of the historic and vibrant Short North Arts District, this urban loft allows you to experience all Columbus has to offer with ease.  Grab brunch at Fox in the Snow Cafe, explore the North Market and its merchants, and polish it off with a fine dinner at The Rossi.  If nightlife is your jam, check out Standard Hall for a beer or tasty cocktail.  Otherwise, grab a scoop of some of the best ice cream you'll ever have at the famous Jeni's Splendid Ice Creams on High St. This spot is located minutes from the Convention Center, Nationwide Arena and numerous diverse restaurants, making everything readily accessible for you and/or your group.  The loft comfortably sleeps four, comes with a full kitchen to make cooking a breeze, and has a washer and dryer if you need to do a quick load of laundry.  Getting around is made super easy by Uber or walking (if it's nice out!), but if you prefer to drive yourself parking is included at the unit. Everything except for one closet. Ub

name: Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment Near OSU and Downtown
description: My place is close to the Ohio State University and the Columbus business district. Walk to a Buckeye game or take a $10 uber to the heart of downtown Columbus. Located on up-and-coming N Fourth St, home to two Columbus micro breweries and other great eateries. Great accommodation for couples, business travelers, football fans, and furry friends (pets). Please note that the second bed is a large air mattress with sheets/pillows/duvet set.

name: Punta Hideaway
description: Entire 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath home in the heart of Italian Village. 4 minute walk to High Street and the Short North, providing extremely easy access to all of the amazing restaurants, nightlife, shopping and more that the Short North has to provide.  1 block from kid-friendly playground.  Prime location for weekend getaway, or a comfortable place to spend a week of business travel. 2 queen size beds in 2 separate bedrooms. Comfortable couch and air mattress available for additional sleeping spaces Our home is a 2 story freestanding house in the heart of the vibrant Italian Village/Short North neighborhood. There are 2 separate bedrooms upstairs, each equipped with new queen size pillow top mattresses. The master bedroom has a wall mounted TV for your enjoyment. There is a full bath upstairs, along with a washer and dryer for your use. All linens are provided. Downstairs is the living room, newly remodeled kitchen and dining area, along with a half bath. There is a 55" TV in the living ro
host_about:
Hello! My name is Brandon and I am a young professional living in Columbus, Ohio. I'm an Ohio native, born and raised in Northwest Ohio. I graduated undergrad from THE Ohio State University, moved to Chicago where I lived and worked for a few years, and have now happily settled back down in Columbus. I work for L Brands, the parent company of Victoria's Secret and Bath & Body Works, one of the many retail companies headquartered here in Columbus. I am currently pursuing my Masters of Business Administration at Purdue University via a hybrid on-campus/online program. 
I enjoy traveling whenever and wherever I can, though I definitely prefer someplace warmer when given the option :) Though I love traveling, I am a Columbus fanboy at heart and am always happy to talk about all of the great things to experience here. I'm a very easy going guy, so feel free to ask me any questions that may be on your mind! Happy traveling!

name: Unique Short North Home 4 BR 2.5 B, Prime Location
description: Renovated 2,000 sq ft, 4 bed, 2.5 bath home with hints of its pre-1890s history. Prime area of Italian Village in the Short North. If you want the luxury of a home within walking distance to restaurants and beautiful Goodale Park-- this is the place for you! Distance to: Columbus Convention Center- 0.6 mi OSU Stadium- 1.8 mi Downtown- all areas of interest are within 2.2 mi radius Ohio Expo Center/ Fairgrounds/Maphre Crew Stadium- 2.2 mi Schottenstein Center- 3.2 mi Easton Mall- 10 mi This home was re-designed for entertaining. The first floor includes includes the kitchen/dining/living room in one connected space- perfect for dinner parties, bridal showers, and gatherings. Please inquire directly if you would like to host a special event; an additional fee applies starting at $100 and will vary depending on the event. All special event details must be approved prior to stay. The first floor has an eat-in kitchen with heated floors, granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances.

name: Sweet Suite in Historic Woodland Park, downtown
description: 3rd floor suite includes updated kitchen, a beautiful spacious bathroom and large living space. Comfortable Queen-size bed, lots of light and great views of the park and gardens are my favorite highlights of this space. New HE washer and dryer in your private laundry room. Fun history happened here, Jazz greats jammed in this space, and many books that belonged to the judge who built the house and later left to work in the White House are in the library downstairs. This is a 3rd floor suite with newly remodeled kitchen, spacious bathroom and laundry room. We can offer free on-street parking, a YMCA only a one block walk away, and a two block walk to Franklin Park Conservatory.  You have the option of a private entry through the side gate and up the butler's staircase if you don't wish to enter through the house.  There is generous space for a Queen size blow up mattress which  I can provide with notice including bedding and pillows. (It is a very nice one with a headboard) You are welc
host_about: I am a garden consultant and arborist I love dogs, and all kinds of plants.

name: 2 Bedroom House In Central Columbus! Housepitality
description: My place is close to nightlife, public transport, MAPFRE stadium, parks, OSU, downtown, and the Short North. You'll love my place because of the kitchen, the coziness, the front and back yard, the front porch with grill, and the hardwood floors. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and groups. The house has a total of 2 queen beds, and an air mattress upstairs. Also Hi-speed WiFi! This is a cozy smaller house being just under 700 sq. ft. The house is fully equipped everything to make yourself feel at home. There is a TV in every room, front and back porch, a stocked kitchen, and a basement with an extra bed, washer and dryer. The un-finished basement also has an extra queen bed. There are no egress windows, but it is clean and painted. The versatile living room can be arranged with a table in the middle for meals or a card game. Or the living room can be set up as a bedroom. You will have access to the whole house including the basem
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Guest room available in German Village Apartment
description: My place is walkable to the grocery store (four blocks), public transport (bus and bike share), parks, restaurants, and nightlife. I rent out my 2nd bedroom for guests. I'm super chill and keep my apartment very clean and comfortable. If the weather is good, my porch is my favorite place to hang. My neighborhood is safe, quiet, and friendly. I have a chill cat who may even greet you. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. I create my space that makes people feel comfortable and at ease. My guest room is comfortable, clean, cozy, and filled with fun books and art. I live in this neighborhood specifically b/c of its central location and access to various transportation options. I have a parking space right outside my house - available for guests. Access via the front entrance. Always happy to meet new people from across the country. I'm also a host on a bike-specific website and I've met some incredible people passing through Columbus.  Happy to interact
host_about:
I work in public health and nuclear medicine.  I'm active member in my community and I love riding my bike.  When I have down time, I'm catching up with friends, reading books, or working out.  I am a proud beer snob and love sipping on bourbon.  Last year, I spent a month in Western Europe and this past year, I've been up-ing my camping game.  
I'm super laid back and respectful and want the same in return.  My place is very welcoming, I have plenty of pillows and blankets (essential), and if you stay here, I hope enjoy yourself and let others know about your experience.

name: Large Condo in the Heart of the Short North
description: This condo is in the heart of the Short North, close to nightlife, bars, restaurants, grocery stores, The Ohio State University, public transport, the airport, and city parks! You will have full access to the entire apartment which has laundry, a full bathroom, and loaded kitchen. There is also a dedicated parking space available for your use. With over 800 square feet in the best part of town, this place is perfect for game day weekend or exploring what Columbus has to offer. This is a great one-bedroom condo in the heart of the best neighborhood in Columbus, the Short North. On the same block there is a Kroger, taco shop, and Meadery, with many, many other things to do just a quick walk away! There is one bedroom with a queen sized bed and a pull out couch for your convenience. The kitchen has a coffee maker (and coffee), full refrigerator, blender, oven, stove top, and all associated kitchen essentials fully available for your use.  The bathroom is large, has a tub and plenty of spa

name: 4th Street Apartments
description: Beautifully renovated apartment. Hardwood floors, adorable kitchen, clean and modern! On the bus line. Minutes to Ohio State University. Close to Downtown and the Short North shops and restaurants.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Your OWN private Victorian Village room.
description: Located close to the area called the Short North, with parks, restaurants and dining, art and culture, and the Arena District, you'll love my place because of the historic Victorian Village neighborhood, and all of  the activities within walking distance: Comfest, Pride Parade, Doo Dah Parade, Highball, Columbus Marathon, Red, White and Boom, and Gallery Hops. You can walk or take the bus to The Ohio State University or downtown. My place is perfect for couples, singles and business travelers. Your spacious room is on the 3rd floor, at the back of the house which makes street noise minimal. You have a closet, baseboard heat, window air conditioner and plenty of light. We, the hosts, share the 2nd floor bathroom with our guests. You may use the kitchen, 2nd floor laundry, TV room, front and back porches, dining room, front parlor and back yard. Any and all petting of the dogs is highly encouraged. We enjoy conversations with our guests if they have time and the inclination. Victorian Vi
host_about: I enjoy traveling, quilting, gardening, reading and sometimes cooking.

name: 2 Bed, 1 Bath Modern townhouse in the Short North
description: Enjoy this entire home that has been renovated in 2016 and located within Historic Victorian Village & Short North! If modern, updated, and the best location in Columbus is what you had in mind then you have found the perfect place! Located in the Short North and just footsteps to the heart and vibrant city of Columbus! The space is 2 beds, 1 full bath, and semi-finished basement. Above grade sq ft is roughly 1,100 Sq Ft w/ basement area 1,500 Sq Ft. Updated in 2016 with new stainless appliances, new carpet, fresh paint, bathroom room remodel, and hardwood floors on the entire first floor. The basement space is used for washer and dryer or just extra hangout room during the cold winter months or a rainy day. Guest will have access to the entire home, however I ask that you please treat the place with respect and reminder this is a townhome so I do have neighbors on both sides of the property. Interaction can be as little or as much desired for the guest. As a Columbus native and reside

description: My place is close to restaurants and dining, nightlife, and public transport, The Ohio State University,  Columbus Museum Of Art, Nationwide Arena, Columbus Metropolitan Library, Scioto Audubon Metro Park, Columbus Convention Center, miles of bike paths, Columbus Commons.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Walking distance to Children's Hospital, Frank Fetch Park, Schiller Park, The Book Loft and a number of restaurants! Harvest Pizza, Barcelona, Lindey's! This is a working artist's studio. The space is an open space combining my work area and sleeping area,  complete with a full kitchen, small refrigerator, full bath, free wifi (newly upgraded), netflix, Amazon TV, sling TV. , private entrance, private balcony, Keurig coffee maker, coffee, and snacks  available.  I only work in this space when it is not rented out as an air bnb space. It is all yours. Hope you enjoy it! This is a private entrance studio apartment.  You will not be sharing space wi

name: QUIET and COZY HOME, EVERYTHING NEW
description: New furniture, new Casper beds in both rooms, comfortable and QUIET space on a QUIET street so conveniently located across the street from a HUGE Kroger, Target and Starbucks.  You can walk in less than a minute to these places.  Also located near major highway for easy on and off access.  Bus stop to Ohio State University and downtown Columbus also very close by. English Basement apartment, which means 1/2 above ground 1/2 below....clean, completely private and separate from my living space.  Safe and quiet neighborhood, plenty of private parking. Guests have their own private kitchen and bathroom.  There is a TV equipped with Roku which has access to Amazon, Netflix, and HBO Now.  There is a private living room and 2 bedrooms. Almost 900 square feet completely to yourself. I'll greet you at check in to show you around.. There is TONS within a very very short walking distance..restaurants, shopping, coffee, and even transportation if needed. Columbus does have Uber, which is a wonderf
host_about: I live and breathe for travel, so it only makes sense that when I can't be traveling myself, I would be hosting travelers!!!   I love meeting new people, experiencing new cultures, and just wow'ing my brain with any new experience possible!  I've lived in China and Indonesia, and have been to almost every state here in America!!   I love being an Airbnb host, (and guest) and hopefully someday our paths will cross, in this great journey of life!!!!

name: German Village Perfect!  No cleaning fee
description: In historic German Village, this inviting home is close to Downtown, The Statehouse, COSI, Columbus Museum of Art, the airport, parks, art, and culture.  You'll love this beautifully restored home because of the gorgeous kitchen, fenced outdoor space and the quaint neighborhood of brick paved streets.   Now two full baths! As of Nov 2018 we have a brand new full bath on the second story. Check out photos! We cut the cord - bring your AppleTV account and never miss your faves. A renovated home in a 'National Register of Historic Places' historic district known for its brick streets, European feel, fenced back yards and quaint livability.  This home has hardwood floors, granite counter tops, a gas fireplace and all the modern amenities including zoned heating and cooling for ultimate comfort year-round.  The kitchen even boasts distilled water on tap at the sink and at the refrigerator.  Remodeled 1st floor bath and brand new 2nd floor full bath for 2018.   Zoned heating and cooling mean
host_about:
I work in technology but technology hates me.  I persevere.

I've lived in the neighborhood for 20 years, so I obviously think it is THE BEST part of Columbus to live and play in.  After your reservation is confirmed I provide a (Hidden by Airbnb) map of some great destinations that are within walking distance of the BnB, and I live within shouting distance so I'll be there to assist you.

name: Private clean, quite room and bath in a safe area.
description: Our house is close to Polaris shopping, restaurants, movie theaters and public park.   Quite safe neighborhood on a quite street. Newly painted, new furniture, quite neighborhood. Please park on street in front of house.

name: Converted Historic Railroad House
description: Completely renovated railroad storage house converted to a spacious one bedroom home in the heart of historic Merion Village, adjacent to German Village, boasting tons of restaurants and parks. Centrally located to everything Columbus has to offer. Within 15 minutes from The Columbus Convention Center, Columbus Commons, Arena District, Short North, NHL (Blue Jackets), MLS (Crew), MILB (Clippers), and of course all the major sports from THE Ohio State University Buckeyes! Completely renovated railroad storage home in historic area. Spacious one bedroom with a pullout queen size bed in living room to accommodate 4 total people.  Brick house on a brick street offering privacy with full kitchen and laundry. Everything you need to make you feel at home! 24/7 Smart Lock Entrance for flexible check in/check out Fully Equipped Kitchen  Washer & Dryer Cable TV Free WiFi Tons of Free Parking Available via cell phone (text or calls) or email. I am bi-coastal and often in California but have spent
host_about: Love life and my beautiful family.

name: Wonderful Weekend or Relaxing Extended Stay Space
description: Woodland Park Home Relaxing private room within a historic spacious home in Woodland Park. Just minutes away from Downtown, the Airport, and beautiful Franklin Park and Conservatory. The private room has a furnished queen sized bed, large closet, dresser, night stand, TV with cable and DVD player entertainment area, Kitchen includes stainless steel appliances and a gas range. Laundry is available in basement. Large fenced back yard including patio, gas fire pit, stainless steel gas grill. The Space Fully remodeled historical home set in the middle of Woodland Park just East of Downtown.  You will have full access to the home excluding other private bedrooms, bath, and or office and garage.  The home was built in 1915 and fully remodeled in 2014.  All areas of the home are complete including the third floor which is where the entertainment area including a comfortable couch, chair, TV (streaming) and Blue Ray player, mini fridge/freezer, mini storage bar and bar table are located. Kitch
host_about: Young professional that is excited to travel to new areas and meet new people. I enjoy traveling for vacations and as well as hosting and meeting new people. I'm pretty quite as a person and easy to get along with. I only speak English so a English speaking host is a must.

name: Columbus Comfort. Close to all top attractions !!
description: You will love our house for location and its character. Our house was featured on the 2018 WESTGATE HOME AND GARDEN TOUR. Downtown nightlife, Convention centre, Grandview, Short North, & OSU campus are less than 8 mi away! Casino only 2 mi. It is 1mile to Camp Chase bike trail and 2 mi to the nearest highway. The front porch is screened in, to enjoy morning sunshine & still have privacy. The main floor has two bedrooms so no stairs to climb. Clean, simple & quiet neighbourhood. This beautiful house was built in the 1930s- on the outside, this house appears to be a tiny house but don't let the looks fool you- Classically arched entryways lead you throughout this spacious home featuring gorgeous original hardwood floors.   The front porch is screened in- for you to enjoy early morning sunshine while you have your coffee & still have privacy. Decent size living room comfortably seats 8-9. This house is divided into 3 levels -  The main floor :  has a living room, dining room, kitchen with
host_about:
Hello! I am Rue. I love early morning sunshine, travel experiences, aged wine, fresh coffee, nature and its beautiful endless skies.

After working with various corporates for more than a decade I decided to start my own business. Since we moved for business, I was able to use my home on AIRBNB.

While decorating this house we kept comfort and design in forefront of our mind. I open our home to Airbnb guests from all cultures, backgrounds, and nationalities. I look forward to building wonderful new friendships with people around the globe. Thank you for considering our place to stay, hope to talk to you soon. :)

name: Contemporary Homestead in Central Location
description: My place is close to Ohio State University, Clintonville, Olentangy Bike Trail, Glen Echo Ravine, lots of bars and restaurants, and just a few miles from downtown.  You'll love my place because of the eclectic neighborhood, the contemporary design and open floor plan, the natural light, the balcony, the fireplace, and the backyard chickens. The fireplace is always burning when it's cold and fresh eggs are always available for guests. We have a very sweet dog and cat both of whom love people. Full access to bedroom, kitchen and all community areas. I'm usually available and I am happy to suggest nearby restaurants and places to visit while you're here. The neighborhood is very eclectic.  You'll find everyone from students and professionals to artists and families.  Tons of food, bars, art, theaters, boutiques etc that are easily accessible from my house. Very bikeable and walkable neighborhood.  Less than 1/4 mile to High Street where there are countless bars, restaurants and a bus line

name: Short North Apartment just steps from ~EVERYTHING!
description: Located at the beginning of the very vibrant Short North neighborhood of Columbus. So many things to see, explore, experience, and discover in the Short North Arts District, deciding what to do is half the fun! Art, food, drinks, shopping, spas, salons, live music, and festivals - the District truly has it all. For any celebration and event, every holiday and special occasion, the Short North District is a vibrant, exciting urban neighborhood with a unique local flavor and culture to spare. Great little one bedroom apartment in a 3-plex building (2nd floor). High ceilings, eat in kitchen, living room with television, and a bedroom with a queen size bed. One full bathroom with shower and tub. The whole apartment is yours to enjoy your stay. Feel free to use any of the kitchen wares, appliances, ...etc. I'll be available along the way if you need assistance with anything during your stay. This apartment is located in the Short North Arts District with walking to shops, restaurants, and b
host_about: Business owner here in Columbus, Ohio. Love to travel and have been to many parts of the world. Recently returned from Ireland and stayed with some amazing new friends from Airbnb! Would like to welcome everyone to come check out Columbus. This is a great city with lots to do and see!

name: 5 star for a reason!  Clean, quiet, convenient!
description: Quiet and safe area with easy access to everything. Located in the quaint Clintonville neighborhood just north of OSU campus.  Two story townhouse with double bed with memory foam mattress and white clean hotel type linens. Easy walking distance to Target, Kroger, LA Fitness and many restaurants and shops. Large bedroom with everything you need including access to the main floor.   Bedroom has loveseat sofa, desk, TV and double size bed with memory foam mattress.  Located on a tree-lined street in North Columbus not far from campus and a mile from I-71 which is the gateway to everything in Columbus. You will be assigned the new security code for the front door which is changed after every guest.  The bedroom door is keyed for privacy so if you choose, you may lock and take the key during the day. I work as a consultant and website developer so I am in and out but when I'm around, I love to grab dinner or share the common space to get to know guests.   But I also respect when guests jus
host_about: I am an easy going single guy who works from home as a consultant in non-profit fundraising.  I enjoy watching sports, running and helping others.  I'm an adventurous guy who enjoys traveling, meeting up with friends and trying new restaurants.

name: Spacious One Bedroom  in Short North near OSU
description: Roost in the "Second Flight" apartment minutes from downtown in the Short North arts district, 5 blocks from OSU and 1/2 a block from grocery store,  public transport, while exploring the city and its nightlife. Comfy Queen bed, high ceilings, hardwood floors, WIFI and Cable, with full functioning kitchen make for a cozy walkable getaway. "Second Flight" is especially good for couples, small families and visitors to the Ohio State University and Columbus Convention Center. Second Flight is a light-filled, airy one bedroom apartment nestled on the second story in the back of our overgrown Victorian home.  Formerly servant's quarters overlooking the back yards tucked behind historic brick Italianate and Queen Ann houses, it offers a completely private entrance, large bedroom, kitchen, full bath, and living room with full convertible futon couch as a second bed.  It has a large desk for work surface, WIFI, and a 40 inch TV with Cable and HDMI inputs.  Head to the OSU game or out into the
host_about: Hello, I am a married  father of 2  recently grown sons. My wife, Julie, and I are now offering part of our overgrown Victorian house to Air BnB guests.  By day I am an attorney in general practice and landlord; Julie is a psychotherapist. By free time, we are musicians (mainly a cappella vocalists though with some harmonica, clarinet, a very little tuba and hand drums thrown in.  We  enjoy jamming and improvising with others). I am a motorcyclist and lover of small affordable British roadsters, a mechanical tinkerer. We  are rehabbers/restorers of old houses with avid interests in music of all kinds, art, books, film, food (the more local and authentic the better), all manner of whiskeys and especially conversation.  I am  French by birth, and still fluent. I would say we are  Midwestern/progressive  by long residence and disposition; usually gregarious, though sometimes quieter and observant. We like to travel fairly light, although we are probably  a little "long in the tooth" to be truly "spartan."  I suppose our  style of Air b&b hosting is to  provide a comfortable safe staging ground and general guidance from which guests can explore on their own.  Current life motto might be something like "The best revenge is living engaged!"

name: Delux First Floor Apartment in Olde Towne East
description: Delux apartment in Olde Towne East.  Newly renovated, with a charming mix of new and antique furniture and decor, this apartment takes up the whole first floor of a century-old house, complete with antique mantel and hardwood floors.  Located in one of Columbus' grand old neighborhoods, two blocks from Franklin Park.  Easy access to downtown, the Greater Columbus Convention Center, Ohio State University campus, the Short North, the Ohio Expo Center, the airport, and Easton. The whole apartment is yours. We live nearby, and are [almost] always available to be of assistance. Olde Towne East is a great old neighborhood.  100 years ago, it was the most fashionable part of town.  Today, it is one of the most diverse, up and coming places in Columbus: one by one, the old houses around us have been renovated and restored to their former grandeur.   That said, Olde Towne is definitely an urban environment.  Parts of it are still gritty around the edges.  A few houses remain boarded up.  But it
host_about:
Jay and Michael are newly married, traveling through life and the world together.  Nice, respectable boys both of them.  

Interests include old things, good food and fine wine, dogs, Lana, art museums, history, video games, antique shops, fashion, second hand bookshops.  Priorities:  eating delicious things not eaten before, seeing beautiful places not seen before, meeting extraordinary people not met before.

name: QUIET Space close to EVERYTHING!
description: Everything is new in this comfortable listing.  Queen sized Casper bed, is the absolute best for sleeping. Walk to dining, Target, Starbucks and much more. English Basement apartment, which means 1/2 above ground 1/2 below....clean, completely private and separate from my living space.  Safe and quiet neighborhood, plenty of private parking. You have your own bedroom (new queen sized Casper bed), kitchen and bathroom.  Living room has fully equipped TV.   * Ohio State - 5 miles  * Downtown Columbus - 9 miles * Target  - about 50 steps away  * Grocery - about 30 steps away  Plenty of dining and other attractions very close by Guests have their own private bedroom, kitchen, bathroom..living room with Roku TV. I will do my best to see you at check in to show you around, and then we may run into each other in my parking area if one of us is coming or going
host_about: I live and breathe for travel, so it only makes sense that when I can't be traveling myself, I would be hosting travelers!!!   I love meeting new people, experiencing new cultures, and just wow'ing my brain with any new experience possible!  I've lived in China and Indonesia, and have been to almost every state here in America!!   I love being an Airbnb host, (and guest) and hopefully someday our paths will cross, in this great journey of life!!!!

name: THE SIELTH RETREAT- DOWNTOWN
description: This room is beautifully equipped with a brand new FULL SIZE Day Bed. The room has a SPINNING bike rarely used in it, feel free to use AT YOUR OWN RISK* {use provided Clorox wipes to sanitize/ clean after use}. This listing is ideal for the guest visiting the city on business or couples visiting downtown, Nationwide Children's Hospital, German Village, the short North, OSU campus, the Columbus Convention Center, a concert or an event OR a quiet 'stay-cation' get away! This quaint room is on the south east side of the home. It has two large sun lit windows with one that  has the spectacular view of the beautifully landscaped  backyard. You will slumber on a brand new plush FULL SIZE daybed. You will slumber on luxury thread count linens. Right next door is the shared full bathroom. Under your feet is new soft plush carpet.  There is a SPINNING Bike in the room if you so choose to use it is at your own risk* {clean/sanatize with provided Clorox wipes after each use}. Enjoy this beautiful
host_about:
Greetings!

I enjoy music, traveling going to the theatre and spending time with my family, specifically my nieces. I am a professional Social Worker/ Criminologist. I own my own photography business and I run my $5 jewelry business out of my home.

I can't wait to meet you to share my wonderful city with you regardless of your length of stay or what brought you to Columbus you are bound to enjoy the food, shopping, parks, beautiful evolving downtown city scape and the architectural detail of the buildings and homes! 

I love aroma therapy and on any given day you can inhale the high end scents of White Barn and Bath & Body Works Candles and Wallflowers throughout my home. 

It will certainly be a pleasure to host you in my home which I love very dearly. I acquired the home in February 2015 and are consistently updating the amenities to provide a more comfortable experience for my guests. Imagine staying in a 1920 American square home with beautiful detailed woodwork, an updated kitchen with granite counter tops and top of the line stainless steel appliances, a matchless decor foyer, living room, dining room. 

:::That is just the 1st floor!:::

A beautifully landscaped backyard garden filled with amenities such as a fire pit, barbecue and beautiful lounge chairs. What I love most is when we get visits from various butterfly species, and especially the state bird the Cardinal. It really brings a smile to my face with all of the efforts, time, passion invested in the landscape garden. 
* I am open to roommates just inquire

name: THE SIELTH KING+QUEEN+FULL (3 SEPERATE ROOMS)
description: DOWNTOWN- The 3rd floor MASTER LOFT over 700 square ft of space this space can hold up to 6 people comfortably there is a queen-size bed, two sofa beds and an option for two additional queen size air mattresses. The 2ND FLOOR MASTER KING bedroom and additionally the YELLOW ROOM equipped with a Full size Day Bed & full bathroom in situated between theee two bedrooms for your private use during your stay. *EVERY GUEST GETS SLIPPERS! This listing is a combination of all of my AirBnB listings, in order to accommodate large groups that would like separate living spaces. There is a 3 bedroom listing that accommodate up to 10+ people. Please feel free to VIEW my other listing options for smaller groups, business or individual/ couple travel. Please note I do reside in the property- this listing is for 3 bedrooms in my home. You will be provided with an access code to the front door of the home. There is an alarm that I can access remotly.   You will have access to the foyer, Living Room, Dini

name: Safe, Roomy, Dog Friendly Studio w/ salt spa visit
description: Lower level studio w/kitchenette in 1927 home w/ ideal location. Booking includes 1 visit in family-owned salt spa in next block.  2 min walk from food, shops, & bus stop. Roomy enough for a small family, private enough for couples & business travelers & dog-friendly (fully refundable deposit req'd for dogs, no cats). Unofficial off-leash dog park nearby.  Low Ceiling! (height is 6'4"). Modest Kitchenette has small fridge, microwave, skillet & coffee pot.  Curtained sleeping area has queen bed. We're glad you're interested in our studio!  Please note that we've included your occupancy taxes in the quoted price.  This unique space with a locking sliding "barn-style" door offers a large living area, a curtained-off sleeping area, and a small kitchenette.  The bathroom and laundry are both outside the locked apartment door (but on the same level).  Both may be used by the family from time-to-time.  When we have friends over (typically a Friday or Saturday night), we'll want that bathroom
host_about: see other msg

name: The Guest Suite @ OSU & Short North Arts District
description: The Guest Suite is an excellent space for a weekend or a short stay, located just between the Short North Arts District and The Ohio State University!  Walk to popular High St. dining and nightlife in under 10 minutes, to OSU Medical Center in under 15 minutes, and to the Columbus Convention Center in 25.  Off-street parking may be available for $6/day - just ask.  The Guest Suite is fully private, with a dedicated outdoor entrance, but does not include access to a kitchen. The Airbnb space is set up in the front part of the first floor of a multi-unit building, in what was originally a living room and dining room, with beautiful original hardwood floors, two chandeliers, and stained glass windows.  There are other people living in the building, but the suite has a private exterior entrance and all doors can be locked from inside the suite. This listing includes private use of the front porch area and porch swing.  We do not allow parties and request that noise is kept to a minimum to
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We are a married couple in our 30s and we live in the "Short North" of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.   

Kate is from Cleveland, and Nat actually grew up in the Short North neighborhood, which has been through an incredible transformation over the last couple of decades!  Kate has also lived in North Carolina and Mississippi, and Nat spent some time in Chicago and Indianapolis - and now we are happily settled in Columbus with our dog Scout and a baby on the way!

We are both graduates of Ohio State (go bucks!) and for our day jobs, Kate is a physical therapist specializing in neurological rehabilitation and Nat is an IT project manager / handyman / stay-at-home dad.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Sleeping in the City
description: Microliving is in heart of the city and walking distance to art, theater, music, and dining.  Our location overlooks a hot entertainment district with a wall of windows allowing you to experience everything the city has to offer without leaving your cozy bed!  Take in the beauty of the Columbus Commons Holiday lighting while sipping wine in your pj's.  Enjoy the onsite dining of Hadley's Kitchen and Bar.  We welcome all, but our micro unit is best for singles, couples and business travelers! The space is a private apartment with all the amenities to enjoy your stay in the city.  The building is residential with full time property management on staff to assist for the duration of your stay.  The building is secure and safe and in a walking neighborhood. Guests have access to the common area lounge, gym, laundry, and on-site dining at Hadley's and Mikey's Late Night Slice. I will be available during their stay as well as the full time property manager.  We can assist with recommendations

name: Easton 2  ?Easton Mall Walkable. Quiet. Shopping. Relax.?
description: This spacious one bedroom is located at street level, one exit away from the airport, and across the street from Easton Town Center Mall. This cozy apartment can accommodate the single business traveler up to a family, looking for a weekend of fun. We boast a king size pillow top bed, and a sleeper sofa in the living room, and an air mattress. Complete with a washer, dryer, a 24 hour gym, and access to the outdoor pool. This huge one bedroom apartment will have you feeling right at home! This huge one bedroom apartment will have you feeling right at home! The guest will have access to a washer and dryer unit in the apartment. A 24 hour gym and also an outdoor pool within the complex.  Easton can be hectic with parking, there is always parking at our complex! Most of the interaction will be through the app or texting! This upscale apartment complex is a perfect venue for hosting. There are no lack of Ubers or Lyft's in the area! Also there is a bus stop right in front of the complex. Us
host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

name: Relaxing, Quiet, Pristine Bedroom/Private BR
description: Warm hello from my Dublin home!  Located  3 miles from I-270 and 5 miles from upscale Midwestern community with variety of restaurants- pricey to fast food options, grocery stores, Tuttle Mall, and Costco--3 miles,  Columbus --16.3 miles, my  home is in a new development with quiet, safe streets and ample on-street parking.    Extra bedrooms available with additional fee.  If 2 guests want 2 separate bedrooms, extra fee.   Ask about weekend private house rental--Fri-Mon, one time extra $50 fee. My home has ample windows which brightens up the whole house.  Upstairs master bedroom is spacious, very clean, has comfy bed (with 800 thread count cotton sheets) and 2 upholstered chairs.   Bathroom has double sink and soaking tub and shower.  Desk included for business travelers if needed.  Extra guest rooms available with full size  bed and queen size available for fee .  Whole house can be rented from Friday through Monday for extra fee.    Full access to kitchen. Washer and dryer available

name: MnB in GV
description: MnB is perfect for solo travelers/couples!  Located in the Historic German Village, this fully furnished private apt is walking distance to bars, restaurants, and just up the street from Schiller Park. Looking to explore CBus?  All it takes is a $7 Uber to get you to downtown, Convention Center, and Short North.  MnB features modern updates, wifi, 50'' flatscreen that supports most devices, and a spacious kitchen fully equipped for cooking. This first floor townhome has a living room, one bedroom, a spacious kitchen and one full bathroom all in an open floor plan.  There is an interior staircase in the building which you will not have access to but does allow other guests to access a different unit upstairs.  You will have access to a small, semi-private back yard with fire pit. Guests will have access to this unit only. We try to make the experience as private as possible for our guests.  There is keyless entry and we provide all check-in details the day of checkin for safety reasons.
host_about: Both transplants from Ohio cities, Brian and I have lived in Columbus for over a decade.  We are very active and both live and work in the German Village.  We are passionate about preserving historic homes.  We hope you enjoy our very first renovation together!

name: Lovely South Columbus/Casino Minutes Away
description: My place is close to downtown Columbus and OSU campus..

name: Olde Towne East Historical Home
description: This 100 year old property offers a unique Architecture and mixture of contemporary and old style. It features 5 bedrooms and 2.5 baths; including a Master's suite in the attic. You'll enjoy the beautiful extra spacious bedrooms with friends, family or co-workers.  The property located in a neighborhood located in the historic East Side of Columbus, Ohio nestled between Downtown, Children's hospital, Franklin Park, Old Oaks, and King-Lincoln. The property is approximately 2,300 ft with 5 bedrooms and 2.5 baths with both old and contemporary themes. When booking the entire property, you'll have access to all rooms except the basement. I most likely wouldn't be around much for socializing but would be in touch constantly if needed. Columbus Museum of Art, Franklin Park Conservatory, COSI, Ohio Expo Center-Rhodes Center, Capital Square,  Columbus State Community College, Topiary Park and more. Bus stops are on every block surrounding the property. A convenient store called Family Dollar i
host_about: Columbus, Ohio, United States

name: Entire place in Short North
description: Basic amenity place with no sofa or tv but great location for someone who needs a great location place for a cheap price.  2 bedroom place- One room has a Queen bed  and the other room has a double size blow up mattress. There is a 1/2 bath located right next to the rooms.  Paid street parking  Electronic keyless entry. A historic home built in 1880 located in short north, a lively street filled with shops, art galleries, pubs, and restaurants. The home is also walking distance to downtown and Nationwide Arena as well as OSU campus and OSU Medical Center. The first floor has a comfortable living room with a flat screen tv, wifi, Netflix, and electric fireplace. Fresh toiletries, towels, sheets, etc will be provided. There is a washing machine and dryer.  The kitchen is equipped plates cups and silverware. Also has pans for cooking. Kroger grocery store is located 2 blocks away making it easy to create a meal. Porch area can be used which has patio chairs. Due to being an older historic
host_about: I'm from Cleveland, OH and travel during work and my off days.

name: Clintonville family home
description: Come spend the holidays visiting your loved ones in Columbus in our house!  We are the proud owners of a historic Clintonville home, renovated last year with a brand new chef's kitchen, top of the line appliances (chef's 6 burner stove and double oven!) and new dining room, with French doors opening to the back deck and overlooking the garden. The house is excellent for entertaining, with a large living room and 3 well-sized bedrooms upstairs. The upstairs bath is slate and has two sinks and a full size cast-iron tub.  The master bedroom has a queen size bed and large closet and dresser.  The guest bedroom has a sofa that folds out to a very comfortable king size bed. This room also has a study opening off it.  The third bedroom has a twin bed, baby crib and all baby changing furniture and other necessities (including toys...).  We are within easy walking or driving distance to all that High Street offers, including coffee shops, boutiques, pubs, restaurants & Park Of Roses and would l

name: A Zen Art Oasis - Private Guest Room
description: Featured in Columbus Monthly, our Victorian Village Neil Avenue metropolitan home with wood floors on the first floor and classic architecture lend to the feel along with local artists artwork throughout. It is a very inviting zen space where you will feel right at home. Private zen like space with a queen size Baronet bed and night stand.  The space includes all the necessary amenities. Guests are able to let themselves in at their convenience via a smart lock. You will have access to the main house only, not the third floor attic or basement.  Guests will have high speed internet access and a flatscreen TV with basic channels, a DVD player, and AppleTV. There will be an instructional binder on connecting both inside and outside of the home. My partner Stephanie and I along with our two indoor cats, Jordan and Bella are live in hosts, but not in the way.  We are happy to communicate over Airbnb messaging or through calls and texts. We encourage guests to contact us with any questions
host_about: Lover of life and travel. I have been fortunate to travel some of the world and what I've found to be the most authentic connection is to live like the locals and Airbnb delivers. ~Namaste~

name: Bryden Road Apartment in Historic Home
description: This 2nd-floor apartment is inside historic 970 Bryden Road, a Mission Revival house, built circa 1890. The apartment is professionally cleaned between each and every stay. Free parking abounds, and it is 6 minutes to downtown destinations (including Nationwide Arena) and 12 minutes to Ohio State. Features key-code access, independent climate control, and a very large kitchen space. You will enjoy this entire 2nd floor apartment to yourself. It consists of a bedroom, bathroom and kitchen.  The style and look of the building and apartment is historic. It features original wood double-hung windows. The unit is furnished with a queen size bed, night stands, a small desk, bench, and luggage shelf, dining room table and chair set. You have access to an enclosed back stairwell, a fenced-in back yard, the basement with washer/dryer (free), and the entire apartment. We generally don't meet guests unless they request it or need our help! This apartment is located in Olde Towne East, a neighborh

name: Chic Studio in Historic Building by German Village
description: Make yourself at home at my remodeled and tastefully designed studio. Everything is brand new: upscale bathroom, modern kitchen with granite counters, professional series stainless appliances and all the cookware necessary to make a gourmet meal. name: Retro Retreat in the Short North Arts District!
description: Located in the heart of the Short North Arts District, also known as the "art and soul" of Columbus. Steps away from great coffee, hip bars, art galleries and restaurants, and a quick and easy 10 minute drive to either The Oval and Ohio State University. Full of natural light and retro charm, this one of a kind space is sure to make your stay a memorable and inspired one. Features working retro ammenities, fridge and stove, as well as secure wifi, speakers and a flat screen TV. Personal entrance to the upstairs apartment, with parking spots for two vehicles right in front. Someone will always be a short call away should any questions or needs come up during your stay.

name: Centrally located Short North retreat
description: Our place is close to the liveliest and most fun area of Columbus, the Short North! We are centrally located within easy walking distance of cafes, great restaurants, bars, downtown, the Arena District, convention center, and Goodale Park. Our place includes 1 parking spot behind the building and we're a block off high street so you have all the convenience of the area without the heavy traffic noise. You'll love our place because it's cozy, yet bright and airy with a minimalist spirit. The spare bedroom and front entry closet are off limits. The unit is in a very walkable location. The CBUS and Co-Go bicycle renting system are also within a block. There is 1 king size bed. Guests are welcome to bring an air mattress if they would like to accommodate more guests. There is a non-shedding poodle mix that lives here when the space is not being rented out.
host_about:
My fiance and I are Ohio born and raised. We love traveling, exploring new things in Columbus, and eating pizza. We've been in Columbus for about 4 years and think it's a great place to live and visit. Our place is within walking distance to a lot of attractions and some of Columbus's best eats. 

Life motto: Don't sweat the small stuff.

I am a Registered Nurse. I have worked as a traveling nurse, so I have been to many places all over the United States and have traveled all over California, Florida, and many places in between. Born and raised in Texas and Alabama, lived in Ohio for 21 years. I try to use AirBnb whenever I travel, and that's why I decided to be a host.  I even used AirBnb when my son and I traveled through Europe! We had wonderful experiences!! I believe that there are more good hearted, interesting people in the world than bad, and I want to meet them!!
I love to hike and explore the outdoors, travel to new places, and try different foods. I love my job as a nurse and taking care of people facing unfortunate events makes me appreciate my life and health. I don't want to take that for granted.
Thanks for visiting my listing. I look forward to meeting you, whoever you are. Take care of yourself:)

name: The Gallery (Short North/OSU/Downtown)
description: This 2nd-story private apt. is at the back of my circa 1880 home. This cheerful cozy aerie provides the comforts of home (kitchen, wifi, & cable TV). Its prime location in the Short North is in easy reach of OSU and DT on foot or by bus. I expect guests to read my entire listing before booking & printed manual upon arrival, so that expectations are clear, most especially about the vintage bath & housekeeping. This is my home--not a hotel. I welcome all who know how to be good house guests. The "Gallery" is a very small (300 sq. ft.), private 1-BR apartment attached to the back of my Victorian home on the second floor. The space consists of a partially furnished kitchen, bedroom with queen-sized bed, and bathroom sporting a vintage English-style bath (deep clawfoot tub fitted with a handheld shower head). It's extremely important for guests to realize that the bath setup does not allow for taking a shower standing up. The apartment gets wonderful light and has the feeling of an aerie. T
host_about: I was born in Kentucky but bred and educated mostly in Ohio. After 30+ years living in the Washington, DC, area, this single 62-year-old youngster is back in Columbus, OH, renovating an ancient house (not something I saw happening, LOL) and getting very interested in homesteading. I was drawn back primarily for family reasons, but also because of the enormous riches this amazing big little city has to offer. I couldn't live without art, music, books, or travel (after family, of course). My life motto, if I have one, is "Barn's burnt down. Now I can see the moon."

name: COMMONS STUDIO DOWNTOWN - Blanket Forts Encouraged
description: Experience the uncommon quality of Commons Studio. Located in the heart of downtown, the unique 2800 sq/ft loft space is steeped with rich, creative history. Originally a photography studio as far back as the late 1800s, many artists and prominent figures have spent time here. Today it again serves that same purpose. We are close to public transport, restaurants, theaters, nightlife, and the airport. Great for couples, solo adventurers, celebrities, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). Commons Studio is a live/ work space occupied by myself, my lady Adrianne, and Namaskar -- our tiny lion. There is absolutely nothing like it to be found in Central Ohio. By day it serves as my photography studio and I generally start booking clients by 10am during the week. Upon arrival you will enter through the wrought-iron gate at street level, continue up the stairs, and then take a stroll through the hallway (regularly curated with local art) until you reach our unit in the back of the bui
host_about: Matt Reese is a commercial photographer with a mind for entrepreneurship and innovation. Proudly based in Columbus, Ohio, Matt has quickly built a career for himself in the the Midwest. His award-winning work has been featured in several gallery exhibitions, local and national publications, and thousands of (Hidden by Airbnb) profile photos through social marketing campaigns. With a background in both Fine Art and Marketing, his approach to photography attempts to blur the lines between art and commerce. In addition to his freelance work, he co-founded and produces motive., a networking event/ filmed program dedicated to the creative community (operating as a 501c3 nonprofit organization), serves as Chief Photographer & Producer at the Commons Studio, and is an active member of both the American Society of Media Photographers and American Advertising Federation.

name: Comfy home near OSU, Dublin, Worthington
description: I'm honored you chose my home. This is my personal residence. During your stay in my entire home, I visit with friends. My home is 1,500 square feet, close to restaurants, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. You'll love the location, comfy living, cul-de-sac neighborhood, wifi, and ENJOY A LATE 12 NOON CHECK-OUT. As last minute cancellations are costly - My place is perfect for couples, families, solo adventurers, and business travelers who are committed to their booking dates. As the real estate saying goes, location location location. This property is ideally suited for people who don't mind the charm of an older home (Built 1974). The property is ideally located in between Dublin and Worthington with a quick 15 minute drive to OSU/Columbus Zoo/Downtown/Convention Center. Minutes from restaurants, entertainment and the business sectors of both communities. Simply take 315 South for a quick ride to downtown Columbus. Situated in a cul-de-sac the property enjoys a quiet, mature
host_about:
Howdy! I'm Jake. I'm originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I'm a real estate investor and by night I'm a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I've been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother's advice, "Jakey, live with NO REGRETS" (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that? And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

host_about: Having resided and worked in Central Ohio for the last 25 years, this is a place I'm truly proud to call home. I have an extensive background in home renovation, combined with a unique knowledge of our local real estate market. I made the decision to become a realtor so I could combine my knowledge of housing with my desire to work with people and help them in a meaningful way. I've been involved with traditional rental properties for years but am just now starting to dabble in Airbnb, and will say I'm very excited to interact with new guests and see all the possibilities this platform has to offer. If you are a traveler and considering making Columbus your home please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Real estate transactions can be stressful. Whether you are a first time homebuyer, or just looking to upgrade, I will work with you every step of the way to make sure your needs are met. I will utilize the best technology available, combined with an unparalleled work ethic and perseverance to help you achieve your real estate goals.

host_about: Lived in the Columbus area for 30+ years. My home is nearby the rentals, so I'm easily accessible if assistance is needed.

name: Cozy brick home in German Village
description: Our cozy brick home is situated in Historic German Village, that is centrally located near downtown and The Ohio State University.   Within walking distance to locally owned shops, bar and restaurants and Schiller Park. A quick Uber, taxi, bike or bus ride to Downtown, Brewery District, Arena District and Short North. The exposed brick gives the feel of authenticity and charm of the Village.  This one bedroom home comfortably sleeps 4 with a queen size bed and pullout sofa with a Tempurpedic mattress pad for additional comfort. The solarium spreads natural light throughout the living room and kitchen. Our home features WiFi, basic cable, two televisions, Blue Ray and DVD player. Only if you need us! This is a self check in home. German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible.
host_about: We are sisters who purchased this quaint and beautiful property for our mother, who is not quite ready to move in.  We both love to travel and explore new places and faces.

name: The Short North Barn
description: Stunning brand new carriage house featuring 2 bedrooms, 1 car garage spot & soaring 20 foot ceilings! This home is owned by a custom home builder and has too many custom features to list! Jason Wu Matte Black bathroom fixtures, Bosch appliances with induction cooking, memory foam mattresses with Hotel Collection sheets & towels to name a few. This home is for the design enthusiast and is truly unique in the Short North Arts District. 5min walk to High St., (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min walk to the Convention Center. Close to all Short North, Campus and Convention events. BBQ and patio area Either Shane or I are quick to respond and help if needed. The Short North has received national attention from Forbes, The Wall Street Journal and others. Its the people and the character of the local businesses that make it great here! You will have your own garage space, but will also be in walking distance to Nationwide Arena, Columbus Convention Center, and the Short North. Short Term Rent

Easton Towne Center is minutes away for shopping and entertainment.  Ohio State University is nearby.  A Home Away from Home. 6 I have a flexible check-in schedule of 3-7 pm EST. If you require a later check-in a $20 late check-in fee will apply. I will submit an alteration request for you to accept after check-in. Coffee, tea and water are available in the kitchen. An ironing board is also available in the listing.
host_about: I am Ohio born and raised.  I love decorating and renovating homes for others to enjoy.  I work within the local school system.

name: Lovely South Palace

Exceptional value, minutes from downtown, events, Ohio State and the conference center. We live on the other side, separate residence. Enjoy the benefits of a large home with a fenced in backyard, blocks from downtown. Inviting. Spacious. Value. In the heart of it all. We are renovating in stages. It made sense to rent out to a flexible person(s) that can appreciate the adventure we are on, and benefit from having the use of a beautiful place.  The second bedroom are two singles. Extra charge for additional guests over four. We do have a nice queen air mattress if needed for additional guests. During your stay you will have use of a fully functioning kitchen. The owner lives in the home as well which has a private entrance to the second floor from the rear of the home.  Home has recently been remodeled and yet has kept lots of the character of a home built in the 1800's. Home has recently been remodeled. The neighborhood is quiet and has easy access to a multi-purpose trail. The Roost is part of a property that we are slowly renovating. This guesthouse is small and compact, but offers everything for a comfortable stay.  The kitchen has a full-sized stove, microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher, dinnerware and utensils. A small deck with table and chairs is just outside the kitchen, making it a perfect place to enjoy a cup of coffee or glass of wine. The living area and kitchen area is open, with an alcove for a queen sized and single bed. Parking is on-street. We may or may not be available to mee
host_about: I am a teacher of high school mathematics who enjoys travel and meeting fellow travelers.

There is a full bed in the bedroom as well as a full closet and chest of drawers available for your things. In the living room, there is, arguably, the best nap couch in the world. This bathroom is completely private and will not be used by the hosts during your stay. There is one free street parking pass available in front of our home. host_about: I'm a Tennessee transplant living in Ohio. The greatest joys in my life are coffee and my precious puppy.

The street is quiet at night, close to the bars, restaurants, and shopping. Parking is behind the house and will accommodate up to 3 cars. I'm happy to have as much or as little contact as you desire. I will do my best to get back to you ASAP. I live close, so I am available to meet you or help you most of the time. My husband is an engineer and we both run an an Airbnb in the Short North Arts district of Columbus.  This was our home before the kiddos showed up!

Guests have pretty much full access to everything. name: Dublin Couch Bed

description: Whether you've come for a Buckeye game, the OSU Medical Center, a business trip, or coming to see why foodies and beer lovers are talking about Columbus, this apartment puts you in the middle of it all. You can walk to the Short North arts district (0.5 mile), OSU (less than a mile), a full-service supermarket (600 feet), and a COTA bus line with direct service to the convention center, downtown, OSU north campus and beyond (460 feet). It's urban living without the parking headache! The ground floor has a living room, dining table and kitchen. You can hang out in front of the TV on the sofa, or move the dinnerware and work at the dining table. Upstairs, there are two bedrooms (one queen bed, one twin bed) and a shared full bathroom. In the basement, there is a bedroom (queen bed) with full bathroom. The washer/dryer is next to the downstairs full bathroom. We have tried to decorate the unit so that it can be your home away from home. Hope you like it! Guests have use of the entire apar

description: Very cozy apartment centrally located. Close to downtown, shopping and restaurants. Washer and Dryer. Quiet and safe neighborhood. Within walking distance to grocery store. It's within walking distance to the grocery store, restaurants, bars, city transit, etc. Guest are welcomed to use the the space in the apartment..including the eliptical, washer and dryer. Guest can reach me by phone any time during their stay Quiet neighborhood, Nice apartment. All the rooms are spacious. Washer and dryer available for use at no extra charge. This apartment is comfortable, and Inviting. It has a lot of room. Its close to everything. The neighbor hood is quiet and close to everyrhing. name: International Scholars House near OSU.DS
description: My place is nice for anyone needing a clean, quiet, and friendly house near campus. It is ideal for graduate students, post-docs, and professors as most of my housemates are also international scholars. Everyone welcomed! The room has a comfy bed, a huge desk with plenty of roomy drawers, and two large windows with plenty of sunlight during the day. You are welcome to use the kitchen and will have your own cabinet and a space in the fridge. The kitchen is fully stocked with pots and pans and lots of cooking supplies. The basement has a washer and dryer that you are free to use. We have a large dining room, a good-sized front porch, and a back yard. The house also has two bathrooms. I live here, too. Columbus is my home town, and I'm an alum of Ohio State University, so don't hesitate to ask me about the area. I don't mean to volunteer my housemates, but they, too, are happy to answer questions. My northwest campus home is located in an established neighborhood in the university area. I
host_about: I am an OSU alum (historian) who continues to enjoy the campus area while having easy access to downtown and Clintonville. I have lived and taught abroad (Europe, Africa, and Asia) for many years. I have increasingly limited familiarity with French and German though enjoy conversing in both when I have the chance. I have a big house with housemates, mostly international graduate students, post-docs, and professors. Lastly, I love Columbus!

A decorative fireplace, 10 foot ceilings, and hardwood floors give this space a great feel. Enjoy high speed internet, and a smart TV that you can watch from the bed or the sofa. Parking is available in a parking lot behind the building. Just let us know how many cars your group will have. You'll have the apartment to yourself. The apartment comes with high spee

I dig psychology, gardening, cycling, being a gym rat, and cooking. I have volunteered at a kids camp every summer since 1999 that teaches critical thinking and a love for nature. 

I have lived in Columbus most of my life and I love it here and I love sharing it with other people.  I'm a licensed Ohio real estate sales person.

My career in the non-profit sector has let me travel all over the country. I love the Bay Area, NYC, Washington state, and the Rockies.

description: Hello and Welcome.  Located just two blocks from High Street and less than a mile from OSU and Downtown, the apartment is walking distance to the Convention Center, the North Market, restaurants, nightlife, shopping and more!  Also conveniently located near the FREE C-Bus Circulator for easy access around the city. Large 1bd/1ba luxury suite, w/ private bathroom.  The apartment contains refurbished windows, custom-built cabinetry, large kitchen with quartz counter-top and high-end appliances. The small, boutique apartment building is historic and the recent remodel has kept its rich history intact.  Enjoy a beautiful rooftop experience unlike any other in the city, complete with a fireplace, dining tables and awesome views of a popular park.  It's the perfect place to sip your morning coffee or have a workout session with the sunrise-and in the evening, share a meal under the covered pavilion or an evening cocktail under the stars. You'll also be walking distance to High Street, the hi
host_about:
I am an IT professional and I work for a large global retail organization.  I was born in Elmira, NY and raised in Troy, PA.  I have lived all over the country, including San Francisco for 16 years where I met my partner Michael of 20+ years.  We then moved to Palm Springs for six years and where we both fell in love with the desert. 
 
Michael passed away in December 2015 due to brain cancer, so I moved back to Columbus, OH for work.  I will return to the desert once I retire, but until then, Columbus is home and it's a city that happens to be growing by leaps and bounds and quite an exciting place to call home for the time being.

name: Urban Castle
description: Enjoy the entire 2nd floor (3500 sf) of this former candy factory! Close to Convention Center, Arena District, Capitol Square and Short North. Built in 1904 by The Purity Candy Company, this four story, 14,000 sf building underwent a +$1 million renovation/conversion in 2004. Your hosts, Mark and Jen, purchased the building in 2016 and live primarily on the 3rd and 4th floors. An architecture firm occupies part of the 1st floor. Easily one of the largest (and certainly most unique) residential properties in Columbus, this Urban Caste features entirely new and modern electrical, HVAC, plumbing, and windows, while maintaining the original wood floors and exposed brick. Two 75 gallon water heaters ensure as much hot water as you need. Each floor has its own HVAC unit with separate Ecobee thermostat. The 2nd floor features original industrial wood floors, tall ceilings, huge windows, and 3500 sf of open loft living space. A massive bedroom and full bath are at the east end of the floor. Th
