The carriage house is a 2nd floor, one bedroom walk-up with a queen bed and sleeper sofa (see floor plan in the pictures). The fully-equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, granite counter tops, ice maker, pots/pans, dishes, and utensils as well as a Keurig coffee machine and washer/dryer.  There is a 43" television with Roku and complimentary Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu.  A bluetooth speaker, iPhone charger, Qi wireless charger, USB outlets, bottled water, and snacks are a

name: Clintonville Spacious Basement w/ Private Entrance
description: My home is located in the heart of Clintonville on a beautiful tree-lined street. It is just north of OSU campus (2.4 miles to Ohio Stadium) and takes only a couple minutes to drive to I-71, SR315, Riverside Hospital, and about 10 min to the Schottenstein Center. It is within a short walk to the Farmer's Market, Starbucks, Whetstone Library, Park of Roses, Olentangy Trail, as well as many shops and restaurants. It is a GREAT location in a safe Columbus neighborhood! This listing is for the spacious basement with a private entrance. It includes one queen-sized bed, a dresser and closet to store your clothing, and a full private bathroom. Guests have a private entrance (with keyless entry!) to the spacious basement. Guests can easily park on the wide street (I ask that you please park in front of my house if possible, rather than in front of a neighbor's house). If you prefer to park in the driveway or in the garage for an additional fee, please make arrangements first so as not to block
host_about: I am a teacher, and I am excited about being an Airbnb host! My home is my pride and joy and I love sharing it with others. In my free time, I like to go on walks with my dog, read, bike, and travel. I also enjoy spending time with my friends and family.

name: Central Italian Village/Short North Home
description: Italian Village historic influences on a newer home located in the heart of it all.  Walking distance to all the Short North has to offer. Less than 10 minute drive to OSU campus and downtown Columbus. Spacious and comfortable home with a beautifully landscaped backyard to include fire pit and water feature. Street parking is available surrounding the house.  Easy access to public transportation available within a 5 min walk. The main level of the home is situated above street, so there are some stairs to enter the home.  Once in the home, the main level of the home is a shared space with kitchen, living room and half bath.  The lower level of the home is where the private guest room and attached bath are located.  The room has high-end amenities with soft, organic cotton sheets, and large plush cotton towels.  A small fridge and Keurig coffee maker is available in the room for your convenience. The lower level also has another living room and laundry room. Aside from your private room
host_about:
Megan and I are young entrepreneurial professionals with an adventurous outlook on life! Our weeks typically include our professional careers, taking care of our two loveable dogs, triathlons and endurance racing, great restaurants, craft beers and cocktails, movies, and friends and family.

We love international travel and can't say no to a tropical destination. We utilize Airbnb when we travel as well and love having guests.

When staying with us, we will be as interactive as you would like. We are generally extroverted and encourage conversation and building a friendship. Although we understand your time with us should also be relaxing and restful, and will ensure you have the space and privacy you need.

name: Private Room near OSU

I have housemates from around the world, including the U.S. Make yourself at home! You will have access to all common areas. You will also have  your own cabinet shelf and space in the refrigerator. The kitchen is well-stocked with cooking and dining supplies which you are welcome to use. There is also a large front porch. (Note: living room usually open, but not always.) I am from Columbus and an OSU alum, so happy to help out with any questions you may have about my city and school. My house is located on a tree-lined street in an established neighborhood near OSU. Westies is a gastro pub with in walking distance of the Carriage house and has wonderful food and craft beers. There is a traditional bar a few blocks away called Gresso's that also serves limited bar food. The COTA bus stop is right in front of the main building behind the Carriage house. (Website hidden by Airbnb) has bus schedules and fare information. There is also Uber and Lyft along   with Lime and Bird scooters all over.

name: The White Squirrel Inn
description: Welcome to the White Squirrel Inn - so named because of a white squirrel that likes to frequent our neighborhood! Nestled in the heart of Victorian Village in Columbus, Ohio, this turn-of-the-century house exudes warmth and charm from the moment you step onto the covered porch. Within walking distance of the Short North, Downtown and The Ohio State University, this highly sought after location has something for everyone. And there are 2 off-street parking spaces. We are kid-friendly and pet-friendly, but we do charge an extra $50 cleaning fee for four-legged guests. Please notify us when booking whether you are bringing an animal. There are 3 bedrooms - two with queen beds, and one with a futon. There are 1.5 baths, with a clawfoot tub/shower upstairs. There is a fenced-in backyard with a picnic table, and there are covered porches in the front and back. Smoking is allowed only on the porches and in the backyard. Parties are okay in the back yard, but please no indoor parties. Guests m

name: Clintonville Charmer Room #2
description: Hey guys, my house is super eclectic and cozy! I'm close to campus and many of the villages and districts in Columbus! The bus lines Cabs and Cotas are located one street over! Message me for more details! My house is your house, feel free to share almost all spaces with me! You guys are more than welcome to use anything in the house! I have a washer and dryer in the basement. Just be sure to clean up after yourself, such as hair in the shower drain and pushing your chairs in at the dining table! I love to interact with guests! You will usually find me during the week nights relaxing at the house, I'm open to grabbing dinner, watching movies, and chatting about where you are from and where you have been! This house is located in a charming neighborhood called "Sohud" (South of Hudson). Located only 2 miles away from the Short North and about a mile from Campus! The best way to travel Columbus will either be bus which stops are located just around the corner from me or Uber or Lyft

Guests have access to the bedroom and bathroom on the 2nd floor and the kitchen, dining room and living room on the first floor. Make yourselves at home! Please remember that this is my home and as such the pantry is off limits as are my personal groceries in the refrigerator. The kitchen is available for your use, but please clean up. I am home mainly on the weekends, but I am available by phone. I will be happy to assist you in any way I can. If I am out of town, my co-host will be there to help. The condo is close to the highways and there is plenty of street parking. Getting around without a car is easy to achieve via services like Lyft, Uber and COTA. The room is on the 2nd floor so for guests who need handicap accessibility,

host_about:
Corporate Housing Systems provides premium temporary housing for families relocating to a new city, the travelling business person or anyone looking for a comfortable, affordable alternative to a short or long-term hotel stay.

We understand that being away from your home and family can be challenging, difficult and exhausting. We're dedicated to making you feel as comfortable as possible while you call our place "home."

OFFICE HOURS: MONDAY-FRIDAY FROM 8:30AM TO 5:00PM. WE ARE CLOSED ON WEEKENDS. 
We are available 24/7 for emergencies! Just a phone call away.

name: Perfect Short North Location - Steps to High St!
description: Our historic brick cottage is in the absolute BEST location in Columbus. Built in the 1880's it is a 2 bedroom, 1 bath located just steps off High Street. Our apartment has 7 beds, an updated kitchen and bathroom, and a brand new washer/dryer. It scores a 92 on WalkScore = Walkers Paradise! You are steps from all of the action. Less than a mile south from OSU Campus, less than a mile from the Columbus Convention Center, and steps from all of the best bars and restaurants Columbus has to offer! Our place is completely updated and all furnishings are brand new! There are brand new memory foam mattresses and all new furniture throughout the place. The place has 2 large bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The master bedroom has two queen beds. The second bedroom on the second floor has a queen bed ,twin bed, and air mattress. The living room has a sleeper sofa as well as an air mattress. There is 1 full bath as washer/dryer located on the first floor of the place. The kitchen appliances, washer/dryer
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

Central to Ohio State, Arena District Events, and downtown Columbus. A two-story home which offers a fantastic location and modern interior. What makes this house unique? host_about:
Megan and I are young entrepreneurial professionals with an adventurous outlook on life! Our weeks typically include our professional careers, taking care of our two loveable dogs, triathlons and endurance racing, great restaurants, craft beers and cocktails, movies, and friends and family.

We love international travel and can't say no to a tropical destination. We utilize Airbnb when we travel as well and love having guests.

When staying with us, we will be as interactive as you would like. We are generally extroverted and encourage conversation and building a friendship. Although we understand your time with us should also be relaxing and restful, and will ensure you have the space and privacy you need.

The guest room has a comfortable queen-sized bed, a microwave and mini fridge located in the room for your private use; a wall mounted shelf with a 150+ channel HD Cable TV and free wifi access. Across the hall is your full bathroom.  The shared living room sofa is an IKEA model that converts to a queen bed, if needed. Welcome to our house. We are a married interracial couple and small business owners, with a licensed general contracting business.  We are non-smokers, we have no children and no pets.  Our home is a renovation in progress?.95% complete.  It's a cozy 3-bedroom, 2 bath home.  The 2nd bedroom is your private space along with the bathroom across the hall.  The master suite and the third bedroom (our home office) are not available for guest use.  We live on site and will be available to answer any additiona

Corporate professional, into health and fitness, gardening, self improvement and diy home improvement projects  Non smoker. Loves to travel and experience diverse cultures.  Loves food and cooking. The windows are insulated and the carpet new. Most residents are international scholars. We span a wide range of nationalities and ages, so this is a pretty diverse household. People attending conferences and concerts or on short-term intern assignments have also found my home both a pleasant and convenient place to stay. Welcome to those visiting loved-ones in nearby hospitals. (Both OSU and Riverside Hospitals are close.) The idea is to make yourself at home. Feel free to use the dining room, basement with laundry room, two full baths, and a fully-stocked kitchen. Everyone has his/her own cabinet in the kitchen and  a space in the refrigerator. Free street parking or off-street parking if necessary (i.e. OSU game day) in a nice neighborhood near Ohio state campus. Walking distance (~15 minutes) to Ohio stadium and the rest of campus. Our home is a 2-story house in Old North Columbus near Ohio State campus. Enjoy a private bedroom with lock, and shared access to the entire rest of the house except the host's bedroom. The private bedroom features a lofted full bed with a very comfortable memory foam mattress. The room also features two comfortable armchairs, and a table that can function as a workspace, or private dining area for guests. The room gets great natural light and has beautiful hardwood floors, as does the rest of the house. If a
host_about:
Environmental science graduate student at Ohio State University.  I love to travel, and especially love interesting cities and mountains/woods and the outdoors.  

I'm a laid back guy who loves music, board games, the outdoors, good food, and getting to know people.

name: German Village area home
description: German Village area, close to downtown, Schiller Park. Nationwide Children's Hospital and restaurants.

name: Beautiful Contemporary Room,Private Bath,Dublin,OH
description: Come for the experience and enjoy the rooms. Spacious, clean , well furnished, cozy private room in the heart of Dublin, OH.  Close to many cool restaurants, Turtle crossing mall, I-270. The apartment is very clean, safe, and friendly. Less than 20 mins from The Short North, Columbus Airport, Columbus Zoo, and Ohio Stadium. It is definitely a home away from home. Perfect for couples, or solo traveler. (Returning guest, please note my change of location.) The closets feature plenty of storage space, and some even have enough space for a dresser. Nine-foot ceilings add to the dramatic charm. Special pleasures include your own washer and dryer, and a fireplace that turns on with the click of a button.  -Crown Molding -Energy Efficient Vinyl Windows -Individual Entrances -Lake & Garden Views * -Large Closets -Lavishly Landscaped Grounds -Private Patio Bathroom, Kitchen (washer/Dryer), living room (fire place), dining room, outside patio, and garage. Depend on time of day and days of the we
host_about:
10 years honorably discharged US Navy Vet. Born in Jamaica, grew up and attended high school in South Florida. Attended and graduated college with degree in Psychology and Business. Currently working in the Information Technology Field. I am very neat, clean and organized. Don't like drama and confrontation. Like the simple life.

I was fortunate to travel to more that 25 countries and numerous international cities. My favorite countries to visit were Singapore, Hong Kong, Bermuda, Dubai and Canes. Yes, there was the most scary countries I visited were Haifa Israel, Manama Bahrain, Alexandra Egypt and Kingston Jamaica. Most memorable country I lived in was Manama Bahrain. 

There are not many things I don't like with the exception of lizards. Most noted likes are electronic gadgets, riding motor cycles, watching track and field, playing soccer and various sports, cooking authentic Caribbean cuisines and learning about other cultures.

Let me see, 5 things I can't (well choose not to) live with out... Ummmm, 1. Amazon Alexa, yes she is like my living companion. 2. Electronic gadgets - have to have the man toys. 3. The internet - would be lost without being connected to the rest of the world. 4. Music and 5. Good food.

I love the quiet times to sit back and watch a tear jerker movie and at the same time can appreciate war, drama and military movies.

I am very open minded and love to welcome guest of all diversity. But if I had to chose the ideal guest, it would be... Someone honest, neat, clean, open minded about life, food, music of other cultures. Quiet but not shy to having intellectually stimulating conversations. Someone that can appreciate quiet times, wine, jazz and movies. I don't care too much for loud and rambunctious character.

A simple motto I live by... What you do for yourself will die with you, the good you do for others, the positive impact you make on another person's life will live long after you are gone.

name: Duncan Street Haven - Remodeled 2 Bedroom
description: Welcome to our clean & cheerful condo home!  We just freshly remodeled and decorated, and hope you'll enjoy relaxing here during your time in Columbus!  Our home is conveniently located in historic Old North Columbus, less than 1 mile (5 minute drive) from OSU and less than 10 minutes from the Convention Center and downtown. Our home has 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths and can comfortably sleep 5 to 6 guests. Our home was built in 1920 and is one half of a duplex in the historic Old North neighborhood of Columbus.  The home sits just 2 blocks from great restaurants, shopping, and entertainment on High Street. The home is fully furnished and equipped for a comfortable stay: KITCHEN - Microwave, appliances, dishes, and utensils are provided. LIVING ROOM - Tastefully furnished with a comfortable sofa (sleeps 1), television, Wifi, and Firestick.  Queen air mattress is also provided. BATHROOMS - Our home features a half-bath on the first floor and a full bath on the second floor.  Towels and toile

name: Peaceful Room off I-71 @ I-270
description: Our home is located in a peaceful neighborhood ~ at the end of a peaceful court. It is good for solo adventurers and business travelers.  Close to I-71 and I-270 North. Just 15 min from Polaris, Easton & OSU, 20 min to the airport, 10 min to Ohio State Fairgrounds. Located on the 2nd floor, this little room is peaceful, inviting, and comfortable.  Enjoy the use of your own Coffee machine ~ Choice of teas ~ Your own space Air Conditioner Guests can enjoy sitting on the front porch. I give my guests space but am available when needed Our neighborhood is great for walking and our location is close to shopping or restaurants with just a short drive. Our home is close to I 71 and I 270. Public Transportation is accessible just a few blocks away, 0.4 miles to be exact. There are bike riding routes near the house and you can "Uber" to downtown. The Greyhound Station is 9.9 miles away.
host_about: My husband is from Japan, an amateur radio lover, sushi chef, and excellent cook. I grew up in a tiny village of the French Alps, enjoy the outdoor and everything to do with personal growth. I keep learning and reaching out to expend my friendship circle all the while taking care of my family and grandchildren.

name: Franklin Park Hideaway 1
description: Stay in the heart of Columbus, surrounded by beautiful parks. name: Enjoy my master guest bedroom
description: This is a shared listing with me in my home. Close to restaurants, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. You'll love my place because of the location, comfy living, cul-de-sac neighborhood, wifi, and there's a grill in the fenced backyard. As last minute cancellations are costly - My place is perfect for couples, families, solo adventurers, and business travelers who are committed to their booking dates. I welcome all guests from various backgrounds - I make a great conversationalist. As the real estate saying goes, location location location. The property is ideally located in between Dublin and Worthington. Minutes from restaurants, entertainment and the business sectors of both communities. Simply take 315 South for a quick ride to downtown Columbus. Situated in a cul-de-sac the property enjoys a quiet, mature neighborhood. The property is a three level split with seven steps upstairs or six steps down to the lower level of the home. When you enter the property you will be in t
host_about:
Howdy! I'm Jake. I'm originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I'm a real estate investor and by night I'm a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I've been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother's advice, "Jakey, live with NO REGRETS" (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that? And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

name: Cozy Brewery District Apartment
description: Wood-floored one-bedroom apartment in Columbus's Brewery District. Just a short walk from downtown and Columbus's German Village neighborhood. Close proximity to food, bars, and business. Apartment above Brewery District commercial building. Will have access to kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom, and laundry room. The Brewery District is one of Columbus's four historic districts. Located just south of downtown and nestled between German Village and the Scioto River, the Brewery District is full of low-key bars and has free shuttle service to Columbus's Short North Arts District. Free street parking is available. Buses are plentiful and bike share access is convenient with bike docks two blocks away from the apartment. A free downtown circulator starts a block north of the apartment and goes all the way up to the Short North. Walking distance to German Village, downtown, and surrounded by Brewery District restaurants.
host_about: I'm a young professional based out of Columbus, Ohio. I love exploring new cities.

host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

Art at 185 is bigger than it looks and is quite spacious. Currently the studio showcases original art created by Columbus artists. Founded in 2007, Open Door Art Studio empowers artists with disabilities to work with professional creative mentors in an environment of mutual respect and creative freedom. I also have several of my father's hand crafted birdhouses for sale and my sister's handmade clutch purses. You have a free parking space in a private parking lot behind the building, security cameras in the hallways of the building and on the outside of the building for extra safety, and the parking lot is accessible from a fire escape out the back door of the
host_about:
During college, I spent two years on the road as a musician, stayed at hostels and couchsurfed all around the US and Europe. Throughout my travels, I founded a few businesses and non-profits and made Columbus my base. I'm also currently a Senior Management Consultant at Kalypso. I travel internationally for technology projects, speak at conferences on music industry, and help smart cities initiatives find cultural impact.

As a traveler, I continue to seek out beautiful AirBnB's in cities all around the world. As a host, I enjoy creating the kind of environment that I would want to have for myself in Columbus. It's a place where travelers and professionals can stay in comfort, equipped with constantly refreshed amenities. It's in the heart of downtown, near all of the excitement of bars, theaters, restaurants, and conferences, yet still cozy and peaceful.

Our house offers 2 bedrooms (each with memory foam queen beds), 1 bathroom, full kitchen, and 2 private parking spots in the heart of Victorian Village. The common space has a futon and a sofa with a pull out queen size bed. We also offer an air mattress for your convenience. The house has been newly furnished with all new memory foam mattresses and furnishings. The living room has a brand new 50 inch tv with cable. The dining room has a large table with seating for 6. You are able to access the entire place. We are hands-
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

I'm happy to chat and help out as necessary, though I do work from home when in the country, and often travel. My people will help when I cannot, or I can be available by text. My neighborhood is a quiet, working class area with all kinds of people from many backgrounds. Very close to Easton Town Center and also not far from 270, 71, or 15 minutes to downtown by the back streets. Lots of interesting ethnic grocery stores and restaurants around. You can park in the driveway or on the street in front of the house. My street gets very little traffic besides garbage trucks and those who live on the street. Please watch out for kids and pets as my neighbors are used to low traffic and often walk in the street
host_about: I run a Fair Trade non-profit organization as well as my own Fair Trade wholesale organization. I travel frequently and for the specific purpose of trying to make the world a little better.

description: Clean and peaceful stay on the south side of Columbus. Our place is a 10 minute drive to downtown, a 5 minute walk to the bus station on South Parsons Ave. (Bus line #8 will take you downtown in 15 minutes), a 5 minute drive to Scioto Downs raceway, and a 2 minute drive to the I-270 outerbelt. It takes about 15-20 minutes to get to or from Columbus John Glenn International Airport. We have free high-speed internet and a washer and a dryer for a small fee. Our place isn't in downtown, but it is close and easily-accessible to all the major attractions of Columbus. Further, our proximity to the highway allows you to travel around the central Ohio area rather easily. We live in a peaceful and safe neighborhood on the south side conveniently (2-5 minutes) to shopping and restaurants. Within walking distance is a nice recreation center and park which has a half mile track. Our three bedroom bi-level house is home to my wife, son, and I as well as one roommate. As our AirBnB guest, you are we

You'll love the proximity to downtown, comfy living, in an up and coming neighborhood that is being gentrified. The property is ideally located 5 minutes from COSI and Downtown Columbus - only a 8 minute drive to the Convention Center. Minutes from restaurants, entertainment and the business sectors. Simply take either Town or Broad Street East for a quick 5 minute ride to downtown Columbus. Situated in Franklinton, the property enjoys a quiet, mature neighborhood. The property is a two story side by side twin double (aka duplex). The adjacent unit is occupied by a tenant.  Guests may use the middle room upstairs (king sized bed), front bedroom (f
host_about:
Howdy! I'm Jake. I'm originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I'm a real estate investor and by night I'm a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I've been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother's advice, "Jakey, live with NO REGRETS" (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that? And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

name: Feels like home near Easton, airport & downtown
description: We are located 1.5 miles from Easton Town Center, 15 minutes from downtown, 20 minutes from OSU campus and close to many restaurants!  Our neighborhood is kid friendly and dog friendly!   We do have a dog, Lola.  She is VERY friendly!   We are a smoke free home, so please, no smoking inside :-) The space we rent out is our full finished basement.    You will have your own bathroom, although it is located on the main level, but it is all yours! We enjoy meeting new people and welcome all! Close to shopping at Easton Town Center, 15 minutes from downtown On site laundry, private bathroom, "living room", 4K TV, Keurig coffee maker, wine glasses and opener We work from home, therefore, we are easily accessible! We love meeting new people! Our neighborhood is kid and pet friendly.  We are the kind of neighbors where we know each other and look out for one another. We don't have small children, however, we have friends that do and stay with us often. We added a tire swing from the tree in ou
host_about:
We have a door!! We have added a sliding door in the space for more privacy!  We listen to our guests and we heard that some would have liked there to be a little more privacy...we heard you. Thank you for the feedback! For our future guests, we hope you are pleased with our addition and it provides you with better privacy!

My husband and I love to travel and meet new people.  As we are new to Airbnb, we are fantastic hosts!  We are the home everyone wants to gather in!  Our friends with children, well, the children so enjoy hanging out with us...without their parents! 

We promise we will treat you like our own friends and family!

Thank you for trusting us with your stay!

name: Lovely Vintage Clintonville House Near High Street
description: This delightful 2-story house was built in 1900 and is conveniently located about a block east of High Street and 1 mile north of OSU (a 3-minute drive or a 20-minute walk). It has a large shady ravine-facing back yard and has a gravel driveway parking area suitable for 2 cars.  It's a short walk to numerous restaurants, bars, two supermarkets, a CVS, a post office, and the High Street bus lines. The house has a Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, Bath, and Laundry on the first floor, and a large Bedroom on the second floor with a queen-size bed.  There is a second bedroom on the second floor, with a set of twin beds, that is available for an additional fee upon request.   The Living Room and Dining Room have knotty pine floors, and the Bedrooms are carpeted. The Bathroom is off the Dining Room, at the bottom of the steps to the Bedrooms.  The steps to the second floor are somewhat steep, but they are carpeted and there is a solid handrail. The kitchen is nicely-equipped with dishes, si
host_about: I have lived in Columbus off and on since coming here to attend Ohio State University in the 60's.  I have a degree in Architecture from OSU, but my real interest has always been in renovations. I have a son who lives in San Francisco and I love to visit there several times a year.  My husband and I have 3 grandchildren - one in California and two in Michigan.  I recently retired from OSU after working there for 18 years.

name: Modern Luxury Condo w/Parking - Downtown Columbus
description: Charming luxury brownstone in heart of Downtown Columbus, steps to dining, groceries, Capitol, Arena District, Convention Center, Short North, Discovery District. Private entrance & patio, wood floors, granite & stainless steel. Modern furnishings,  sleeper sofa. Beautiful kitchen, gas range. Luxury bathroom. Private bedroom, W/D, reserved parking, fast Wi-Fi, cable TV. 30-day minimum (Submit Inquiry or see other listings for shorter). STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES / EVENTS, NO PETS. Historic style, new construction. Brownstone-type condominium development w/residential tree-lined streets. Quiet classic entry w/wrought iron-enclosed patio. Spacious living room with comfortable sofa & 2 lounge chairs. Work space with modern desk. Eat-in kitchen peninsula bar. Flat screen TV with digital HD cable TV service. Very high speed (100mbps) wired and Wi-Fi internet. Private bedroom w/queen bed, direct access to bathroom, and walk-in closet. Full size combo W/D off bedroom near priva
host_about: I'm a Realtor from Columbus, OH specialize in urban condominium sales and rentals. I'm also an AirBnB Superhost with 8+ AirBnB's under management.

name: Wilson Ave Flat Upper
description: Our company specializes in developing premium housing in developing neighborhoods. We love working with abandoned structures and turning them into artwork. We do as many homes in a localized area as possible to create a positive footprint that has real neighborhood impact. This unit is my personal unit in a building that has two units. It has been completely remodeled, with high efficiency HVAC, windows, appliances and flooring. We design for the urban dweller, with quick downtown access. This top floor unit is bright and airy. Lots of windows provide sunshine during the day. Everything has been touched from lighting to flooring. We have taken special care to create a homelike environment. The unit is well heated and cooled with ceiling vents, providing comfort. All appliances and fixtures are new. The desk workspace is private and enable more than one person to work comfortably. Whether you want to stay in and watch netflix, or go out and enjoy what Columbus has to offer, this unit is
host_about: I am a developer who has a passion for creating new urban experiences in areas that are developing and close to the core of what's happening in the city.  Equally I love to travel, and spend 6 to 7 months a year traveling both within the USA and throughout the world.  I take my job with me and enjoy the benefits of experiencing new living environments while working a job I love!  I look forward to sharing my developed properties with the Short Stay community.

name: Micro Studio Chic
description: Our Micro Studio Chic is in the heart of the city and walking distance to art, theater, music and dining.  This sleek studio overlooks a hot entertainment district but still feels secluded and private.  Take in a concert or a class at The Columbus Commons and enjoy the onsite dining of Hadley's Kitchen and Bar.  We welcome all but our micro unit is best for singles, couples, and business travelers! This is a Micro Studio in a  fully occupied residential building.  Please be considerate of the residents. Guests can access the microgym on the second floor. Amanda and  I are in the office Monday through Friday 9-5.  We don't mind helping after hours but please be considerate of our privacy and ask all of your questions prior to your stay.   The self check in instructions are listed on the site and are very thorough. This is an entertainment district of Columbus.  There will be activity on the streets but the building is secure and quiet.  There are lots of places within walking distance.

description: This home sits in a quiet neighborhood on a cul-de-sac lot and has a large fenced in back yard with concrete patio. It is located only 12 miles/15 minutes from the Columbus Convention Center and only 11 miles/17 minutes from the Ohio State Expo Center and State Fair (info from mapping system). No smoking in the house please. You can feel free to smoke outdoors, but please dispose of cigarette butts in outside trash after assuring that embers are extinguished. 5 minutes from Great Southern Shopping Center which has many fast food and sit down restaurants. 5 minutes from (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes from Allegiant Airport. within 10 minutes of recreation center. You may call me(Sherri) at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) you may text or call. This home has wifi, NetFlix, and a 50 mile antenna (more channels than basic cable). City of Columbus Short Rental License # (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
host_about: I am a wife, mother of 3, grandmother of 12. I am a Pastor of a ministry serving persons with developmental diabilities as well as a Professional Counselor.

Exit outside the room also Quite neighborhood about 10 mins from downtown Columbus. 15 mins to The Ohio State University. 5 mins from Hollywood Casino. Kitchen backyard both baths I live onsite.  Can be available as needed. If at work im available by text Quiet neighborhood. Large park within walking distance of the house. Uber/Lyft, city bus stop within a block. There are other rooms listed on Airbnb. You could be sharing the house with other guest. Who are staying also

description: Fully furnished 2BR suite conveniently located to provide a short walk to downtown, Short North & Victorian Village. Cable and Wifi are included. Host provides coffee, tea & assorted refreshments. Light snacks are also provided. Toiletries are available. Laundry supplies included if you need to make a mid-trip wash. Take a scenic walk through Victorian Village as you head to High Street to explore all the local shops or head to the Arena District before the game or concert for the nightlife! This is a 2 br apartment suite within a small community. It is not a separate home. Access to a 24 hour fitness center and Coffee bar that opens at 6am. Seasonal outdoor Pool, outdoor gas fire pit We give you your space. Please email or text if you have any concerns. Available by email, text or phone until 10 pm. Close to downtown. Short walk to Nationwide Arena, Goodale Park, Huntington Park and Express Live. Close enough to walk or use Uber or Lyft. Self Check in coming soon. Ask host for availab

My favorite shows are NCIS, Swat, anything cooking & Hallmark/Lifetime. So excited for Hallmark Christmas!! I have three horses and love everything horse related! 
I am new to Hosting, please reach out if you have any questions or concerns!

name: Private Room outside of Columbus, OHIO
description: This is a beautiful home.  I decided to open my doors to visitors needing a place to stay when visiting Columbus. You must have a license from outside of Columbus. Located about 10-15 miles from downtown Columbus.  Guests are welcomed to have breakfast (7am-9am) & dinner (6pm - 8pm). I will prepare and present for the daily menu. The room is has a bed, closet space to hang clothes, the Suite has a tv you can connect to laptop to watch movies or watch TV in The Main Family room downstairs. As a guest you will have access to the WiFi, kitchen,  family room,  patio,  backyard,  and bedroom. You will be allowed to print documents if needed,  but not access to the home-office. This is a quiet neighborhood located in the North East suburbs of Columbus, Ohio.  Takes approximately 20 minutes to get to downtown Columbus to High Street and Spring Street. There is a bus route stop at Broad Street and Waggoner road in Reynoldsburg,  OH that leads straight to downtown Columbus.
host_about:
I am an African American Male, originally from Chicago,  Illinois with a large family of 2 aunts & 6 uncles that primarily live in Chicago,  but one uncle lives n in New Orleans.  Moved to northwest Maryland outside of Baltimore, MD and went to a public high school,  Fort Hill High School before transferring and graduating from Bishop Walsh Catholic High School.  Attending Penn State University playing football & basketball with a degree in Sports Management / Sports Law with a double minor in Legal Environment of Business and Exercise & Sports Science.  I determined to be Jerry Maguire (my favorite movie)  before the movie came out.  I've been a high school football coach,  NCAA football coach,  NFL Coach for 10 years,  and a sports agent for football & basketball.  I was formerly a Director of Marketing & Business Development  a medium-sized Law Firm in Philadelphia,  as well as Marketing Consultant for 3 BIG Four Accounting Firms at Grant Thornton,  KPMG, and Deloitte. I've run my own business 20+ years as a sports agent,  business manager, and marketing consultant for small businesses. 

I have two beautiful boys ages 9 & 6 years old (very active). My mother is a retired Vice President of a University and my brother is also a former NCAA football player from Penn State & Indiana University of Pennsylvania. My Italian family I grew up with,  owns the best bakery in Maryland at Caporales Bakery for over 100 years with the best Pepperoni Rolls and Pizza Rolls on the world (just saying).

I have been cooking since I was 10 years old and love to cook.  I am a self-titled  handyman, DIY type of guy,  but I know my limitations and can't take on everything but I try first to assess before delegating. I don't drink alcohol,  smoke, no drugs.  I goto weekly networking events for business and to socialize. I haven't been to all 50 states as of yet (that's a goal), but I have been overseas several times.

Towels and sheets provided. You will have kitchen and laundry access. There is central AC, a ceiling fan, and a gas fireplace in the living room. Yo

We both love traveling and experiencing culture!

What separates myself from other Airbnb host is that I turn OCD into a positive attribute ensuring that the house is sanitized and clean before every arrival and departure. If you're new to Airbnb and are skeptical as many people should be, let me ease your thoughts by says steaming the bed and vacuuming the floors is a routine that's performed after every guest to ensure there's no bed bugs or other pests that cause headaches. Come to join me in my warm and cozy German Village home. This space is beautiful and great for those coming to visit Columbus. Street parking is available

I like the out doors, camping, gardening, fishing, sewing, crafting and biking. i am a family person, married for 40 years, with three adult children. I am a people person, and enjoy meeting different people.

Kitchenette, private bath and entrance.  Easy access to all things Columbus. 12x29 private suite.  Kitchenette with full size refrigerator, microwave, toaster, sink, dishes, board games.  Living room space with 8 foot couch and 2 chairs, coffee table, 40 inch flat screen, cable, DVD/CD player, movies, and Wii.  Sleeping area with full size bed, closet, desk and chair. host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

name: Colorful Restored Red Brick with Backyard Patio
description: Indulge in comfort and style at this tastefully appointed residence. The home features a mid-century inspired aesthetic, wood finishes throughout, contrasting textures and motifs, a covered front porch, and an outdoor BBQ dining area.

Eating space! 1.5 baths. Walk across the street to Cosecha for amazing Mexican! Enjoy breakfast across the street at the wonderful Fox in the Snow or Drunch! Grab a drink less than 1 min away at Little Rock. Minutes to walk to the Short North! You will have the entire home to yourself. This fabulous 2 bedroom 1.5 bathroom has a King Bed and Queen Bed along with an air mattress. You will be able to your laundry on site! Walking distance to so many great restaurants and bars! You will have access to the whole home! You can walk to Convention Center, Short North or across the street to eat!

description: This cozy bungalow is awaiting your arrival! Guests can enjoy the amenities of being home while staying in Columbus.  This is the perfect location to get everywhere in Columbus! It is minutes from Ohio State, Otterbein, Capital, Nationwide Arena, Clippers Stadium, The Shottenstein Center, Express Live, the Ohio State Fairgrounds, Mapfre Stadium, Ohio And Palace Theaters, Easton Shopping Center and Polaris mall. Guest can use Uber, Lyft and Central Ohio Transit Authority during their stay. You have full availability to the house. I do have storage in the basement, so please do not disturb. Although the house doesn't have central air conditioning, it does have window units and ceiling fans to keep you cool! I'm available via text whenever you need me. I do put my phone on silence at bedtime  The neighborhood is east of Clintonville and it is very quiet. My neighbors haven't changed in the 15 years I've owned this home, so feel free to strike up a conversation! The bike path is close! The

description: Immersed in the historical charm of Victorian Village, our carriage house will give you the feel of a "tiny home" in the city. The friendly atmosphere of the community is evident as neighbors walk their dogs, jog, and cycle throughout the day. This stand alone home is in very close proximity to The Ohio State University, Arena District, and Goodale Park, and is a short trek to High Street and the Short North.  It is ideal for solo, couples, or small families who enjoy a cozy, intimate setting. Our tiny house is located in the heart of great destinations in our city. It is .5 mile from Goodale Park, about 1 mile from The Ohio State University, 1.1 mile from the Short North, 1.3 miles from the Arena District, 1.3 miles from the Greater Columbus Convention Center, and 2.2 miles to our downtown.  Our house is a cozy, intimate 600 sq. feet. It has a small, front yard with a sidewalk that leads to the house from the street. The private, keypad entry will welcome you into the living room comp
host_about: OSU Buckeye alumni born and raised in Cbus, we are a husband and wife team who  enjoy people and cultures, traveling, and pursuing our dreams together. Columbus has so much to offer, and we desire to share our city and make our guests feel at home while in our abode.

We are always available to answer questions by text or email Walking distance to OSU and Short North! It's an easy walk to many activities in our area but Uber or Lyft are great choices as well. We are

name: Historic 1920's Craftsman Home. Perfect location!
description: This historic 1920's Craftsman home is perfectly situated in the charming Clintonville Neighborhood. Walkable to the best Farmers Market in Columbus, local coffee shops, charming boutiques and nationally known restaurants (Little Eater, Hot Chicken Takeover, and Jeni's to name a few!). While a vibrant walkable community is right outside your door, you can easily get away from the hustle and bustle. Whestone Park and the Olentangy trail is just a stroll down the street in the other direction. Our 1920's home has an interesting history. In 1924, this bungalow style house was known as the Sherman Private School which was an extension of the Morrey School of Music. Now, it serves as a warm home to a music loving family. While the home has been updated, the original charm has been preserved. A multitude of windows in every room let natural light in making this home feel even more warm and spacious. As a guest here, you will have access to the entire house. Our neighborhood is a quiet, warm
host_about: I am from Columbus, Ohio and love to travel to new cities in the US or abroad.

name: Urban Retreat
description: Cozy urban retreat. Walk to record stores, award winning pizza, hipster tacos, movie theater, live music venues, Columbus Crew, local breweries, hookah and more. On several bus lines, one mile north of OSU, close to local parks, bike path and running trails. Grocery stores within walking distance, including farmer's market style shop with incredible salad bar and prepared foods. Easy access to Interstate 71 and 315. 5 miles from John Glenn Airport.  Record player with curated vinyl on site. You get the whole house! Huge outdoor deck, porch swing, claw foot tub, full kitchen with everything you need to whip up a quick breakfast or full dinner. Everything on site. We live a few blocks away. We will be around if you need us. In the heart of Olde North Columbus. Walk to bars, live music venues, arcade, restaurants, food trucks, record stores, etc. Easy access to city and campus busses.  On street parking. Easy access to highways. City bikes nearby.
host_about: I'm a big fan of swimming, riding my vintage vespa whenever the weather cooperates and am a massive music fan. I've got a partner of 16 years, two kids, two cats and two fish. I love to travel, hike, work in the yard and paint.

name: House on High Street

Our place is a dorm shared with 4 people, but with room for plenty more! We often have 4 more people come over every other weekend, so there is plenty of room for everyone. We have two spare mattresses and a couch for you to sleep on. With a kitchen, two bathrooms, and workspace, we offer the essentials for any living space for a very affordable price. Additionally, you will get to relive the good ol' college days for free! Let's live it up together! Any appliances including but not limited to the fridge, the kitchen, either of our two bathrooms and the common room. We just ask that our personal belongings remain untouched. Great area! Because it is on campus, there is never any danger, and it is right by High Street and near one of the most interesting districts in Columbus, the Short North.

name: Near OSU, Downtown, Short North, and more!

Guests have access to the entire home, except the basement. The home is private and totally yours, but I am always available for questions or help - just send me a message! Quick minutes to everything you'd

description: Artist's studio/house in a working-class neighborhood. Downstairs is work/gallery space, upstairs are bedrooms and a sitting room. You can expect a comfy (but not fancy) stay in our quiet spare bedroom with queen-size bed.  Shared bath & kitchen with a tea and coffee cart for your convenience.  This space is great for students, artists, or low-maintenance travelers who want to have an adventure and travel economically. And your stay helps fund exhibition and community outreach programs! NOTE: Because we do not have air-conditioning (nor believe its environmentally conscientiousness to ever have it) we block availability after early July. If you are still interested in a stay of 3 or more days during that time frame, feel free to inquire. On street parking. Guests have private room shared bathroom, sitting room, and kitchen, with coffee maker. I tend to be a quiet person when home, and you will have plenty of privacy. But I am available when needed or if you'd like to know more about ne
host_about: Hi there, I'm an artist and community activist here in the Franklinton neighborhood of Columbus where I live. I also travel to other places mainly for artist residencies and exhibitions.

This is a great apartment for access to events at Ohio State, Express Live, Nationwide Arena, the Convention Center, or Goodale Park. Inside work at a desk by the window, or sprawl on the couch or queen bed and watch TV. The whole unit has 10 foot ceilings, three ceiling fans, and hardwood floors giving this space a great feel.  The living room sofa converts to a double bed.  Enjoy high speed internet, and a smart TV that you can watch from the sofa.  The coffee table folds open to provide a surface perfect for eating at or working on a laptop while sitting on the sofa.  Ikea nailed this one. Newly upgraded kitchen includes a full sized refrigerator, gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, and bar height four top table.  The kitchen has the basics in terms of pots, pants, a wine opener, pizza cutter, ice cream scoop, and little things like that. There's a was
host_about:
I dig psychology, gardening, cycling, being a gym rat, and cooking. I have volunteered at a kids camp every summer since 1999 that teaches critical thinking and a love for nature. 

I have lived in Columbus most of my life and I love it here and I love sharing it with other people.  I'm a licensed Ohio real estate sales person.

My career in the non-profit sector has let me travel all over the country. I love the Bay Area, NYC, Washington state, and the Rockies.

The 27" TV has basic cable, Netflix and Amazon Prime accounts for your in-room viewing pleasure. Awesome! My townhouse was built in 1910. I am still updating it, but it has lots of quaint little touches -- fireplaces, wood floors, etc. The bathroom is not large but has all the basics. The bedroom is very spacious and on the second floor with the other 2 bedrooms and the full bath. You can sit on the small patio in back or on the front porch. You will have access to the lovely antique-filled diningroom or the eat-in kitchen. You are welcome to do up to two loads of laundry per day for $2 a load. I will pr
host_about: I am a fun-loving, travel-loving woman who enjoys history, reading, hiking, camping and hosting my Airbnb guests.

description: Cozy Cottage located in the heart of Clintonville. Small but quaint three bedroom home with fenced yard, deck, patio, grill and fire pit too. We welcome all including your small dogs.  Centrally located and walking distance to many local restaurants and shops. Convenient commute  to OSU, Short North, Downtown and Columbus Airport. There is a park not even a block away.  Enjoy many amenities including WIFI, Cable, Hulu and Netflix. Those looking to unplug can enjoy the beautiful outdoor space. Our home is centrally located with access to several freeways to get where you need to be. We are also walking distance to local fair and lots of fun.  There are French doors leading to the outdoor space. Which includes a deck, gas grill and a fire pit for your enjoyment.  Recently remodeled with a farmhouse feel. Updates throughout, enjoy a warm and welcoming environment. We do live in our home but won't be there while you are here for your stay. Therefore, you can enjoy all the comforts and emen

We are just a couple of empty nesters and recent grandparents. Born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. We love our city and raised our kids here too.  There is just so much to do.

We love kayaking and walks in the local parks. We enjoy "DIY"ing in many forms. Our home is one of our biggest and most recent projects. We hope you enjoy it! 

We live in our home but we wont be in it while you are here. However, you will enjoy all the comforts of a home away from home.

The complete kitchen area includes a huge refrigerator, cooking utensils, spice rack, and many other amenities along with an absolutely stunning granite slab. Our bathroom is simply splendid. It boasts a unique over-sized shower which provides two shower
host_about:
I grew up in Columbus, Ohio and then moved to Milan, Italy for four years in order to study at Bocconi University. 

I'm generally either at a computer or doing an outside activity such as bicycling, camping, hiking, or rock climbing. Laid back and will make a black humor joke out of literally anything, if allowed. Big fan of many types of music (especially niche dance music), I even dabble in production.

Internationally-friendly. American-friendly. Michiganders tolerated.

Hello! 

My name is Christy, I'm your Host.  My daughter Emily & I are renting out this home to weary travelers. 
We understand how expensive hotels can be. This is a cozy place to rest your head.

We look forward to meeting you!

description: Our condo offers 3 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, full kitchen, 1 off-street parking spot, and W/D in Victorian Village/Short North very close to High Street! Close enough to enjoy everything on High Street but just far enough to enjoy the neighborhood feel of Victorian Village! You are less than a mile south from OSU Campus, less than a mile north from the Columbus Convention Center, and 1/4 mile from all of the best bars and restaurants in town! All brand new mattresses and furnishings! Our condo offers 3 bedrooms (5 memory foam queen beds), 1.5 bathrooms, full kitchen, and washer/dryer in the heart of Victorian Village. The common space has a futon and a sofa with a pull out queen size bed. We also offer an air mattress for your convenience. The house has been newly furnished with all new memory foam mattresses and furnishings. The living room has a brand new TV with cable. You will have access to the entire place! We are hands-off hosts but are available as needed! Victorian Village, whi
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

name: The White Brick Studio @ OSU & Short North
description: Freshly updated studio apartment with a private outside entrance, located just between the Short North and The Ohio State University!  Walk to popular High St. dining and nightlife in under 10 minutes, to OSU Medical Center in under 15 minutes, to Columbus Convention Center in 25.  New queen memory foam mattress in 2018!  Off-street parking may be available for $6 per day - just ask.  Studio is in a vintage building on a quiet residential street. This is a recently updated studio apartment (no door between the kitchen and bedroom) on the first floor of a vintage building on a quiet street, right between OSU and the popular Short North Arts District - walk to campus, shops, night life, and restaurants!  The building was originally a single family house, like many buildings in the area - because of this, the interior walls are not soundproof and we request that noise is kept to a minimum after 9pm to respect our neighbors. ***** The bedroom has a new queen foam mattress and can sleep two
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We are a married couple in our 30s and we live in the "Short North" of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.   

Kate is from Cleveland, and Nat actually grew up in the Short North neighborhood, which has been through an incredible transformation over the last couple of decades!  Kate has also lived in North Carolina and Mississippi, and Nat spent some time in Chicago and Indianapolis - and now we are happily settled in Columbus with our dog Scout and a baby on the way!

We are both graduates of Ohio State (go bucks!) and for our day jobs, Kate is a physical therapist specializing in neurological rehabilitation and Nat is an IT project manager / handyman / stay-at-home dad.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Cozy Family Friendly Two Bedroom Condo
description: My family friendly condo is located in a quiet, safe area of southwest Columbus and offers convenient freeway access.  Close to restaurants, grocery stores, movie theater and Hollywood Casino. Convenient nearby freeway access  15 min.* to OSU area, downtown, The Schottenstein, Nationwide Arena, Short North and the Tuttle Mall. 20-30 min's*. to John Glenn airport depending on traffic. Guest will enjoy a comfortable stay in my 1260 sq. ft., two bedroom, two full bath  condo with attached screened patio. Condo Community's Fitness Center and outdoor pool (available seasonally). I encourage guest to contact me with any questions via text or email.
host_about: Misty Linn brings over 15 years of marketing and sales experience and has been working as a licensed Realtor since 2006. Misty has had leadership roles throughout her real estate career including serving on the Agent Leadership Counsel and has assisted with the training and development of other agents. When the opportunity to expand her career and to assist other agents to do the same presented itself at Core Ohio Realty Advisors, Misty wanted to be a part of it. She now serves as the Vice President, overseeing residential sales. Misty has added a Licensed Real Estate Agent to her team and continues to actively work with clients buying and selling real estate. She was recently named in the top 20 Licensed Realtors in sales for her region was is part of the Leadership Academy for the Columbus Board of Realtors.

name: SOHUD Treetop Townhouse (C)
description: Entire Private 1BR Townhouse.  Very convenient to OSU, and minutes to downtown, Short North, Convention Center, Expo Center, and Airport. This is a second and third floor walk up and you will need to be able to navigate two flights of stairs.  Your bathroom and Kitchen will be on the 2nd floor, while your living area and bedroom are on the 3rd floor. You will have access to the entire private apartment, one parking spot behind the building, and common areas like the entryway, porch, and garden. I live in another unit of this building and am generally available if needed, but I prefer to give my guests as much as privacy as they would prefer. This centrally located walking neighborhood is a mix of students, families, and young professionals. The CABS bus service has a stop right around the corner at Tompkins and Summit streets on the 'East Residential' line.  This a free bus service provided by Ohio State University and can be used to easily get back and forth to Campus. Also right arou

description: Charming 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home in the historical Brewery District. Located on a corner lot with a fenced in yard with off street parking.  Across the street is a public park and multiple restaurants within walking distance.  This home offers 1700 sq. ft of newly renovated living space. This home has been furnished with high-end furnishings and antiques.  Kitchen: Stainless steel appliances  marble, and soapstone countertops Island with three stools Gas stove with double ovens  living room: Large section couch  55" 4G curved tv  Cable TV dining room: 10' live edge table with six chairs  Antique cabinet  Bedrooms: Master bedroom has a TV, king size bed, and a private attached bathroom  Second bedroom has a queen size bed Third bedroom has queen size pullout sofa bed The second and third bedrooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom with a bathtub   The outdoor space has a brick patio with table, chairs, and two recliners. Entire house Guests have access to the first and second floors. S
host_about:
I moved back to Ohio about four years ago to pursue my horse showing passion. 
Before jumping back into horse showing, I began a house hunt. 
After a year of trying to find the perfect house, I bought this little fixer upper. I spent the following year renovating it from top to bottom. It was a great challenge which created many memories. I am very proud of the home my family and I created which is why I am excited to share it with you all while I am off showing horses.

name: Your Home Away From Home
description: The complex is inside a golf course, the Little Turtle Golf Club, Westerville, Ohio. A great place for a weekend getaway and weekday business trips, it is 1.2 miles from the Kroger grocery store and 3.4 miles from the Easton Mall, AMC movie theater and various restaurants. Guests use the entire home and any available parking space on the complex. The host is available for questions by phone, text or email. The neighborhood atmosphere is great: nice, quiet and chirping birds in the surrounding golf greens and natural plants and trees. In warm Spring, Summer and Fall weather, you can see golf carts and people busy playing golf in the golf greens around the neighborhood. The best way to get around is by a car rental, a Lyft or a Uber.

host_about:
What's up fellow Airbnbers!

Thanks for checking out my profile! Hopefully, I get to connect with you further through hosting you at one of my properties or staying as your guest on Airbnb. 

For me, Airbnb fulfills two of my life's biggest passions; technology and real estate. 

My first stay in an Airbnb came in 2013 while I was on a trip with my roommate to Spain.  Since then I have always been enthusiastic about experiencing unique homes in foreign places through the Airbnb platform. It wasn't until 2017, that I opened up my first Airbnb and I now wish I hadn't waited so long!! 

I've been investing in real estate since 2008 when I house hacked my way to my first investment property. Since that first deal, I have done dozens of real estate investments, from campus rentals to fix and flips. All along the way, I have looked at ways technology could help me invest.   As a certified millennial and real estate investor, it doesn't get much better then Airbnb.  

Here is a little more about me:

I was born and raised in Akron, Ohio, went to The Ohio State University and lived in Ohio for the first 26 years of my life. So I guess you might say I am a good 'ol midwestern boy but with one caveat, I inherited the traveling gene from my parents. It is hard keeping up with those two, they have visited all 50 states and are now retirees traveling the world. 

In 2013, on a surprisingly sunny February day in Columbus, OH, while dressed in head to toe denim for a charity bar crawl, I met my now wife, Danica (see, Ohio is for lovers ;-). Together we decided to move to California and then Arizona where we currently reside.  

Today, I fulfill my desire for technology as a Technical Project Manager while expanding my experience as a remote real estate investor. 

My other interests include:

- Competitive sports (mostly basketball).
- Exercise (but only so I can keep up with my wife).
- Experiencing new things, especially food (yes, I am a foodie).
- Hanging out with friends and family.

As I head into my 30's I am looking forward to growing my presence on Airbnb. I am excited for the experiences that I will have and the people I will meet as both a host and a guest.

name: Artistic Olde Towne East Efficiency Apartment
description: A charming, freshly-redone efficiency apartment with antique charm and modern conveniences.   Off-street parking, a refrigerator, microwave, and coffeemaker, and a private entrance.  Elegant bathroom with mosaic floor & large shower. Located in the historic Olde Towne East neighborhood, an eclectic neighborhood of artists, historic mansions.  Dining & nightlife opportunities are just a short walk away, or the downtown is an easy $5-10 Uber ride away. You'll have your own space with a private entrance, but I live in the same building, and will be available if needed.  I'll usually be there to say hi when you check in, but the door has a keypad lock to let yourself into the space. The space is private, but the building is from the turn of the century & shared, so you may hear footfalls, creaking, or the neighbors going about their day.
host_about: A professional artist & full-time oil-painter, I've lived in Japan, Italy, and Sweden.

There is a 55" TV in the main room, and two bedrooms have 49" TV's, all have smart-capabilities with access to Hulu & Netflix. It has a gas range so you can make yourself a nice home-cooked meal. There are plenty of restaurants that are close if you decide you don't want to cook. Please read previous reviews. One thing to note, you will need to be able to climb stairs to the second floor. It is located above the garage on the second floor.  It has its own entrance with keypad. Just knock on our back door even if you just want to say "hello". Our neighborhood is a work in progress.  Many are like us and bought their homes to redo. We ar
host_about:
My husband and I moved to Columbus from NJ to be with our grandchildren a few years ago.  We bought our house as a rehab and have been working on it since.  This is a new experience for us but we have enjoyed it.

We are both originally from the Midwest, my husband was born in Kansas and grew up in Illinois.  I was born and grew up in Michigan.  We lived in Colorado for 13 years before moving to NJ and have loved all the places we have lived.  

We have travelled to many parts of the world (Mexico, Israel, Philippines, Korea, Europe) and enjoyed the different cultures as well as made many new friends.  I think this is one of the reasons we love Columbus.  There are so many different cultures here as well as their cuisines which I love to try. We find Columbus offers many of the experiences of a larger city but love the smaller size.

It sits back from the street allowing for ample parking and clear passage to and from the road. It is a 5 mile drive to downtown, 5 mile direct commute to the airport, and minutes away from convenient stores, restaurants, suburbs, and many of Columbus' popular venues. Our home is a 1000 sq ft ranch with an open layout in which the living room, dining room, and kitchen are closely shared spaces. The bathroom and bedrooms are separated from that space by a short hallway for privacy. The front yard and particularly the backyard offer ample areas for light recreation and relaxation. So I guess you might say I am a good 'ol midwestern boy but with one caveat, I inherited the traveling gene from my parents. It is hard keeping up with those two, they have visited all 50 states and are now retirees traveling the world. 

In 2013, on a surprisingly sunny February day in Columbus, OH, while dressed in head to toe denim for a charity bar crawl, I met my now wife, Danica (see, Ohio is for lovers ;-). Together we decided to move to California and then Arizona where we currently reside.  

Today, I fulfill my desire for technology as a Technical Project Manager while expanding my experience as a remote real estate investor. 

My other interests include:

- Competitive sports (mostly basketball).
- Exercise (but only so I can keep up with my wife).
- Experiencing new things, especially food (yes, I am a foodie).
- Hanging out with friends and family.

As I head into my 30's I am looking forward to growing my presence on Airbnb. I am excited for the experiences that I will have and the people I will meet as both a host and a guest.

name: The Pine House - 3br Home, Central to City and OSU

We are located just blocks from the best restaurants, grocery stores, and shops Clintonville has to offer.  Read on to learn more? Our 3 bedroom/1 bath home is family/group friendly. host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

host_about: Hi, I'm Tommy!  I met my wife Errin here in Columbus, OH.  We're proud to call this our home.  We enjoy a wide range of activities that Columbus has to offer.  Including riding our bikes on one of the many scenic bike paths offered around town; going to a Clippers or Blue Jackets game, Ohio State University football tailgating; grabbing a bite to eat at a Cameron Mitchell Restaurant; and my wife loves to shop at Easton Town Center and Tanger Outlets. I love a good book.  I spend my Saturday mornings on my front porch with a book in hand and a cup of coffee.  My favorite travel destination is Washington DC because I love history and could spend hours at the Museum.  My wife prefers the sunshine, warm sand, and the smell of the ocean. We hope that you choose our home during your stay.  We have put a lot of careful thought into the details to make it a home away from home whether you're a business traveler or in town for pleasure.

host_about: My husband and I spend 10 months each year in Cambodia, working with Cambodians and a multi-national team, running a mission hospital. We came in 2002 with our 4 children who are all grown now. I am an artist/ art teacher/ and non-profit development worker and Tim is a medical doctor, and the director of the hospital. Our work takes to many interesting places, but home base is Ohio, where our kids reside at this time. We love good coffee and quiet places to rest, read, reflect and walk. host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We are a married couple in our 30s and we live in the "Short North" of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.   

Kate is from Cleveland, and Nat actually grew up in the Short North neighborhood, which has been through an incredible transformation over the last couple of decades!  Kate has also lived in North Carolina and Mississippi, and Nat spent some time in Chicago and Indianapolis - and now we are happily settled in Columbus with our dog Scout and a baby on the way!

We are both graduates of Ohio State (go bucks!) and for our day jobs, Kate is a physical therapist specializing in neurological rehabilitation and Nat is an IT project manager / handyman / stay-at-home dad.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: The Olde Towne Duplex
description: 1900 Victorian Style Home in the up and coming neighborhood of Olde Towne East. Approximately 1 mile from downtown Columbus puts you close to the action. 2 beds, 1 bath, living room with couch and tv, full kitchen, back yard, and private rear parking. Not the Hilton. Entire place is yours. I live in the other unit of the duplex and can interact as much or little as you like. At the beginning of this century, people chose to live in Olde Towne East for social status. Today, the residents choose to live here for the unique styling of the houses, their appreciation of the diverse community, and the convenience to everything Columbus has to offer. Olde Towne East is located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio. It is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods. Some homes as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles including Italianate, Queen Anne and Victorian. Olde Towne East is a pedestrian-friendly neighborhood in a grid layout. host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

name: Guest Room #2 at Willis Park
description: A clean, quiet and comfortable place to call home while visiting Columbus, Ohio. Your stay includes a private bedroom, clothes hangers and rack, a queen bed with four pillows, Wifi, shared full-bath, fresh linens and towels. A Keurig coffee maker with a variety of coffees as well as an electric hot water kettle and an assortment of teas are provided in the kitchen.  Our home is 20 minutes drive from OSU, 17 minutes drive to the Convention Center and 16 minutes drive from the Airport. We have a large dining room table (seats 8) that offers our guests a little extra space if needed. Our living room is a cozy place to sit with a book and watch the birds at our feeders. In the kitchen we offer the use of a Kuerig coffee machine with assorted hot beverages and a little space in our refrigerator as well as use of stove, cookware, utensils and dishes as needed. As our guest(s), enjoy the privacy of your bedroom and share a bathroom but we are also happy to share our living room and dining roo
