Brand new build in the heart of the Franklinton arts district with a stunning view of the downtown skyline.  Just a 13 minute drive from CMH and 8 minute drive from the Short North and OSU. This studio apartment includes a 43" smart TV with built in Roku and HD cable, wifi, washer and dryer and mini kitchen with convection microwave oven and cooktop.  The kitchen has everything you need to make and enjoy a meal.  There is a smart lock for self entry/check-in. 1 block - BrewDog 1 block - Rehab Tavern 1 block - Idea Foundry 2 blocks - Land-Grant Brewery 3 blocks - Strongwater Food and Spirits 2.6 miles - Convention Center 5 miles - Short North 5 miles - OSU 6 miles - MAPFRE Stadium This space comes with one off-street parking space in a covered, open carport. We are close to the freeway, which is a 10 minute drive to OSU or downtown (depending on traffic). It is a very international neighborhood with easy access to a variety of restaurants and grocery stores. You will have full access to the living room, kitchen, and backyard. We are open to guests doing laundry, but would prefer to operate the washer/dryer ourselves. Our backyard is fenced in, which is perfect for dogs. Smoking is allowed outside only, but we prefer to not host to chain smokers. Smoking tobacco inside home is prohibited and guests will be charged a $60 fine if he/she chooses to do so. If you have an event at the Convention Center, this place is perfect. It's less than a block away-an easy one minute walk. My condo is 447 sq. ft. The perfect size. It's situated in the heart of the Short North Arts District, overlooking High Street. Parking Options - there is a large parking garage one block north at Russell and High + plenty of on-street parking with meters available. It can be noisy on Friday and Saturday nights (you're in the heart of the city, after-all). It's a third floor walk up. name: Judge's Mansion Antique Modern Apartment
description: Located in the historical Judge's Mansion in Olde Towne East, this spacious guest room is located on the 3rd floor of the Mansion with views of downtown. Your private suite includes a bedroom, living room, kitchen, and bath. There's plenty of open space to spread out or share with a travel companion. Tastefully designed and thoughtfully laid out to create a balance of comfort and thought provoking, Instagram-able, photo ready space for you to enjoy during your stay in Columbus. Judge's Mansion was built for Judge Edmond Bothwell Dillon in the late 1890s in historic Old Towne East. We are pleased to present a modern lodging experience in its original design boasting of large windows, tall ceilings, and Victorian character. This large apartment comes equipped with a small kitchen, high speed internet, and all the accommodations to work or relax comfortably. Guest have access to their private room as well as any of the public common areas both inside and out. Please be respectful of our o
host_about:
Located in Olde Towne East, Columbus, Ohio, we are the premier Guest House of the Near East Side (Olde Towne East, Franklin Park, King Lincoln, Woodland Park) offering six apartments and two queen en suites.  In operation since 2015, we host over 1000 guests a year. Will you consider being one?  

Connect with us @judgesmansion @thejudgesmansion

Stay for a night or three, shoot on location here, or meet up with friends.  #belonghere #judgesmansion

Olde Towne East is one of the best neighborhoods in Columbus, and is the oldest area in Columbus, currently undergoing rapid revitalization. The neighborhood has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles as a result of its history. Some homes have been restored and others remain untouched as reminders of eras that have gone before. Our street and surrounding streets are some of the safest blocks in Columbus! Just check out crime heat maps online, g@@gle map view or search, and learn a little bit more about the history of the community!

My house is located in a corner lot of a cul-de-sac located with a big, well groomed back yard. Guests are welcome to the majority of the house.  The only areas that are off limits are my bedroom, the upstairs office, the garage, and the basement. I will be available in most cases, however, keep to myself. The neighborhood is about a mile off of the Georgesville Road exit off 270.  It is very easy to get downtown from the house.  The ext is only a few miles south of I-70. By booking a room with us, you will have a private room (13' x 13') with a full/queen size bed, a 50" flat screen TV and access to our WiFi.  You will share a common bath located off our second floor foyer and be able to use our kitchen for filtered water, coffee and to store your left overs from dining out. We also will allow access to our large outdoor hot tub, steam shower and enjoying the various common spaces to relax, including our wonderful enclosed and secure backyard and fantastic front porch swing with the view of the park and lake in front of our home. Judge's Mansion was built for Judge Edmond Bothwell Dillon in the late 1890s in historic Old Towne East. We are pleased to present a modern lodging experience in its original design, featuring large windows, tall ceilings, and Victorian character. This large apartment comes equipped with a small kitchen, high speed internet, and all the accommodations to work or relax comfortably. Although we are not a luxury hotel, we try our best to keep our apartments cozy and comfortable for you! We hope yo
host_about:
Located in Olde Towne East, Columbus, Ohio, we are the premier Guest House of the Near East Side (Olde Towne East, Franklin Park, King Lincoln, Woodland Park) offering six apartments and two queen en suites.  In operation since 2015, we host over 1000 guests a year. Will you consider being one?  

Connect with us @judgesmansion @thejudgesmansion

Stay for a night or three, shoot on location here, or meet up with friends.  #belonghere #judgesmansion

Olde Towne East is one of the best neighborhoods in Columbus, and is the oldest area in Columbus, currently undergoing rapid revitalization. The neighborhood has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles as a result of its history. Some homes have been restored and others remain untouched as reminders of eras that have gone before. Our street and surrounding streets are some of the safest blocks in Columbus! Just check out crime heat maps online, g@@gle map view or search, and learn a little bit more about the history of the community!

name: Clintonville Loft
description: The Clintonville loft provides a simple, comfortable,  light-filled space to nurture the weary traveler.  Everything you need and nothing you don't to make your visit to Columbus a pleasure.  Located just off High St. the loft provides easy walkable access to No.2  COTA bus line (OSU campus, Short North, Downtown) restaurants, bars, eclectic shopping, yoga studios, and a weekend farmer's market. Perfect for couples. Whetstone Park in Clintonville is a Columbus landmark. The Park includes bike trails, baseball fields and tennis courts, a pond, ravine, library and recreation facility, as well as the beautiful 13 acres (53,000 m2) Park of Roses. In June, the Park of Roses hosts its annual "Rose Festival." During summer months concerts featuring many of Columbus' brass bands are held every Sunday evening at the Park's gazebo.  Whetstone Park also hosts an annual Fourth of July fireworks display for the Clintonville community, perhaps the largest in Columbus aside from the downtown display,
host_about:
Welcome!   I take great pride in maintaining the cleanliness and comfort of my listings. They are all managed and maintained by my kids and me. I am a single mother, curator, and artist working to make my family, my city, and your stay the best it can be.  Don't hesitate to reach out to me for tips on where to go and what to do. I've got the inside scoop on kid-friendly family activities as well as off the beaten track cultural events.  

Also, I'm a virgo, so you know my house is CLEAN!

xoxo
Agnes

name: Italian Village Apt- Prime Location!!
description: Stunning new modern apartment located in the heart of Italian Village, steps from High Street and the Short North!  This newly built property has 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, and 1 Car garage + 1 driveway space. Enjoy unrestricted views of downtown from the rooftop patio complete with an interior wet bar! Walking distance to Columbus' main attractions, several great restaurants, bars and coffee shops. This is a fantastic location central to Ohio State, Arena District and Downtown Columbus!NO PARTY'S Newly built/modern Italian Village property featuring: Central air, new floors, plush carpet, stainless steel appliances, granite waterfall countertops, washer/dryer, 3 large screen TVs with cable, 10ft ceilings, floor to ceiling windows and an open floor plan. 3rd floor - Master bedroom with queen bed, TV, walk in closet, full bathroom with double sinks, washer/dryer, large shower  Rooftop patio and interior wet bar 2nd floor -  Open floor plan living space and kitchen, couch, large TV. Bedroo

name: Judge's Mansion: Mid-Century Modern Suite
description: Located in the historical Judge's Mansion in Olde Towne East, the Mid-Century Modern Suite is open, bright, and located on the 2nd floor of the mansion with views of downtown.  This room is a studio with a mini fridge and en-suite private bathroom. Plenty of open space to spread out or share with a travel companion. Tastefully designed and thoughtfully laid out to create a balance of comfort and thought provoking, Instagram-able, photo ready space for you to enjoy during your stay in Columbus. Judge's Mansion was built for Judge Edmond Bothwell Dillon in the late 1890s in historic Old Towne East. We are pleased to present a modern lodging experience in its original design boasting of large windows, tall ceilings, and Victorian character. This large apartment comes equipped with a small kitchen, high speed internet, and all the accommodations to work or relax comfortably. Located in Olde Towne East, Columbus, Ohio, we are the premier Guest House of the Near East Side (Olde Towne East, Franklin Park, King Lincoln, Woodland Park) offering six apartments and two queen en suites.  In operation since 2015, we host over 1000 guests a year. Will you consider being one?  

Connect with us @judgesmansion @thejudgesmansion

Stay for a night or three, shoot on location here, or meet up with friends.  #belonghere #judgesmansion

Olde Towne East is one of the best neighborhoods in Columbus, and is the oldest area in Columbus, currently undergoing rapid revitalization. The neighborhood has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles as a result of its history. Some homes have been restored and others remain untouched as reminders of eras that have gone before. Our street and surrounding streets are some of the safest blocks in Columbus! Just check out crime heat maps online, g@@gle map view or search, and learn a little bit more about the history of the community!

name: Luxury Two Bedroom Apartment In Gahanna, Oh
description: Clean, cosy and  modern luxury 2bed/2bath apartment unit perfectly situated  within 1 mile of shopping area and restaurants, and 10 minutes drive from the Easton mall or  the airport.  There is dryer & washer in unit and Plenty of parking space.  The neighborhood is quiet and it's great for outdoor runs or taking a walk.  My place is perfect for a couples, traveling professionals, students and tourists. Coffee and water provide. Guests are welcome to use kitchen, dinning room & living room area. Free wifi available. I enjoy meeting and hosting Airbnb guests... and I hope to see you soon  :-). Martha The neighborhood  is upscale & quite.  Some Great Restaurants Near By:  - First

Laundry on site (in the basement, shared). Perfect for guests attending conferences in town, OSU football games, or just exploring the city! Pets allowed. Book with us today!

name: The Clintonville Red House
description: Cozy and clean Clintonville House in wonderful central location!  Walking distance to High Street, shops, restaurants, and bus routes.  Easy access to 71 and 315.   A quick drive, uber or bus ride from campus, downtown and the airport.   Are you a runner or biker?  Hit the Olentangy River trail in under 10 minutes.  Enjoy access to the entire house, which sleeps 6 adults comfortably + a sofa bed and a futon.   We also have a pack and play available if needed. Traveling for work or with family can be tough.  This house is fully equipped for comfort and functionality with a work space, and high speed internet, dining table that seats 6-7, large screen TV, and everything you need to travel for work, pleasure and with family including a fully stocked kitchen as well as toys, pack and play, infant swing, high chair, toys and a stroller available on request. You have access to the entire house, front porch and yard, including the basement with a washer dryer and clothes line. The house is al
host_about: I'm a working mother, and an avid traveler.   I've been around the world alone and with my family and try and channel those experiences into making The Red House into the best possible air bnb for groups and families that are traveling for any reason!

name: A Real Bnb in Cbus!
description: We live 10 miles from The Ohio State University campus,  2.5 miles from Easton Town Center,  5 miles from Polaris Fashion Place! Uptown Westerville is a cute town that is a few miles up the road with great shops, places to eat, and places to enjoy a nice cup of coffee and good vibes. Parks and bikes trail on the Alum Creek Trail right outside of neighborhood. Queen size air mattress available upon request
host_about: I love to travel, experience different cultures, and make unforgettable memories with friends!

name: Bright & Airy Victorian (Website hidden by Airbnb)
description: Located in Victorian Village/Short North - Walkable or Short Ride to Nationwide Arena, OSU Campus & Convention Center.  Great place for a group of friends, family or co-workers! You can comfortably enjoy a night in or take a walk to any of the fantastic local food, art, and shopping spots in the Short North and downtown.  And after some fun, get a full night's rest in one of our 5 memory foam queen beds. Spacious, modern townhouse in the heart of historic Victorian Village/Short North. Perfect location just steps from the action but settled in a quaint neighborhood. GREAT for a relaxing night in or home-base for a night on the town. Couples, families with kids & groups welcome.  The house has three floors. Outside, there's a front porch & cozy fenced-in back yard. On the first floor, there's a front sitting room, interior living room with a 43" HD TV & a fully-equipped kitchen with breakfast nook that seats four.   The second floor has a full bath & two bedrooms, one with 2 queen beds
host_about:
I'm an Ohio University Alumn, mom of two kids & one dog, wife of one husband, oldest sibling of three and Columbus native. 

I lived in this home for about 10 years and absolutely loved it. We moved to the burbs after I got pregnant with our second child but couldn't bring ourselves let go of this place. So many fun times and connections have been made here, and I hope it continues throughout the years with you and your friends and family.

Everyone who has lived in Columbus and even those who reluctantly move here know there's something special about this place, and Victorian Village is in the heart of it all. It has many of the perks of large city and closely-connected small town, and I want everyone who comes here to have easy access to all it has to offer. 

Through work and fun, I've had the privilege to travel throughout the U.S. and abroad. My favorites include Colorado, San Francisco, Red River Gorge in KY, Ghana, NYC and most recently, Holbox, Mexico. But as much as I love to travel, I love to be home and always feel anxious leaving it. Airbnb has been a dream come true for me because staying a home is much more comfortable  than a hotel, and it's a much better way to get to know the area. 

To respect your privacy & comfort, I'm a hands-off host, but I'm also more than happy to help with anything at anytime. I know the area well and am here for you.

name: Private Townhouse in SOHUD (B)
description: Entire Private 1BR Townhouse.  Very convenient to OSU, and minutes to downtown, Short North, Convention Center, Expo Center, and Airport. This is a private second floor walk up Apartment You will have access to the entire private apartment (1) parking space behind the building I live in another unit of this building and am generally available if needed, but I prefer to give my guests as much as privacy as they would prefer. This centrally located walking neighborhood is a mix of students, families, and young professionals. The CABS bus service has a stop right around the corner at Tompkins and Summit streets on the 'East Residential' line.  This a free bus service provided by Ohio State University and can be used to easily get back and forth to Campus. Also right around the corner at Hudson and Summit streets you can catch COTA's #4 bus with service connecting you to Clintonville, Italian Village, the Short North, and Downtown Columbus.

A heavily engineered back deck flows directly from the house. You will bond with nature while living with all the amenities of a contemporary home. A great place for dinners, special occasions, business meetings, and yoga. As you sit on the deck enjoying the outdoors you will see a diversity of birds as you are perched directly over the park. name: Olde Town Brick Beauty
description: The house is an old Victorian style home. All hardwood floors throughout with ornate fireplaces in almost every room. The kitchen and the bathroom were both remodeled in the last year. The home is fully stocked and furnished. The bedrooms boast a king size Tempurpedic memory foam mattress, a queen size Sealy pillow top mattress and a twin bunk bed. The living room provides a pull-out sofa couch and flat screen smart TV. The home was built in 1890 and still holds a lot of its original character. Who is this property a great fit for? - Groups of 2 or more (small groups welcome too). - Guests looking to be in central Columbus. - Guests looking to be near Children's or OSU hospital. Who is the property not the best fit for? - Large groups of 9 or more adults. - Guests that can not climb stairs. - Guests that want to play loud music, party at the property and/or socialize outside of the property after 11 pm. THE HOUSE: The property is a two-story home situated in the unique Old Towne East n
host_about:
What's up fellow Airbnbers!

Thanks for checking out my profile! Hopefully, I get to connect with you further through hosting you at one of my properties or staying as your guest on Airbnb. 

For me, Airbnb fulfills two of my life's biggest passions; technology and real estate. 

My first stay in an Airbnb came in 2013 while I was on a trip with my roommate to Spain.  Since then I have always been enthusiastic about experiencing unique homes in foreign places through the Airbnb platform. It wasn't until 2017, that I opened up my first Airbnb and I now wish I hadn't waited so long!! 

I've been investing in real estate since 2008 when I house hacked my way to my first investment property. Since that first deal, I have done dozens of real estate investments, from campus rentals to fix and flips. All along the way, I have looked at ways technology could help me invest.   As a certified millennial and real estate investor, it doesn't get much better then Airbnb.  

Here is a little more about me:

I was born and raised in Akron, Ohio, went to The Ohio State University and lived in Ohio for the first 26 years of my life. So I guess you might say I am a good 'ol midwestern boy but with one caveat, I inherited the traveling gene from my parents. It is hard keeping up with those two, they have visited all 50 states and are now retirees traveling the world. 

In 2013, on a surprisingly sunny February day in Columbus, OH, while dressed in head to toe denim for a charity bar crawl, I met my now wife, Danica (see, Ohio is for lovers ;-). Together we decided to move to California and then Arizona where we currently reside.  

Today, I fulfill my desire for technology as a Technical Project Manager while expanding my experience as a remote real estate investor. 

My other interests include:

- Competitive sports (mostly basketball).
- Exercise (but only so I can keep up with my wife).
- Experiencing new things, especially food (yes, I am a foodie).
- Hanging out with friends and family.

As I head into my 30's I am looking forward to growing my presence on Airbnb. I am excited for the experiences that I will have and the people I will meet as both a host and a guest.

name: Cozy Room in Cottage - Heart of German Village!
description: Located in picturesque German Village (just south of downtown Columbus) your room is in a fully renovated cottage that was built by German settlers in 1860.  Careful steps have been taken to update the cottage while maintaining its original character and coziness.   Spend an afternoon strolling the brick streets and dipping into a local establishment.  Many highly regarded coffee shops, restaurants, and parks are in the neighborhood.  Downtown is a mile away and OSU is an easy five mile drive. Your room is on the second floor of the cottage.  During your stay, you will be the only one occupying the floor.  Your room is equipped with a queen sized bed, private seating area, and smart TV (Netflix and Amazon Prime available).  In addition, your room has a Keurig for early morning coffee and tea.  Adjacent to your room, you will find a full bath with dual vanity.  Although the bathroom is shared, I will only use it to shower (otherwise, I will not be on your floor of the cottage).  Should
host_about:
Hi!

I am naturally a "people" person and enjoy meeting new people.  I understand that many, including myself, take pride in their home, therefore, I am very respectful of your space.  As I am a very clean and neat person, that quality will be extended during my stay.

If you have any questions prior to my stay, please feel free to let me know. I look forward to meeting you!

We are a short walk to Historic German Village. The place has been updated throughout and has 2 large bedrooms and 1 bathroom. One bedroom has two queen memory foam beds and the second bedroom has one memory foam queen bed. The living room has a large flat screen TV w/ cable and a pull out queen couch. The kitchen has all the appliances that you could want and there is a brand new washer/dryer in the unit. You are able to access the entire place. We are hands-off hosts but are available as needed! 5 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, 7 minutes from Ohio Stat

name: Hide-a-way on high (parking included)
description: Originally a hotel. Located right in the heart of Columbus Night-Life. In the historic short  north/campus both 1 block from my apartment.  My unit is the 2nd largest it features a kitchen right when you walk in followed by a living room and bedroom. This Can fit up to 4people. It's. I also have a mini pool table in the apartment for activities. Place is great for one person but not more then 4.  Its very quiet for being right on high Street. I HAVE PAID  FOR A GUEST PERMIT TO ASSURE YOU HAVE PARKING. O
host_about: I'm 30 . I'm a server/bartender getting promoted to management. I am at the age where I'm wanting to travel more instead of being blackout wasted every weekend in my own town. I love Broadway shows and fancy dinners I'm into the good life now and still fun just more responsible.  I look forward to being able to occupie your location for my travels. My recent motto has been. Uplift everyone you come in contact with. You never know what someone is going through. Do kind be kind get kind.

name: Historic Home- Olde Towne/Franklin Park- Gray Room
description: Enjoy a beautiful private room in this large house on historic Bryden Road.  Comfortable queen bed with plenty of storage in the room and a tv with DVD player. Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu.  Access from the room out to a private 2nd floor balcony overlooking the back yard. Nicely updated home in a quiet location close to downtown Columbus.   The bedroom:  Large private room with a comfortable queen bed with luxurious bedding, plenty of storage, TV with Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu.  This bedroom has a corner desk allowing plenty of work space.  Also enjoy your own private, 2nd floor balcony overlooking the back yard. Shared bathroom.  I have another room available to book if you have a group or should this room be unavailable for your dates - check out the Map Room! The house:  All brick 2500 sq ft craftsman built in 1914 and had a major face-lift on its 100th birthday.  Gleaming hardwood floors throughout, living room, dining room, den and updated open kitchen with granite counters and
host_about:
I've been an Airbnb host since 2014 and since I love to travel I have also been a guest with other hosts in the US and internationally. People always ask if it's weird to have strangers come and stay in my home with me and the answer has always been "not once!" I really love having the opportunity to share my home and city of Columbus Ohio with travelers from all over the world. So far I have welcomed people from 6 out of 7 continents coming from more than 40 different countries.

When I bought my home in 2008 it had broken plumbing, boarded up windows, and had been the ugly house on the block for a long time. It's taken a lot of time and patience but a house that was forgotten and uninhabitable became a warm and charming place I like to call home. 

I'm proud of the work I've done to bring a historic building back to life and update it in a way that kept much of the original character. Be careful asking questions about the process because I may not stop telling stories for a while.

name: Updated suite in safe and quiet neighborhood
description: Private suite with your own separate entrance!  There is one bedroom, living room, bathroom, and eating/kitchen area.  You have complete privacy, there is no shared area and your space is closed off with a door.  There use to be an open set of steps connecting your space with the rest of the house but I have added a door and made it totally private.  You will not see or hear from me unless you want to.  The space is completely renovated and clean and modern throughout including wifi and cable TV This space is very modern, simple, and clean.  There is plenty of room and has everything you should need for a short stay. Very safe, nice neighborhood in the north end of Columbus There is plenty of street parking in my neighborhood You are about 10 minutes away from OSU campus and the football stadium and 15 minutes away from downtown.  There are plenty of restaurants close by and freeway access is only a few minutes away Every airbnb host needs to have a short term rental license with the c
host_about: I have a passion for traveling and meeting new people and hearing their stories. I did a study abroad program in college called Semester at Sea, and it completely changed me.  Ever since then I prefer to stay in peoples homes when I travel, as opposed to a hotel.  The more experiences and stories you have in life, the better!  5 things I couldn't live without?  The Bible, my family, pizza, The Office, and the gym I belong to.

name: Comfy place near downtown.
description: I'm honored you chose my property. During your stay, you'll enjoy a spacious 1,100 square feet apartment, close to restaurants, family-friendly activities, and a 5 minute drive downtown. You'll love the proximity to downtown, comfy living, in an up and coming neighborhood that is being gentrified. As last minute cancellations are costly - My place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers who are committed to their booking dates. The property is ideally located 5 minutes from COSI and Downtown Columbus - only a 8 minute drive to the Convention Center. Minutes from restaurants, entertainment and the business sectors. Simply take either Town or Broad Street East for a quick 5 minute ride to downtown Columbus. Situated in Franklinton, the property enjoys a quiet, mature neighborhood. The property is a two story side by side twin double (aka duplex). The adjacent unit is occupied by a tenant.  Guests have access to the two bedrooms upstairs and full access downstairs
host_about:
Howdy! I'm Jake. I'm originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I'm a real estate investor and by night I'm a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I've been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother's advice, "Jakey, live with NO REGRETS" (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that? And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

name: Gorgeous Home Central to Ohio Expo, Mapfre, & OSU!
description: We are Conveniently located within walking distance of the Ohio Expo Center, Ohio State Fairgrounds and Mapfre Stadium.  Our 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home offers a comfortable place to come back to after a fun day of exploring Columbus.  We are just a 5 minute Uber ride to the Short North, Columbus Convention Center, or Ohio State University. This newly renovated 2 story home offers granite countertops in the kitchen, stone fireplace and bedrooms styled with comfort in mind. Guests will enjoy access to the entire home. This includes 3 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, Kitchen, Living Room, and Dining Room. The 2nd and 3rd Bedrooms have the option of being joined, or can be closed off by the door. We strive to give you the best experience possible, although we do not live on site, We are just a phone call away and are happy to go above and beyond to make your stay seamless. This up and coming neighborhood of South Linden is located centrally to many exciting downtown events. Enjoy a music festival or

name: Wincott Place - A Clintonville Gem
description: Wincott Place is a single family home in the heart of Clintonville with easy access to 315 and 71.  On-street parking outside the front door. Perfect for a fun weekend getaway, weekday business trip, or longer stay. Looking to stay one night? A close drive to the Short North,  Grandview, Ohio State University, Downtown, Easton (in and outdoor mall) and Polaris (IKEA and indoor mall) for shopping trips.   Close to nearby medical facilities.    Entire house and contents are pet and smoke free. Our kitchen is fully stocked and available to you for cooking, baking, or heating up leftovers. The table seats 2-4 people, with a larger table outside in the screened-in porch.  We have children's dishes, cups, and utensils for the younger crowd staying at the house. We try to be mindful of the earth and conservation. Our rental has general recycling available for our guests. If you are not sure if something can be recycled, leave it for us and we will make the decision for you. We will also compo
host_about:
We live in Clintonville and have four cats and a dog.  We live and work in the community. As the hosts of Wincott Place we want our guests to feel comfortable and at home when they stay with us.  

Having stayed on friend's couches, in numerous hotel rooms, BNB's, and Airbnb the conversation has always centered on what would we do differently as a host.  From having a throw blanket for lounging on the couch, that certain kitchen tool, green space outside,  to having games available to play as a group or family. 

We try to be mindful of the earth and conservation. Our rental has general recycling available for our guests. If you are not sure if something can be recycled, leave it for us and we will make the decision for you. We also compost food. Leave us your leftovers (and scrap remnants if you like) in the refrigerator. The local composting company we work with that will even take meat and bones. 

Each of our animals has their own distinct personalities that make us smile and want to give them a hug.  This does not mean that everyone else does though. We each have several family members with pet allergies so we want there to be somewhere that is pet free, has items in it that have not been in contact with animals, like Wincott Place, to keep allergies at bay.

name: Refurbished Duplex Apartment in Historic Italian Village
description: Sip Keurig coffee and sense the history of this home in its tall ceilings, period fireplace, vintage moldings, and exposed brick. Black and white notes offset with yellow touches are more recent additions, with Roku TVs the last word in modernity.
host_about:
We are Zach and Cathleen. We've grown up together, here in town. We've been married the better half of ten years and for most of them, we've owned this property here in Italian Village Eventually, we hope to end up out west but until then, Columbus is home!

We lived next door in this duplex property until only recently. We now have family friends renting in our place. We absolutely loved this neighborhood and together, our family loves to go for a walk on the weekends...  either to grab a coffee and enjoy the park nearby or catch up with friends and family over breakfast on the weekends. Tasi Cafe and The Market are our faves!

If you stay at our property, we want you to feel welcome! We are casual people but want to provide you with an excellent experience. If there is anything you need, don't hesitate to ask.

name: Jury Room Guest Suite
description: Located in the River South area in Downtown Columbus, we are within walking distance to German Village, Downtown theaters, restaurants and the Columbus Commons. The Arena District and the Short North is a quick Cbus ride away. Built in two phases, 1831 and 1885, our home has been everything from a stagecoach stop to a bordello in the 1850's. We are offering second floor private space with 2 bedrooms and a sitting room with a sofa sleeper. Private and secure, this suite once served as sleeping quarters for visiting judges in the late 1800's. In recent years it's been used as office space but we've lovingly restored it into a cozy and clean retreat. Interesting note: because the building is one of the oldest buildings in Columbus (the old gal has quite a past) it is said to be haunted. I've lived here for almost 3 years and haven't seen a thing but a quick search of The Jury Room Columbus may provide some interesting history. Private entry from Pearl Alley with key code access gate and d

name: Bright short north apartment
description: 1 bedroom apartment right on High street steps away from restaurants, concerts and nightlife!

name: Cross/White Home   We cater to familes & groups.
description: Very nice family home with large yard, off street parking and washer & dryer.   Just a few minutes south of downtown Columbus in Grove City.   Close to the main retail area of Grove City and the Rickenbacker Airport.    Bring your family and pets.  Coming to the Columbus area for the Buckeye game, a wedding, or one of the many special events then spend the night(s) in a quiet neighborhood in a comfortable bed.     Please read Guest access portion. Shared second bathroom Licensed City of Columbus For special needs guest we can supply indoor parking. We can even supply town car service to & from airport.   Just ask. Entire main floor is yours.  Bedrooms, kitchen, full bath, living & dining rooms are all yours.  Owner lives on lower floor with separate entrance and will only be present when needed. Quiet residental neighborhood.   Off street parking for multiple cars Columbus is not known for its public transportation.

name: Spacious 1BR in a Great Location - Grandview & OSU
description: Hello travelers!  Enjoy the character of a vintage building and the comfort of a complete renovation in fall 2018!  This listing also comes with dedicated off-street parking for 2 vehicles.  Sleeping options: queen bed, full "double" size futon, queen air mattress, and a comfy couch. Just a 2 minute walk to a Chipotle, or to a nice neighborhood cafe that serves breakfast and lunch - we're also very near Ohio State University, downtown Grandview (many great restaurants) and the Short North. Completely renovated in fall 2018!  New floors, new carpet, fresh paint, and an updated bathroom and kitchen appliances. Arrival: you'll enter through the back door of the apartment into the kitchen. There is a digital keypad lock on the door for you to let yourself in, and an exterior motion light to help you find your way if you arrive late at night. We'll send you the combination on your arrival day.  Bedroom: Queen mattress.  Living Room: Futon that converts into a full size bed, a queen air matt
host_about: Enjoy golf, boating, snowboarding and visiting local craft breweries.

name: A SWEET AND QUITE SUITE IN THE HEART OF COLUMBUS
description: We are offering our comfortable and spacious house, its clean and quiet, and a place to relax and get a good night's sleep.  Ultra Fast Internet Parking on the main street, right in front of the house Access to Washer/Dryer Equipped Kitchen The room is equipped with a queen bed,Linens are new. 40" HD TV. Located close to the Medical school and Ohio State University. Great for Football game weekend, 5 min to shorth North and downtown and the local restaurants. Great shopping, lots of great restaurants and entertainment options.  You have access to the entire house (kitchen, living room, bathrooms, Clean Towels, shampoo and soap, Ceiling fan and plug in fan, Personal desk, Smart TV with Netflix and laundry).  Room access keys as well as the WiFi code. Indoor gym equipment. love interacting with my guest, am always available by phone. Will be happy to give recommendations. Short North, Nationwide Arena downtown. Please treat the house with respect, would always be available by phone. Than
host_about: Medical Student at The Ohio State University

name: Beautiful One Bed at 223 E Town
description: Chic-industrial travel apartment with huge fitness center and community room in heart of Columbus Like a bed of roses, you'll love this chic-industrial travel apartment located smack dab in Columbus' hip downtown. Interiors boast floor-to-ceiling or oversized windows (that let in heaps of natural light) as well as classy flooring, chic furniture, and a kitchen island that's arm's reach from your full dining table. As always, your upscale travel apartment puts you in the heart of The Arch City's greatest bars, restaurants and nightlife.  Tastefully appointed commons areas make you feel like a rockstar en route to your fancy flat, and a big, state-of-the-art fitness center helps you and your undying will jumpstart the day, energizing for Columbus's very perusable downtown, or for tossing the frisbee amidst live music on Columbus Commons. (We'll let you do other things, also, but we refuse to let you check out if you haven't covered these essentials.)     Your home-like downtown Columbus
host_about:
Stay Alfred was created based on the idea of offering short term rentals at an unbelievable price while making the booking process easy and problem free. Stay Alfred acquires properties in high-end buildings and condominiums in the best locations to ensure your stay is satisfying and you want to come back. Since we value your return business, we always offer discounts to those who stay in any of our units time after time. We want you to feel at home when you stay with us and that's why you will always be greeted with a professionally cleaned unit and quality furnishings. We welcome feedback in any kind of way to ensure we are meeting the needs of everyone!

best,
Jordan Allen
Owner

name: White Cottage
description: Charming historic residence located in the vibrant downtown neighborhood know as Italian Village. Within two block of high street chock full of restaurants art galleries and unique boutiques.  Just .7 mi from the Convention Center. Historic home with lots of charm, hardwood floors throughout.  Upstairs lofted bedroom. The entire apartment and side porch. Private entrance, self check-in.  Self contained town house with bedroom loft.  Parking is on the Street. I am available for questions. High st. Street parking. Uber. Bus. Walk
host_about: For the past 25 years I've leased my rentals as long term. Someone suggested I try out Airbnb and here I am.

name: **Modern 2bed/2bath, Close to Everything **
description: CHARMING RENOVATED CONDO! OPEN FLOOR PLAN WITH EXPOSED BRICK FEATURES. FULLY STOCKED KITCHEN WITH MAPLE CABINETS, CONCRETE COUNTERS, BREAKFAST BAR AND SS APPLIANCES. GORGEOUS HARDWOOD FLOORS. FIRST FLOOR WASHER/DRYER. CLOSE TO FRANKLIN PARK, CMH AIRPORT, SHORT NORTH, GERMAN VILLAGE, AND OTHER ENTERTAINMENT LOCATIONS. THE HIGHLIGHT REEL: -	The entire townhouse was remodeled in 2016 -	Kitchen contains a 4 burner gas range, microwave, refrigerator/freezer w/ dishwasher, ice maker, coffee maker (French press also), and fully stocked kitchen with all necessary kitchen gadgetry, and more! -	2 Bedrooms o	Master Suite - King Bed - Upper Level o	Guest bedroom - Queen Bed - Upper Level o	Full Size Air Mattress o	Pack 'N Play -	Dining area complete with dining table and 4 chairs and eat-in bar with 2 stools -	Living area with 3 person couch and large flat screen TV with full DirecTV line-up -	Centrally located -	Franklin Park Conservatory - 0.5miles -	Short North - 2 miles -	Nationwide Arena - 2
host_about: I am a single mother working hard to provide for my family! We enjoy all of the benefits that Airbnb provides by hosting guests from all over the world! I hope you enjoy my properties!

name: The Harrison West Carriage House
description: Be a part of one of Columbus' historic neighborhoods when you stay in our Harrison West Carriage House.  You are steps from the best breakfast you will find in the city and just a couple of blocks from the Short North/High Street, the Olentangy River Trail, The Ohio Stadium and Nationwide Arena - just to name a few.  This newly built, spacious studio offers all of the conveniences you could ask for with the characteristic charm this area is known for.  Washer/dryer available for long-term guests Our Carriage House is a studio space, but at 800 square feet and with huge 11 foot ceilings, it feels very spacious! You will have complete privacy with your private entrance off the alley behind our home. We are always available by phone if you need us! Harrison West is a unique neighborhood just on the outskirts of the Short North.  You will be steps from the best breakfast in town at Katalina's as well as two local bars, Subway, and a convenience store all less than a block away.  You are al

name: Bold Studio  at 80 on the Commons
description: Upscale studio apartment with rooftop terrace overlooking 6-acre Columbus Commons green space With the gorgeous Columbus Commons 6-acre green space rolling straight up to your digs, this travel apartment in bustling downtown Columbus gives you unsurpassed access to urban culture with a big dose of nature for fun, sun, and frolic to boot.  Columbus is an urban center offering world-class music events, business venues, museums and nightlife. Your apartment at 80 on the Commons puts you in the thick of that, but with quick access to walking paths, sunshine, flora galore, frisbee, bocce ball, as well as the 200 plus annual outdoor music and cultural events. Along with that ideal location, you get great city views from oversized windows, a full kitchen, plus yummy onsite dining spots and a rooftop terrace. Rooftop terrace overlooking Columbus Commons Meeting/community space Controlled Key Fob access Dedicated resident elevators We believe in personal space. Prior to your arrival, your unit
host_about:
Stay Alfred was created based on the idea of offering short term rentals at an unbelievable price while making the booking process easy and problem free. name: Fantastic Two-Bedroom at 80 on the Commons
description: Upscale 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment with rooftop terrace overlooking 6-acre Columbus Commons green space With the gorgeous Columbus Commons 6-acre green space rolling straight up to your digs, this travel apartment in bustling downtown Columbus gives you unsurpassed access to urban culture with a big dose of nature for fun, sun, and frolic to boot.  Columbus is an urban center offering world-class music events, business venues, museums and nightlife. Your apartment at 80 on the Commons puts you in the thick of that, but with quick access to walking paths, sunshine, flora galore, frisbee, bocce ball, as well as the 200 plus annual outdoor music and cultural events. Along with that ideal location, you get great city views from oversized windows, a full kitchen, plus yummy onsite dining spots and a rooftop terrace. Rooftop terrace overlooking Columbus Commons Meeting/community space Controlled Key Fob access Dedicated resident elevators We believe in personal space. Prior to your arrival,

name: Short North Bungelow
description: Cute home steps away from High Street and all the action of the Short North Our home is steps away from High St and all it has to offer. We are not a party home. If you are looking for a great place to stay while in the area look no further. There is a parking space behind the home for our guests. The entire home and backyard is yours to use. Our home is close to high Street and all the great Eateries. You can walk to the convention center very easily. We are around the corner from one of the best ballroom dance studios should you want to step in for a lesson. It's very easy to walk to most places in the Short North from our house but it's also easy to catch an Uber for anyplace you might want to go. The parking space for our home is behind the house. It's a tight space so please make sure you don't pull too far forward on the grass. You can download the Columbus parking app if you want to park on the street.
host_about: I'm a retired Air Force officer and physician. My wife and I enjoy travel. We  love Columbus, especially the Short North. Our home isn't a party house but if you're looking for a great location close to High street to enjoy all Columbus has to offer check us out.

name: Unwind in a Bright, Airy space with Boho accents
description: Private room in the heart of Clintonville. Contemporary, updated space with lots of natural light and boho-charm! We are able to host up to 3 guests at a time. Enjoy our proximity to the Park of Roses, Studio 35, and the shops along North High St.  Looking for a quieter retreat? Enjoy our spacious backyard, or sip your favorite warm beverage on the front porch. Bathroom is shared, but towels, hairdryer, shampoo, conditioner and soap included.  Kitchen is also shared, breakfast with coffee and tea provided. Shared areas include: kitchen, living room, restroom, backyard,  and front porch. We are looking forward to providing you and your guests with ideas of what to do in the area and breakfast in the morning. Please let us know beforehand of any dietary restrictions.  I will be available to you through the AirBnb messaging platform- feel free to message me with questions! Quiet area in walking distance to many iconic Clintonville locations. There are many coffee shops, retail stores, res

name: Lovely Italian Villa - Housepitality
description: The #LovelyItalianVilla is a gem for your stay in Columbus. Don't judge a book by it's cover, this cottage is unassuming on the outside, and luxury on the inside! Also the best location in the city for nightlife and city access! This tiny 1 Bedroom house includes a sleeper sofa and open kitchen. This luxury bedroom suite has a king bed, and bathroom with an amazing shower! Just two houses down from Seventh Son Brewrey, and Walking distance to the best the Italian Village Columbus has to offer! The Italian Villa is a very small 1 bedroom house. The outside is ready for a few repairs, but the inside has had a beautiful renovation with top of the line finishes. Our house is all on one floor plan, with only a few steps to get up in the house. It is on a busy street (4th Street) and we do not have any off-street parking. There are usually spots available on our street, but you may need to walk a block or so. There is a washer and dryer available in the bathroom. Guest can have the entire ho
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: New Albany Town Home, Perfect for Your Stay
description: A cozy, inviting townhouse in a tucked away neighborhood in New Albany. This property features two full bedrooms, two full baths, a fully furnished basement, back patio, and garage. Comfortable for up to nine guests, and includes wifi/netflix/hbo/hulu with a full kitchen and washer/dryer. Our guest will enjoy close proximity to grocery stores, eateries, nice bars/pubs, and a private neighborhood pool. Downtown Columbus within 15-20 minutes away. A two-story home which offers a fantastic location and cozy interior. It is an excellent choice for a get-together, celebration, or business trip. Everything in the house is in like-new condition and available for your use! -You can access anything in the house as well as the patio in the back, garage, and private neighborhood pool. Please check listing amenities for more details. My neighbors tolerate parties and music but keep the volume to a respectable level.

name: The Perfect Location!
description: Welcome! University District and Old North Columbus are the perfect location for your stay!  Highlights** -1 mi from OH Stadium and OSU, 4 mi to the Convention Center, 4 mi to Nationwide Arena, 2 mi to the OH State Fairgrounds. - Off-street, private parking for 2-3 cars. - Complimentary coffee and everything you need for kitchen use. - Lockbox for self-check-in - 60 MBPS Internet Built in the 1900s, this listing is the right half of a duplex with 3 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, and plenty of space! There are 5-6 steps to get to the first floor and 12-18 steps to get to the second floor. With lockbox entry you can check-in at your convenience.  If you want to drop off your bags early you can do so after 11 A.M.  Kitchen: Includes microwave, dishwasher, toaster oven, coffee, and enough dishes and utensils for basic cooking for 4-8 guests. Living room: Includes two sofas and a sofa bed Bathroom: Includes towels and toiletry essentials included. The bathroom is located on the second floor. Th
host_about: I am a young professional that works in finance. I love Columbus and meeting new people. I hope you will enjoy my home!

1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated.

You are welcome to use the kitchen, dining room, and living room as well.  My home is very clean, modern, and simple.  I'm about 10 minutes from OSU and 15 minutes to downtown and the short north. You can use any part of the house except the downstairs in-law suite which is blocked by a room divider.  Make yourself at home! The Bible, my family, pizza, The Office, and the gym I belong to.

name: Charming Home in Heart of Historic German Village
description: A beautiful historic home (once on the prestigious Haus und Garten Tour), turned Barre Studio (formerly 'Studio B'), now transformed into an adorable Airbnb! Our little bungalow is perfect to experience all of Columbus or for a weekend getaway in the Village. We are just a few blocks away from delicious coffee and pastry shops, local restaurants, bars and boutiques. A very short drive, uber, or bike/scooter ride to Short North or Ohio State's Campus, and a short walk to Downtown Columbus. Our two story home is filled with character and is equipped with one full bed upstairs, a pull out sleeper sofa downstairs, one full bath and a kitchen. The house also has a large, quaint courtyard on the side to enjoy the beautiful greenery and skyline that surrounds it.   There's a small desk available upstairs for those in town for work. There is a coin laundry a few blocks south if you need to do laundry while in town. Guests will have access to the entire home, including the court yard. German Vi
host_about:
Hello! I'm Brennan. I love sports, enjoying the outdoors (hiking, rock climbing, parks, drinks on patios ;) and am a fiend for the beach!  I also absolutely love dogs, can't forget that!

My husband and I met in Columbus, OH in 2011, and after moving to a few different cities have decided to settle down back where we began. We love to explore other cities, but love ours the most and we can't wait for you to explore Columbus, too!

name: Remodeled 1-Bdrm Apartment w/off-Street Parking
description: Newly remodeled 1-bedroom basement apartment in a 4-unit brick building close to downtown with off-street parking, full kitchen and washer/dryer! Apartment has 1 bedroom with queen bed, sofa-bed in living-room, full kitchen and 1 bathroom. Apartment is completely updated with brand-new furnishings and linens. We provide access to popular streaming services such as Netflix, HBO and Hulu to ensure you have a relaxing stay. Note: Added AC to apartment this May Distance to Popular Destinations -0.5 miles from Franklin Park -1.5 miles from Nationwide Children's Hospital -2.5 miles from Convention Center -2.5 miles from Arena District -3 miles from Short North -6 miles from CMH airport (10 min drive)  -8.5 miles from OSU stadium (13 min drive on non-game days) Lock box with keys. Code will be given prior to check-in. We are as available as you would like us to be. Our goal is to respect your privacy yet ensure you have everything you need for a comfortable stay. Distance to Popular Destinati
host_about:
I am a long time Airbnb user,  who loves to travel as well as host!  When I travel with AirBnb I know what I want at places I stay to feel comfortable, clean and my temporary home away from home; that is exactly what we try to provide our guests.  My husband and I are looking forward to welcoming you to Columbus in our dedicated Airbnb apartment with a fully stocked kitchen and bathroom and super comfortable bed.  Our goal is to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible!

AirBnB Locations I have Stayed At:  Lima, Boston, Austin, Houston, NYC, Mykonos, Reykjavik, Toronto,  New Hampshire.

name: Cozy Short North Brick Condo - 1 block off High St
description: Cozy apartment located in the heart of the Short North. One block from High St (between High St. and Neil Ave). Also three blocks from Goodale Park. Easy access to OSU, downtown, and Grandview. 2 bedroom bottom unit of a double, door is accessible via the backyard. One off street parking spot with gate access to backyard. Private fenced in backyard with fire pit and patio table. Exposed brick inside. Kitchen with pass through to living room. Filtered water system. Master bed room with queen bed and plenty of room. Second bedroom also with a queen bed. Flat screen TV, wifi, AppleTV (no cable). Lost AppleTV remote will be $300 fee. Fully stocked Kitchen with gas stove, water filter, Keurig K-Mini Plus Single Serve Coffee Maker, dishwasher, and microwave. Bathroom features a spacious tile and glass shower. You will have the apartment to yourself. Both apartments have their own exterior door. Your apartments door is in the backyard (upstairs apartments door is in the front). So if you enco
host_about: Resident of the Short North (Victorian Village) for the past 10 years.

name: Cozy Cottage In The Bustling City - Housepitality
description: Location, Luxury, and Lots of fun! Our 2 bedroom 2 and 1/2 bathroom house has been lovingly renovated inside to make it into the perfect place to stay while in Columbus. Unassuming on the outside, our home is modern on the inside. From the cooks kitchen, to the walk-in glass shower, this home has it all! Just steps from Seventh Son brewery, Fox in the Snow cafe, and many other bars in restaurants in the Italian Village, and Short North in Columbus. Our house is perfect for small groups, families, couples, and solo travelers. It is great for a fun night out with friends, or a home base for exploring Columbus. The first floor has an open living room and dinning room great for relaxing. There is a half bath, and full kitchen as well. Upstairs is a full bathroom with walk-in shower. At one end of the house is the master bedroom with a king bed, and desk. Down the hallway on the other side of the bathroom is the 2nd bedroom with a queen bed. Our location is central to the Short North area,
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: One Bedroom Cottage + Loft
description: Cozy cottage in the heart of German Village/Schumacher Place. Walking distance to Starbucks, The Crest, Lindey's, Beck Tavern, The Book Loft and everything else. My cottage is a one bedroom house + loft. The bedroom features a king sized bed and the loft has a queen sized blow-up mattress. There is one off-street parking space (which comes in handy in the village) along with a fenced in yard and deck. The huge sectional is super comfy to relax and watch Netflix, Hulu - whatever you prefer. I will be available via phone/email during your entire stay for anything you may need including suggestions, where to explore, etc. I may be biased however, I think German Village is the best borough of Columbus. It's so charming, very walkable and close to everything.

name: NEW Central: OSU, Short North, & Arena District
description: NEW LISTING! STUDIO apartment right in the middle of everything! Located in the Short North on the famous High Street, you are literal steps from countless bars, restaurants, and boutiques. Because of it's location, it is equal distance from OSU's campus (two minutes drive), the Arena District and Downtown Columbus (both five minutes drive). PLEASE READ ALL OF THE INFORMATION PROVIDED BEFORE BOOKING. PLEASE READ ALL OF THE FOLLOWING BEFORE BOOKING TO ENSURE THAT THE APARTMENT IS RIGHT FOR YOU AND/OR YOUR GROUPS NEEDS: Aside from a wonderful, centralized place to stay for singles and couples, it is also a BUDGET place to stay for groups of 3 or more. PLEASE CONSIDER THE FOLLOWING: Up to two (2) people is PERFECT. Three (3) is GREAT. Four (4) is GOOD. Five (5) is OKAY. Six (6) is EH. Essentially, the more people in your group the more cramped it will become.  This apartment is in ONE OF THE MOST BUSIEST NEIGHBORHOODS in the entire City. PLEASE BE ADVISED that there may be SOME street noi
host_about:
I am an avid traveler. I love immersing myself in any type of cultural experience. I am very open-minded and will try anything--foods, beverages, activities, etc.--at least once. I am a huge foodie, so when I travel I spend a considerable amount of time searching for establishments that offer unique, special, and/or local food options--I live for foods that are spicy, meaty, and full of carbs (I appreciate any recommendations).

I was raised in a provincial town twenty minutes to the northeast of Orlando, FL. I am a law student currently living in Columbus, OH. As much as I love to go to bars, lounges, and nightclubs (with friends) as much as possible; I also enjoy going to the opera (I love the Metropolitan Opera in NY), the symphony, the ballet, and to art museums. Moreover, know how to ballroom dance.

I am a respectful, clean person. I am also an Airbnb host, so I can appreciate the amount of time and work that goes into offering a great experience.

name: Bedroom on Bedford
description: We offer a simple room in the historic area of Old Oaks near downtown and the German Village area.   Within 5 minutes from Children's Hospital, Franklin Park Conservatory, and Schiller Park in German Village. The house is a brick craftsman built in 1900. It is a cozy simple room with Wifi and Netflix. Street parking and shared bathroom. Pets are welcome and a medium size crate is provided. The bedroom is very cozy with a microwave and fridge inside the room. A private entrance on the side of the house opens up the the main stairway to the second floor where the room and bathroom is located. Water, hot kettle, and snakes are provided. Guest will enter through the side door and only have access to central stairway that leads to the bedroom and bathroom on the second floor. The owners private living space is locked off to guest. The owner is very easy going and willing to help in anyway to make the guest feel welcome and comfortable. The owner is a real estate agent and is in and out a lo
host_about: I moved to Columbus OH in 1997 from Grand Rapids, Michigan. I am a real estate agent within Ohio and love the arts.

name: Conveniently Located Ranch
description: Beautiful & Updated 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths ranch, conveniently located. area. Amenities: Granite countertops Hardwood floors Heat & Central Air First floor washer/dryer 2 car garage and large yard Convenient to downtown, Nationwide Children's Hospital, Nationwide Arena, Easton, Ohio State Fair/Expo, The Ohio State University, Capital University, Port Columbus, Defense Supply Center and Franklin Park. The living and dining room are in an open area.   The family room has vaulted ceilings.   The kitchen is a large galley style with two sinks. Hello, we will not be onsite during your visit.   However, someone will be available to address your needs. Located in a quiet and scenic neighborhood. Easy access to freeways (Interstate I-70 & I-71). No pets will be on property during a visit.
host_about:
I am a down-tp- earth friendly person that enjoys spending time with family and friends,  travel, live music and health and wellness.

I enjoy meeting new people and providing them with a space to allow them to have a great travel experience.

My life motto is that life is too short to live it unfulfilled and that time and relationships are to be respected and treasured.

name: Italian Village Villas **2 Next-Door Houses!!**
description: These 2 small houses are right next to each other, and offer a wonderfully unique place for your group to stay while in Columbus! This listing is to rent both of these 2 small houses that are in an amazing location for seeing and doing around Italian Village, Short North, and Columbus. The blue house has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, and the white house has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. Booking your stay here allows larger groups to stay together, but also have privacy. Our place is 2 small houses that are on the same parcel. They have a shared fenced in back yard, and walkway. They are both unassuming on the exterior, but are beautifully renovated on the inside. Your group will love have all the space, and still having privacy of separate houses!
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Newly Remodeled,  3 Min. to OSU, 2 King Beds
description: 1/2 Duplex with off street parking for 3 cars. Sits between High Street and Rt. 315/Riverside Hospital giving easy access to all downtown events as well as the bustling day and night-life on High Street (art galleries, brew pubs, lots of culture) . 3-minute drive to OSU stadium, 6 minutes to downtown Columbus. Open 1st floor,  granite island w/gas cooktop, 65" flatscreen, 2 king beds. This is a great location for nurses on a temporary assignment with OhioHealth / Riverside Methodist. This house has an open feel between the kitchen, dining and family room.  It has also been designed and decorated in one theme and color scheme that create a calm, clean minimalist feel. Access to the whole house including laundry downstairs I'm easy to reach or have an assistant who can help if I am not available.  Texting is fine and I keep my phone handy so guests won't have to wait for answers to questions. The neighborhood is rapidly upgrading as Clintonville is in the midst of a boom in terms of new
host_about: My wife is a private art teacher and home maker and I own, manage, and practice in a group of 15 therapists in Columbus. We love living in the country but just a few minutes a way from Columbus - best of both worlds.  We like to cook, travel, get outside, and unwind with our kids and friends on weekends.  This AirBNB home is located next door to us, so part of our lifestyle is keeping the property up and hosting people from all over the country who come to stay. We thoroughly enjoy seeing others find a unique home in the country to unwind and make memories.

name: Scarlet & Grey off I-71
description: Hi :) By profession I'm a contract specialist and by passion I'm a tennis player. I'm also in grad school pursuing a master's degree in business. When I'm not studying for class, I spend most of my time playing tennis or traveling. During these travels, I've enjoyed great hospitality with my Airbnb hosts. I was so inspired by them that I've decided to host guests. Come and enjoy the comfort and take-home good memories with you. Happy travel.  FYI, Ohio State University campus is within 10 mins. **This house is located right next to I-71, which provides easy access to anywhere in Columbus. Furthermore, 670 can be accessed within a few mins as well. So due to quick access of the highways, you can get to downtown within 15 mins, Columbus Airport within 10 mins, OSU campus in 10 mins, Franklin County Fairgrounds within 5 mins, Polaris Mall in 5 mins, Ohio State Fairgrounds in 5 mins, Convention Center in 10 mins and the Mapfre stadium in less than 5 mins. **This house was recently remodele

name: The Architect and Baker House
description: Urban Living by abandon trolly barn in a stylish 3 bedroom 1.5 bath, shared backyard, and off street parking.  1 block from Franklin Park, and a short drive to all the city has to offer. OSU only 5.6 miles away
host_about: Hi I'm Amy ! I work as a professional baker and love meeting all types of people.

name: CONTEMPORARY HOME near OSU/MAPFRE/Downtown Cols.
description: Don't miss this opportunity to stay in this spacious home! This house has 6 rooms and 2 1/2 bathrooms and is located in the OSU area. host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

Tastefully designed and thoughtfully laid out to create a balance of comfort and thought provoking, Instagram-able, photo ready space for you to enjoy during your stay in Columbus. Visit our website: book directly by messaging us and receive a discount. Judge's Mansion was built for Judge Edmond Bothwell Dillon in the late 1890s in historic Old Towne East. We are pleased to present a modern lodging experience in its original design boasting of large windows, tall ceilings, and Victorian character. This large apartment comes equipped with a private bath and living room, high speed internet, and all the accommodations to work or relax comfortably. You have access to the entire Mansion, all 8 apartment units. We respect your privacy, but are available via
host_about:
Located in Olde Towne East, Columbus, Ohio, we are the premier Guest House of the Near East Side (Olde Towne East, Franklin Park, King Lincoln, Woodland Park) offering six apartments and two queen en suites.  In operation since 2015, we host over 1000 guests a year. Will you consider being one?  

Connect with us @judgesmansion @thejudgesmansion

Stay for a night or three, shoot on location here, or meet up with friends.  #belonghere #judgesmansion

Olde Towne East is one of the best neighborhoods in Columbus, and is the oldest area in Columbus, currently undergoing rapid revitalization. The neighborhood has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles as a result of its history. Some homes have been restored and others remain untouched as reminders of eras that have gone before. Our street and surrounding streets are some of the safest blocks in Columbus! Just check out crime heat maps online, g@@gle map view or search, and learn a little bit more about the history of the community!

name: Judge's Mansion: The Judge's Study
description: Located in the historical Judge's Mansion in Olde Towne East , this spacious guest room served as the original owner's study in 1890.  1 bedroom/1 bathroom and plenty of open space to spread out or share with a travel companion. Tastefully designed and thoughtfully laid out to create a balance of comfort and thought provoking, Instagram-able, photo ready space for you to enjoy during your stay in Columbus. Judge's Mansion was built for Judge Edmond Bothwell Dillon in the late 1880s in historic Old Towne East. We are pleased to present a modern lodging experience in its original design boasting of large windows, tall ceilings, and Victorian character. This large apartment comes equipped with a small kitchen, high speed internet, and all the accommodations to work or relax comfortably. Guest have access to their private apartment which includes a bedroom, living room, and kitchen. We respect your privacy, but are available if needed. Olde Towne East is host to interesting clusters of din
host_about:
Located in Olde Towne East, Columbus, Ohio, we are the premier Guest House of the Near East Side (Olde Towne East, Franklin Park, King Lincoln, Woodland Park) offering six apartments and two queen en suites.  In operation since 2015, we host over 1000 guests a year. Will you consider being one?  

Connect with us @judgesmansion @thejudgesmansion

Stay for a night or three, shoot on location here, or meet up with friends.  #belonghere #judgesmansion

Olde Towne East is one of the best neighborhoods in Columbus, and is the oldest area in Columbus, currently undergoing rapid revitalization. The neighborhood has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles as a result of its history. Some homes have been restored and others remain untouched as reminders of eras that have gone before. Our street and surrounding streets are some of the safest blocks in Columbus! Just check out crime heat maps online, g@@gle map view or search, and learn a little bit more about the history of the community!

host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

name: Charming Clintonville Cottage
description: This cosy, ivy-covered, one bedroom carriage house is charming and welcoming, filled with original art and furnished with a sophisticated blend of modern, mid-Century and antique pieces. It's located in the heart of friendly, convenient South Clintonville, near great restaurants and all the amenities, and a mile and a half from OSU Campus. Curl up and read or watch TV in the comfy queen-sized four-poster bed.  If you'd prefer to cook at home during your stay, you'll find a fully stocked kitchen with 5-burner gas stove and dining area.  In nice weather, there's a lovely outdoor sitting area under a crabapple tree, just outside the front door, set far back from the street for privacy. This is a second home for us, our primary residence being in Brooklyn, NY. So unfortunately, we won't get to meet you in person but would be available by phone or text if you have any questions or issues that may arise. You will gain access to the house using a keypad lock. Should there be an issue that req
host_about: I'm a painter based in Brooklyn, NY and worked in the theatre for thirty years as a director and teacher.  My husband, Lee, is an actor and we have one daughter who's a chef and baker in Columbus, Ohio. We purchased our guest house to have a home to stay in when we visit her, and host travelers when we aren't in town. We travel as often as we can and have been to every continent except Antarctica. Next big trip is India next fall. We love to eat and go to museums and just wander through new places, absorb the culture and discover things that surprise us. Our goal is always to experience a place from a local's POV, so we try to stay in real neighborhoods instead of tourist zones.

host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

name: Spacious Duplex in Trendy German Village
description: Spacious 3 bedroom Duplex in the very charming Historic German Village, across the street from restaurants, cafes, shops and yoga studio. A short walk to Schiller Park and a 5 minute Uber ride (3 mi.) to the popular Arena District and Short North Arts District. The perfect place to get a taste of all Columbus has to offer! Includes: -2 off street parking spaces -Fenced in yard -WiFi & AppleTV -pack&play available upon request Short Term Rental License Reference Number: This is a full house rental, guests will have private access to the entire space!
