This Duplex is across the street from some of the best local shops including a coffee shop, juice bar, yoga studio, and nail bar. Steps fro
host_about: We are Matt and Meghan Terwilliger from Columbus Ohio. We love to travel and try new restaurants (Meghan is also a self proclaimed coffee snob). We host a duplex in the historic neighborhood of German Village in Columbus--an awesome part of town with trendy shops and restaurants within walking distance.

name: The "Up" House  in Franklinton Arts District
description: Cute and cozy 2 BD/2BA home in the heart of East Franklinton - Columbus' new hub for independent artists and makers.  Located two blocks from several local craft breweries, bars and restaurants, COSI (one of the nations leading science and children museums),  Bicentennial Park, local music and art galleries.   We are also within 1 mile of Ohio Theater and Palace Theater.   You will have the convenience of self check-in, but we live less than .5 miles away and are available when needed. Guests have access to the Entire house, including the backyard. The only area blocked off for guest safety is our basement. We called this house home for 10+ years and have seen a great deal of change in the neighborhood.    There is a lot of development happening - inviting new communities, nightlife and art galleries to Franklinton.  While we are central to the scene and downtown, you rarely hear any outside noise at all.   And the Scioto River and bike trail are across the field  from our house so nat

name: Entire home in North Columbus!
description: ** Pet friendly at an additional rate of $30 per stay. If you would like to bring your pet please disclose this in initial communication to avoid confusion** Clean home 10 miles north of OSU campus and the short north area of Columbus. Convenient access to major highways and great shopping at Polaris or Easton. Garage parking available. Fenced in back yard. Home gym in basement with a rower, power rack, dumbbells, lat pull, olympic bars and Rogue bumper set.  Rental is for entire home. Enjoy the entire home! I am always available via phone or text with any questions or concerns. Family friendly very safe neighborhood. Parking in the garage or in driveway available. Access to the city bus available with a short walk.
host_about: I am very laid back and enjoy being active and being outdoors. I prefer to stay with Airbnb hosts while traveling to experience a more ok natural vibe of the environment I am visiting.

name: Charming Bright Italian Village/ Short North flat
description: This 1 bedroom bottom floor flat is ideally located in the hippest part of Italian Village. With the best brewery and coffee shop/bakery a block away and all the Short North restaurants, bars, and shopping easily walkable, the location is hard to beat! OSU campus/stadium are a quick drive up High Street. The space will make you feel like you're in a jeweled oasis. It's perfect for out-of-town visitors wanting to see this vibrant part of the city or locals looking for a stay-cation The charming apartment includes bedroom, living room, and an equipped kitchen. There is one private parking spot available for the unit.  This is the bottom unit in the duplex, with a shared patio available during warm months. The unit can accommodate up to 4 people, with a King in the bedroom and a futon in the living space.  Bathroom is bright with a large shower.  Wifi and apple tv.  There is an outside patio, this is a shared space with the upstairs apt.  Cornhole and backyard Jenga are available for use.

name: 614 Destination Dennison
description: Our home is ideal any group of people who are looking to enjoy our space and proximity to downtown Columbus!  We are located on the North end of The Short North District which is walking distance from OSU's campus and High Street.  If you love exposed brick, hardwood floors & a newly renovated backyard, this is the place for you. Comfortably sleeps 1 to 10 guests and is within 2 miles or less of the following attractions: Columbus Convention Center OSU Stadium Nationwide Arena Ohio Expo Center - Total: 4 queen beds, 1 sectional sofa, 1 queen air bed 3 bedrooms w/ 4 queen beds (one bedroom has 2 queen beds) 1 full-length, sectional sofa, 1 Queen Airbed (living room) - Eat-in Kitchen - Large refrigerator/freezer, microwave, gas stove/oven, pots/pans, cooking & eating utensils, plates, etc.  - New bathroom w/ double sink and bathtub/shower combo - WIFI (200MBPS) and TV to stream apps and live sporting events - Central A/C - Washer/Dryer - Private 1st floor deck area, fire pit with seating

description: Location, location, location. And a nice apartment doesn't hurt either.  Come stay in this amazing apartment. Everything is new as of Thanksgiving 2018. This second-floor unit has vaulted ceilings with skylights and windows on every wall. Beautiful, original hardwoods with exposed brick add tons of original charm.  Newly remodeled bathroom. Off-street parking (1 spot only). I've owned this apartment for 6 years. Entire apartment. Text, email or phone Located in the heart of Short North. You could not be in a better location. The first Saturday night of each month is Gallery Hop, which means art galleries are open later and things are bit more lively than usual.

name: LuxElite #4 "Mint Tower" Private Room+Shared Bath
description: Welcome to LuxBox Elite, the newly opened second location for LuxBox Stays, consistently voted best airbnb in Columbus! Read the countless 5-star rave reviews on our original airbnb, Luxbox Classic. The home is newly renovated top to bottom, and it is absolutely beautiful. Since our locations are all less than 5 minutes apart, our staff easily flows between both locations to take care of all guests needs immediately. It's our goal to be your second home whenever you're in the city. You'll instantly feel at home with the minimalist decor and all the modern essentials provided. Nearly everything in the place is brand new and gorgeous. Beds and pillows are memory foam for premium comfort. Video security lets you relax in a safe environment with friendly people in a hipster vibe (lots of plants and thoughtful touches). Don't wait, this airbnb is exactly what you're looking for! You'll be cared for with precision and efficiency. You can make yourself at home in our state of the art kitchen

I appreciate all the experiences I had in each destination. I am definitely looking forward to more experiences in other places and hope you do too!

We look forward to hosting you!

name: Short North Blue, 5 BD, 4.5 BA, Free Parking/WIFI
description: Experience a one-of-a-kind stay in this custom Short North home! Located on Summit St between High & N. 4th St, this 5 bedroom, 3.5 bath home with *basement option that has 3 queen beds + 1 bathroom* is the perfect private setting for your group's stay in Columbus.  The main floor is 1000 SqFt with seating for 15+ people.  Whether you are visiting Nationwide Arena, the Convention Center, or OSU, we are just minutes away (within 2 miles)! This gorgeous home is perfect for hosting events as well. This large custom home was designed for entertaining! The first floor includes the kitchen/dining/living room in one connected space- perfect for dinner parties, bridal showers, and gatherings. Please inquire directly if you would like to host a special event; an additional fee applies starting at $100 and will vary depending on the event. All special event details must be approved prior to stay.  The first floor has an eat-in kitchen, quartz countertops, and stainless-steel appliances. Kitchen
host_about:
Mike and Ingrid met in Japan, moved to Columbus in 2009, and have been loving it ever since!  Both are experienced travelers (25+ countries on 5 continents between us) & enjoy renovating historic homes and building new homes.

"We love being hosts- providing a comfy home and delivering a unique experience when visiting our city. We know quite a lot about Short North entertainment & food establishments- there is so much to do here, feel free to ask!"
- Ingrid, Mike, and Frances, Co-Host 

Our life motto- Live like someone left the gate open!

name: The Circles Condo
description: Enjoy yourself at this beautiful 3 bedroom house in the prestigious Circles neighborhood! This home is in a safe neighborhood and close to the Ohio State University and the Short North District. Who is this property a great fit for? - Groups of 2 or more (small groups welcome too). - Guests looking to be close to The Ohio State University and Short North. - Traveling nurses, doctor or professors. Who is the property not the best fit for? - Large groups of 9 or more adults. - Guests that can not climb stairs. - Guests that want to play loud music, party at the property and/or socialize outside of the property after 11 pm. THE HOUSE: The property is a two-story townhome situated in the unique Circles neighborhood. Perfect for family gatherings or visiting Ohio State University or your favorite college student. Here are some details on this amazing home: -3 bedrooms. -2 bathroom. -1,400 sq. ft. of indoor living space. -On-street permit parking spots. -Large living area, perfect for entert
host_about:
What's up fellow Airbnbers!

Thanks for checking out my profile! Hopefully, I get to connect with you further through hosting you at one of my properties or staying as your guest on Airbnb. 

For me, Airbnb fulfills two of my life's biggest passions; technology and real estate. 

My first stay in an Airbnb came in 2013 while I was on a trip with my roommate to Spain.  Since then I have always been enthusiastic about experiencing unique homes in foreign places through the Airbnb platform. It wasn't until 2017, that I opened up my first Airbnb and I now wish I hadn't waited so long!! 

I've been investing in real estate since 2008 when I house hacked my way to my first investment property. Since that first deal, I have done dozens of real estate investments, from campus rentals to fix and flips. All along the way, I have looked at ways technology could help me invest.   As a certified millennial and real estate investor, it doesn't get much better then Airbnb.  

Here is a little more about me:

I was born and raised in Akron, Ohio, went to The Ohio State University and lived in Ohio for the first 26 years of my life. So I guess you might say I am a good 'ol midwestern boy but with one caveat, I inherited the traveling gene from my parents. It is hard keeping up with those two, they have visited all 50 states and are now retirees traveling the world. 

In 2013, on a surprisingly sunny February day in Columbus, OH, while dressed in head to toe denim for a charity bar crawl, I met my now wife, Danica (see, Ohio is for lovers ;-). Together we decided to move to California and then Arizona where we currently reside.  

Today, I fulfill my desire for technology as a Technical Project Manager while expanding my experience as a remote real estate investor. 

My other interests include:

- Competitive sports (mostly basketball).
- Exercise (but only so I can keep up with my wife).
- Experiencing new things, especially food (yes, I am a foodie).
- Hanging out with friends and family.

As I head into my 30's I am looking forward to growing my presence on Airbnb. I am excited for the experiences that I will have and the people I will meet as both a host and a guest.

THE HOUSE: The property is a two-story townhome situated in the Franklin Park neighborhood. Perfect for work trips in Downtown Columbus or visiting the Franklin P
host_about:
What's up fellow Airbnbers!

Thanks for checking out my profile! Hopefully, I get to connect with you further through hosting you at one of my properties or staying as your guest on Airbnb. 

For me, Airbnb fulfills two of my life's biggest passions; technology and real estate. 

My first stay in an Airbnb came in 2013 while I was on a trip with my roommate to Spain.  Since then I have always been enthusiastic about experiencing unique homes in foreign places through the Airbnb platform. It wasn't until 2017, that I opened up my first Airbnb and I now wish I hadn't waited so long!! 

I've been investing in real estate since 2008 when I house hacked my way to my first investment property. Since that first deal, I have done dozens of real estate investments, from campus rentals to fix and flips. All along the way, I have looked at ways technology could help me invest.   As a certified millennial and real estate investor, it doesn't get much better then Airbnb.  

Here is a little more about me:

I was born and raised in Akron, Ohio, went to The Ohio State University and lived in Ohio for the first 26 years of my life. So I guess you might say I am a good 'ol midwestern boy but with one caveat, I inherited the traveling gene from my parents. It is hard keeping up with those two, they have visited all 50 states and are now retirees traveling the world. 

In 2013, on a surprisingly sunny February day in Columbus, OH, while dressed in head to toe denim for a charity bar crawl, I met my now wife, Danica (see, Ohio is for lovers ;-). Together we decided to move to California and then Arizona where we currently reside.  

Today, I fulfill my desire for technology as a Technical Project Manager while expanding my experience as a remote real estate investor. 

My other interests include:

- Competitive sports (mostly basketball).
- Exercise (but only so I can keep up with my wife).
- Experiencing new things, especially food (yes, I am a foodie).
- Hanging out with friends and family.

As I head into my 30's I am looking forward to growing my presence on Airbnb. I am excited for the experiences that I will have and the people I will meet as both a host and a guest.

With common areas on the entire 1st floor and part of the 3rd floor, plus 3 private bedrooms there is plenty of space for groups and families to spread out. Features:  Hardwood floors in living areas. Original features such as, decorative fireplace and pocket doors.  Ceiling fans in the living room, dining room, and both second floor bedrooms.  Carpet on second floor.  New kitchen with updated appliances.  Central A/C.  High efficiency furnace. Washer and dryer included along with detergent.  One on street parking pass provided. host_about: Jarrod and I both have a love of travel.  We have spent a number of years traveling the country.  Spending time on the west coast, east coast, and a few places in between, we have used AirBNB and other services to facilitate our stays in furnished, private residences for a  few days up to a few months at a time.  A great experience depends on a great property in the right location and great service from the host.  As fellow travelers, we want to provide you that great experience.  We are excited to open our property and  neighborhood up to travelers looking to visit Columbus.  We spent years updating and restoring our 100+ years old property, and while we were working, our neighborhood also revitalized adding many wonderful food and entertainment options.  Whether you stick to 4th St and the Short North for your fun or go exploring through the wider Columbus, we look forward to showing off our home and hometown.  Even if you decide to not stay with us, have a great time in Columbus, there is a lot of great things to discover.

host_about:
Hello! My name is Brandon and I am a young professional living in Columbus, Ohio. I'm an Ohio native, born and raised in Northwest Ohio. I graduated undergrad from THE Ohio State University, moved to Chicago where I lived and worked for a few years, and have now happily settled back down in Columbus. I work for L Brands, the parent company of Victoria's Secret and Bath & Body Works, one of the many retail companies headquartered here in Columbus. I am currently pursuing my Masters of Business Administration at Purdue University via a hybrid on-campus/online program. 
I enjoy traveling whenever and wherever I can, though I definitely prefer someplace warmer when given the option :) Though I love traveling, I am a Columbus fanboy at heart and am always happy to talk about all of the great things to experience here. I'm a very easy going guy, so feel free to ask me any questions that may be on your mind! Happy traveling!

description: I'm honored you chose my property. During your stay, you'll share a spacious 1,100 square feet apartment with other house guests. You'll love the proximity to downtown, comfy living, in an up and coming neighborhood that is being gentrified. As last minute cancellations are costly - My place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers who are committed to their booking dates. The property is ideally located 5 minutes from COSI and Downtown Columbus - only a 8 minute drive to the Convention Center. Minutes from restaurants, entertainment and the business sectors. Simply take either Town or Broad Street East for a quick 5 minute ride to downtown Columbus. Situated in Franklinton, the property enjoys a quiet, mature neighborhood. The property is a two story side by side twin double (aka duplex). The adjacent unit is occupied by a tenant.  You will have a private bedroom upstairs and share community areas downstairs with other house guests.  When you enter the property
host_about:
Howdy! I'm Jake. I'm originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I'm a real estate investor and by night I'm a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I've been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother's advice, "Jakey, live with NO REGRETS" (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that? And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

name: Westbear CT house
description: This is a 2 bathroom, 3 bedroom house 1.5 miles away from Doctor's Hospital in Columbus in a quiet, residential neighborhood. The student will have a private room with a bed, garage or street parking, and a bathroom that may be shared with one other student. Clean linens and a towel will be provided. The student will have access to WiFi, washing machine, dryer, refrigerator, Netflix, stove, and dishes/utensils during the stay. There are no pets in the house. The upstairs is private and meant for guests. The living room and kitchen are shared. I am an ophthalmology medical resident, so I am out of the house during typical buisness hours. I am around for sociallizing more on the weekends. The neighborhood is quiet and residential. Transportation is better if you have a car, but there is Lyft and Uber. There also is a bus stop about a half mile away form the house.
host_about: I am an ophthalmology medical resident working at Doctors Hospital in Columbus. I greatly enjoy meeting travelers from all over and I will do my best to make sure your visit here is enjoyable!

name: Skyline Mid-Mod Loft-Downtown / Convention Center
description: Great views, balcony & mid-mod decor in heart of Downtown Columbus a short walk to Convention Center, Arena District, Short North, Riverfront & Capitol Square. Restaurants, cafes, pubs at your doorstep! Luxuriously furnished, quality fixtures, private bedroom. HD cable TV & Wi-Fi, in-unit W/D. STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES / EVENTS, AND NO PETS. See RESIDENTIAL RENTAL AGREEMENT under House Rules. The property is approx. 885sf setup as a true 1br/1ba with private bedroom. Bathroom with shower/tub also serves as a laundry room. There is a private balcony with an nice view of the downtown skyline. Guests will be provided access instructions no later than the morning of their day of arrival. Host is a licensed real estate broker in Ohio and lives locally. Feel free to call, text or email during your stay for questions or concerns. Property within 1-2 blocks of many popular dining & entertainment venues along Gay St between High St and 3rd St (Due Amici, Pub Mahone, Tip Top, Caf
host_about: I'm a Realtor from Columbus, OH specialize in urban condominium sales and rentals. I'm also an AirBnB Superhost with 8+ AirBnB's under management.

name: Cozy apartment  5 minutes from downtown Columbus!
description: We are located on a quiet cul-de-sac near the heart of Grandview, a lovely suburb of Columbus. This is our home, so you will see personal photos, houseplants, and other personal items. We love the location of our home. The tenants on the other side are very willing to help answer any of your questions. The entire apartment is for your use. In the basement is a washer and dryer for your use. Any of the supplies in the kitchen, including spices, oils and more, are yours to use. There are toys in the living room and the second bedroom. Please return the toys to their storage spots before check out. We share time between our home here and our home in Oregon. When guests are staying in our Columbus home we are often in Oregon, on Pacific Time (3 hours behind Columbus). However, we are very responsive to text messages and phone calls. Beautiful, quaint neighborhood. Great access to  the Ohio State University and their world-famous hospitals, the Short North, the Arena District and much more!

name: King Size, Quiet Sleep
description: Located an easy 4 miles to OSU and a convenient 7 miles to downtown our warm, Clintonville home is located on the Olentangy River! Adjacent to the bike trail with access from our back yard. Kayakers and canoers alike enjoy the desirable proximity to the river. You will be welcomed in through our large rooms to the stairway leading to your private room and bathroom. Our cats may give you a friendly meow! We look forward to meeting you, showing you around and sharing the details about the town! Your cozy room is fit for a King! With fresh, soft sheets and plenty of fluffy pillows you'll enjoy the King bed while sleeping soundly in this quiet room. A more than ample closet is available for your use as well. Just a door down you'll find your brightly tiled bathroom ready for you with towels and necessities. We'd love to meet and chat with you as much or little as you like. We are friendly and full of great information yet will give you all the space and privacy you need. Our neighborhood
host_about: I am a retired Telecommunications Consultant.

name: XL Modern 2BR Condo-Downtown / Convention Center
description: XL urban condo w/garage parking a short walk to Arena District & Short North, Convention Center, Downtown Riverfront, Capitol Sq, dining & entertainment. Granite, polished concrete floors, 2 private BRs, 2.5 bathrooms, eat-in kitchen w/island, W/D. Quiet end unit. STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES / EVENTS. 30-DAY+ STAYS (Submit Inquiry for shorter stays; other properties avail.). Great discounts for 30-day+ stays! Try your dates to see! Ask about bigger discounts for multi-month stays. Ultra modern design w/new polished concrete floors & granite tile throughout (no carpet). Upscale furniture w/designer touches. Cable TV, Wi-Fi internet. Kitchen is fully equipped including gas range, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, toaster oven, coffee maker, tea/water boiler, cookware, all utensils. In-unit washer/dryer (LG Steam Washer all-in-one W/D). Walk-in closet. The listing is for the entire property. Landlord is a licensed real estate broker in Ohio and lives locally. Feel free to
host_about: I'm a Realtor from Columbus, OH specialize in urban condominium sales and rentals. I'm also an AirBnB Superhost with 8+ AirBnB's under management.

name: The Color Flat (Downtown, GV, So. Orchards)
description: Charming and upbeat decor lift your spirits while thoughtful amenities comfort the body. Perfect for families of all kinds from the one you were born with to the one you may have chosen, The Color Flat is a lovely home base for any Columbus adventure. 1 mile or less German Village, Schiller Park, and Nationwide Children's Hospital; 2-3 miles from Franklin Park, Columbus Museum of Art, CCAD, Convention Center, and Ohio Theatre; and is only 300 ft from a bus line.  Enjoy easy access to 71 as well. At The Color Flat you will have a complete 2 bedroom apartment to yourself. One bedroom features a queen bed and large closet. The second houses a set of bunk beds and an additional closet. There is a single full bathroom accessible via the common dining area, a small TV/sitting room with an additional sofa bed, and a full kitchen.  Basement access can be provided on request to long term guests in need of laundry facilities. If you are uncomfortable in urban environments you may prefer a more e
host_about:
Welcome!   I take great pride in maintaining the cleanliness and comfort of my listings. They are all managed and maintained by my kids and me. I am a single mother, curator, and artist working to make my family, my city, and your stay the best it can be.  Don't hesitate to reach out to me for tips on where to go and what to do. I've got the inside scoop on kid-friendly family activities as well as off the beaten track cultural events.  

Also, I'm a virgo, so you know my house is CLEAN!

xoxo
Agnes

name: Modern, VERY Spacious 3-BR home 90 secs off 270-E
description: Spacious, modern, comfortable home just seconds from I-270 & I-70.  Have the entire 3 BR house in a quiet neighborhood to yourself with great parking and VERY quick access to the rest of Columbus. Enjoy breakfast with lots of coffee options in the morning!  Watch Netflix, Hulu, antenna cable on the 75" TV! Unlock the front door with a unique security code.. and find a dozen thoughtful amenities, clean towels, clean sheets... we've thought of everything to make sure you love your time with us. This house has just been renovated, and we are opening up for guests at a discounted rate during the pre-launch.  Everything is completely updated from the floors and walls to light fixtures and curtains.  Come stay with us and provide feedback on how we've done so far! The beds are very comfortable, there are TVs in every room...  Two full baths and a GIANT dining room table next to the fully stocked kitchen.  You'll probably want to move in by the end of your stay! Access the Living Room, all th
host_about:
Since I travel so much, I've used Airbnb for a long time, and love it! 

...And since I can't live in my house, I might as well open it up to the community!  I look forward to hosting you, or staying with you during my travels!

name: LUXURY BRAND NEW 3BR/3BA TOWNHOME W/ROOFTOP PATIO!
description: This stunning 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhome will not disappoint! Our home is brand new and finished construction in January 2019. High end finishes and stainless steel appliances. There is private parking with garage access in the back, as well as on-street parking out front. Large walk in closets and plenty of storage space if you need it. This townhome occupies the top two floors. Open layout with a beautiful, spacious master on the main floor. The top floor features 2 additional bedrooms, a minibar, and rooftop patio with views of the neighborhood and the downtown Columbus skyline. Our home can accommodate up to 16 people comfortably with the common space sleeping options available. The kitchen is fully stocked and there is a brand new washer and dryer in the laundry room. Comfortable memory foam mattresses and brand new furniture and linens! Outdoor furniture NOT available during the winter. Guests will have access to the entire property. As hosts, we are available as needed and

name: High St  Retreat- STR Capital
description: Built in 2018, these units are brand and were designed with the traveler in mind. Enough space for a family or group of friends to settle in. Plus the added work space, high speed internet and quiet work areas through out the complex.  Centrally located in Columbus, this unit is across the street from the Ohio State University. Minutes from downtown, short north, you can't beat this location. We try to craft each unit with the guest in mind, we believe the little touches go a long way. Full access to the entire unit. the Ohio State University, downtown and short north have everything that travelers will need, if you are looking for recommendations please let us know.
host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

name: Convenient and centralized location
description: Enjoy your nights in the memorabilia filled room. 5 minutes from numerous food locations and shopping options, as well as being 15 minutes from almost every central location including downtown. Enjoy  access to a gym facility as well as scenic lakes to take a stroll around. Feel free to message me anytime. Quiet neighborhood with friendly neighbors...and maybe if you're lucky you'll get to see the peacock that likes to cruise around the complex. Uber and Lyft are usually available as well as a bus route nearby. I have a friendly feline present.

name: Cozy 2 Bedroom Stay in Franklinton
description: Welcome! My goal is to provide a home away from home to all my guests! Whether you're visiting OSU, here for a convention, or simply looking to get away, my place is an excellent choice. I am centrally located, just west of downtown in the "up and coming" Franklinton area. I'm just a few blocks away from Mount Carmel Hospital and about 1.5 miles away from COSI, the Scioto Mile, and the new Veteran's Memorial Museum downtown! This listing is for 2 separate, private bedrooms in my 3 bedroom home. The first bedroom is on the second floor of this 3 story duplex. It is fully furnish with a queen bed, closet, bed bench, and accent chair to relax in. The second bedroom is also on the second floor with queen bed, plenty of shelving and storage, closet, and great lighting during the day. Guests have full access to the living room, kitchen, backyard and of course the bathroom! I have extra storage in the kitchen for food, a coffee bar and some complimentary breakfast snacks. The living room has
host_about:
I was born and raised in Oregon. I went to school at the University of Georgia where I graduated with an Engineering Degree and swam and competed for the university at the NCAA level all four years. 

I've lived and worked in Columbus since 2013. I currently work for AEP as a civil engineer and am also a real estate investor and Realtor part time. 

Columbus is a great City and I'm excited to be on Airbnb as a host. I look forward to welcoming you into this city as well as my home!

name: ? COZY CARRIAGE HOUSE ? 2 BEDROOMS ?
description: 2 story, renovated carriage house in historic Olde Towne East is a perfect place to stay while visiting, exploring, or working in Columbus, OH! It's only a couple miles from downtown, Short North, and The Ohio State University campus. The property is completely separate from the main house and includes its own private yard and entrance. There are two parking spots in the back of the house. The living room has a couch, extra seating, TV, small reading area, and washer/dryer. There is no cable, but access to Netflix, Hulu, and other TV apps from a Roku.  Both bedrooms are equipped with comfortable queen beds and plenty of closet space. The kitchen is complete with dishes, silverware, a Keurig coffee maker, and large table to enjoy your meals or get work done. Guests will enter through a private gate at the back of our property. There is room for one parked vehicle along the carriage house as well as a spot for one vehicle on the parking pad. Guests will have complete privacy and access t
host_about: I am from Columbus, OH and love the opportunities that AirBnb creates for both guests and hosts!

name: Beautiful home in the heart of Italian Village
description: This entire home is ideally located in the hippest part of Italian Village. This listing includes both the top and bottom unit of an entire house.  In the heart of Italian Village, a short walk to the Short North, and a quick drive up High Street to OSU Campus. The space will make you feel like you're in a jeweled oasis. It's perfect for out-of-town visitors wanting to see this vibrant part of the city or locals looking for a stay-cation This listing includes two separate one bedroom apartments.  An upstairs unit as well as a bottom unit.  They are not internally connected and each has it's own separate private entrance.  Perfect for families and friends who want to be nearby when traveling but have their own private space as well.  There is an outside patio with  Cornhole and backyard Jenga available for use. We are available for questions/concerns as well as recommendations before and during your stay. This apt sits in an amazing locations:  within steps to Seventh Son Brewery, Fox i

name: Perfect 1BR apt in Short North close to OSU, DWTN
description: Beautiful Victorian building in the Short North filled with plenty of nightlife, restaurants, cafes, and art galleries.  There is free wifi, laundry, tv with Netflix and full kitchen. Parking is on the street. OSU campus is .9 miles away. Nationwide Arena is .9 miles away. Short North is steps away. German Village is 2 miles away. Ohio Capital/Statehouse is 1.7 miles away. COSI Science Center/National Veterans Museum are 2.9 miles away. This is 1 bedroom apt and has queen size bed with bathroom in it. We also have another queen bed in the living room with leather couch. Also blow up mattress on request. Comes with complete kitchen and has desk and 500 mp wifi. Have access to anything in the apartment. We ask that if you use any dishes to wash them please and to make sure not to leave any food in the fridge or cupboards. For immediate assistance we are just phone call or text away, but please communicate through the App for accountability as much as possible, if you need anything or any
host_about:
Love to travel and host! I call Columbus home for the last 12 years and happy to
Answer any questions!

name: King room close to OSU/Riverside (30 day min)
description: Due to changing laws in the City of Columbus I will now just be doing 30 DAY stays or longer until I figure everything out! Great corner room in a quiet neighborhood close to OSU and Riverside Hospital. Big closet for clothes and a cube storage  Relax on the chair by the windows and put your feet up on the ottoman  In a bath and half house with access to kitchen and laundry room! Great budget place for short term as well Nice place but not a 5star hotel! Dated house from the 60s with a modern remodel of the bedroom  to look like an IKEA place! King size memory foam mattress  Chair and ottoman to relax before bed! Cube storage and big closet with shelving Guest have access to kitchen, bathrooms, living room and laundry I'm around some but not a lot Quiet neighborhood with young families and old people! Car is definitely the best to get around in Columbus but there is a bus stop at the end of the street about a 10min walk. There are also Lime bikes and scooters and Bird scooters around.
host_about:
I work to travel and sometimes travel to work! I have a production company filming weddings and events. Also have a handyman business in Columbus and travel some for that as well. When I go into a town the first thing I look for is the good coffee shops and local breweries!
Looking forwarding to meeting fellow travelers and host!

More information:  We are just a 5 minute Uber ride to the Short North Arts District, Columbus Convention Center, Arena District, Columbus Commons, and Capital University. This newly renovated 3 story home offers granite countertops in the kitchen,  2 stone fireplaces, family style dining, and bedrooms styled with comfort in mind.  Enjoy the  private 3rd floor family suite fully furnished with a queen bed, a comfy pull out twin bed, a work-friendly desk area, and a place to set up a provided pack- n- play for the little ones. name: "Exclusive 3 Bedroom" Historical Columbus Home
description: This location is just minutes from downtown, OSU east hospital, and Franklin park. This location is exclusively yours. I am available, if needed. From my location, the Ohio State stadium is 7.8 miles (12 mins), Easton is 8.7 miles (15 mins) for restaurants and shopping, the nationwide area district 2.4 miles (9mins) for events, and the short north is 4.3 miles (10mins) for restaurants and is great for the night life.

name: LUXURY 3BR/3BA TOWNHOME W/ GAME ROOM!
description: This stunning 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhome will not disappoint! Our home is brand new and finished construction in January 2019. High end finishes and stainless steel appliances. There is private parking with garage access in the back, as well as on-street parking out front. Large walk in closets and plenty of storage space if you need it. Open layout with plenty of space and a beautiful first floor master.  The lower level features 2 additional bedrooms and a game room with a ping pong table, media area, and plenty of seating. You also have access to a fenced in back patio. Our home can accommodate up to 16 people comfortably with the common space sleeping options available. The kitchen is fully stocked and there is a brand new Samsung washer and dryer in the laundry room. Comfortable memory foam mattresses and brand new furniture and linens! Guests will have access to the entire property. As hosts, we are available as needed and happy to accommodate special requests when possible

name: Affordable Short North 1BR - mins to everything!
description: Beautiful Victorian building in the Short North filled with plenty of nightlife, restaurants, cafes, and art galleries.  The apartment has free wifi, laundry, tv with Netflix and a full kitchen. Parking is on the street. OSU campus is .9 miles away. Nationwide Arena is .9 miles away. Short North is steps away. German Village is 2 miles away. Ohio Capital/Statehouse is 1.7 miles away. COSI Science Center/National Veterans Museum are 2.9 miles away. This is 1 bedroom apartment with a queen size bed and bathroom. The living room has futon couch, and there is a blow up mattress upon request. Just off the living room is a complete kitchen and the entire unit has  500 mp wifi. Guests have access to anything in the apartment. We ask that if you use any dishes to wash them please and to not to leave any food in the fridge or cupboards. For immediate assistance we are just phone call or text away, but please communicate through the App for accountability as much as possible, if you need anythin
host_about:
Love to travel and host! I call Columbus home for the last 12 years and happy to
Answer any questions!

name: Columbus Neil Home
description: This home is the perfect place to stay whether you are here for business, visiting friends and family or just to visit the city! Sleeps six in comfy queen sized beds, making it perfect for large groups or families. The home also has 2 couches that pull out into full beds allowing for extra guests. Fully equipped kitchen, living room and everything you need. Walking distance to Short North. Parks very near home. Guests have access to the whole home. If you need anything, please send us a message and we will try to assist you to the best of our ability. Home is located in the beautiful area of Columbus known as Victorian Village. You may park on the street directly in front of the house.   You may also park up to two cars next door at the BP Gas Station along the side of the house.   Please do not block the entrance way to the gas station and do not block the dumpsters.  BP gas station is not responsible for any damages to your vehicle.   Please do not leave valuables in plain site and l
host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners, Nick and Billy (pictured with Brian Chesky, founder or Airbnb).
We are originally from Canton, Ohio and now reside in the Cleveland area. We both graduated from The Ohio State University and started hosting on Airbnb in 2013. We started Cleveland House Hotels, which is a short term vacation property company in 2015.  We have a full time cleaning staff and maintenance person on hand to take care of any issues.  We also have our reservations specialist, Georgia who will be the one responding to your requests.

Niko (Nick) has been in the hospitality business for many years, having worked in hotels and restaurants.  He owns a small diner in Old Brooklyn called Gus's Family Restaurant.  He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.  

Billy is a co-founder and CEO of Cleveland House Hotels.  Billy is a successful real estate investor and has been in the sales business for over 15 years.  He loves traveling and spending time with his son, William.  

Georgia is our reservations and marketing specialist.  Georgia graduated from Cleveland State University in Marketing.  She enjoys creating her own art and loves spending time with her dog Mario.

name: The Pineapple - Italian Village Home w/Parking
description: We affectionately call this home "The Pineapple" because just as a pineapple is the international symbol of welcome and hospitality, this house makes you feel like you are at home, even when you are away. In a perfect location for enjoying all Columbus has to offer.  Located in historic and urban Italian Village our inviting 3 bedroom, 2 bath home with off-street parking,  allows for a lovely personal retreat where you can relax close to the city's best restaurants, galleries, and shops. Our classic two story home offers all the amenities in a home away from home.   It's great for small groups and perfect for entertaining.   The living room features a comfy couch, great for relaxing chit chats and even for TV binging, matching cozy large chair, a serene stone wall and remote control electric fireplace.  The wall mounted TV has a Roku connected.  The dining room offers a great gathering place for dining, game playing and memory making.  We have many decks of cards in the buffet and some

name: Chic Townhome minutes to Franklin Park & Downtown
description: Welcome to this beautifully recently remodeled Townhome in diverse, trendy and transitioning part of Columbus, minutes from downtown. Enjoy the rich history of the neighborhood and become part of the trendsetting changes! Located on a street full of mansions, down the street from Franklin Park, easy access to highway and minutes from shopping and the airport. You will love this fully renovated space with beautifully crafted details. You will not want to miss this marvelous townhome experience! As you enter the home you are greeted with a cozy living room with beautiful fireplace and eating area. Around the corner you will find a beautiful kitchen equipped with stainless appliances, open shelving and concrete countertops.  On the upper level are 2 full size bedrooms beautifully furnished with queen beds, one with a grand fireplace and also a 3rd bedroom equipped with a comfortable Trundle Daybed.  The back of the home has available additional parking. 3 Bedrooms 1.5 baths 2 Queen size b

name: Beautiful 3 bedroom secluded 1925 home Sept. 2019
description: A classic historic 1920's home in a beautiful, quiet, spacious setting in the Clintonville area of the city. We are seeking a three to four week rental for September, 2019 (we are Super Hosts for a single room the other 11 months).  It is just a a block to the bus; Minutes to downtown, Ohio State, Ohio Fairgrounds.  Jan and I will be traveling and looking for a family that would enjoy our totally furnished home and garden for a month.  Contact us if you are interested. Our home is located on the edge of the Overbrook Ravine, surrounded by woods, gardens and tranquility.  Right in the heart of Columbus, this house, built in the 1920's is tucked away on large parcel of land and has maintained much of the original unusual character of the house.  The spacious bed rooms are upstairs, overlooking the tree tops of the ravine.  One of the bedrooms is en-suite and has a private outdoor porch.  The other bedrooms share an adjacent  private bath with a soaking tub (or shower). There is also a 4t

name: Old Town Retreat
description: First floor duplex in the historic Olde Towne East neighborhood. This urban home provides ample privacy and a convenient location near downtown Columbus. There is one bedroom with a new queen sized, memory foam mattress and the living room has a sleeper sofa for additional guests. Standard appliances and WiFi are provided. The host is available should you have any concern, but will not be in the same building, so interaction is limited. The living room has a high ceiling and plenty of space to relax.  There's a 47" tv with chromecast.  The kitchen is small, but features new appliances.  The house is over 100 years old and full of quirky charm. What it lacks in high end furnishings, it makes up for with its proximity to downtown Columbus and ample living space. You have the entire apartment and a private entrance. I will show up quickly if there's a maintenance issue. I'm also available via text or call. Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historic Near East Side of Columbu
host_about:
I am a Designer who lives in Columbus Ohio. 

I love traveling, thrifting, exercise and exploring new cities!

name: Daisy-Darla
description: Overlooking the water and fountain.  Large front porch with sunset nightly. Quiet neighborhood with lots of places that are close like gym, grocery, movies, restaurants. I will be available by phone to answer and questions and most likely I will be home as well. Close to freeway
host_about: Mid 30s female who loves to travel

name: Luxury 1BD OldeTowne GuestHouse Steps to Downtown!
description: Our guesthouse is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bath  with outdoor living spaces in the heart of Olde Towne East just 1 mile from Downtown Columbus Located in a quiet neighborhood filled with hip restaurants and great bars, this home is the perfect place to stay while working, visiting, or exploring Columbus. The 3 room guest house is has just been completely updated with a new bathroom and our signature "most comfortable beds in Columbus" mattress. Our guest house is perfect for the work traveler visiting Columbus by themselves, a couple visiting town, or a small group of people looking for a budget friendly option with excellent accessibility to all Columbus has to offer.  The bedroom has a queen bed and TV. The living room has a futon, air mattress, and a TV. All TV's come equipped with cable and the guest house has dedictaed wifi. We also offer a walk-in shower and work space for your convenience.  Our one-story guest house has private entrance, free street parking, private patio, and yar
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

name: Cozy German Village Experience
description: My two bedroom condo in German Village offers unbeatable access to many local favorite attractions such as Kittie's Cakes and The Book Loft.  The brick lined streets of the village set it apart from the rest of Columbus and signify a passion for preserving the history of the area.  I enjoy being known for my quirky charm when it comes to decor (and life in general). Guests enjoy feeling at home in a lived in space with a lot of character. My space feels like home - assuming you are someone who enjoys quirky decor and Netflix. It is also extremely close to the best parts of German Village as well as the southern portion of downtown Columbus. If renting the full home, you can use both bedrooms, the bathroom, living room, and kitchen. I will be available via the Airbnb platform or phone/text as needed during your stay. I'm happy to offer additional suggestions for places to visit. German Village is unlike any other part of Columbus. Visitors come for annual events such as the Village Valu
host_about:
Avid traveler and runner  :) Always up for an adventure.  LOVE my Ohio State Buckeyes!

Proud mom to the one and only Dexter, my puppy with a massive underbite that no one can resist.

I have absolutely loved using Airbnb to find unique and incredible places to stay...everywhere from San Francisco, to Hawaii, to my neighboring metro, Cincinnati, Ohio. I also love hosting and am so happy to be able to welcome people to my home in German Village!  It's been my long time favorite part of Columbus.

name: German Village - Private Twin
description: My cozy condo in German Village offers unbeatable access to many local favorite attractions such as Kittie's Cakes and The Book Loft. I enjoy being known for my quirky charm when it comes to decor (and life in general). Guests enjoy feeling at home in a lived in space with a lot of character. Depending on the length of your stay and nature of the visit, my adorable dog Dexter may be on site. He is ~20lb mutt with a huge underbite. He's very friendly. *If you prefer no pets, I may be able to have a sitter for him during your stay. I will likely be on site during your stay and available via the Airbnb platform or phone/text as needed during your stay. I'm happy to offer additional suggestions for places to visit. name: Fancy Find in German Village close to Downtown
description: Great location in German Village.  Furnished with 2 king beds & more.  Large bathroom with luxurious walk in shower & double vanity sink. It has a high walk able score of 72 indicating most errands can be done on foot. However, CoGo offers bikes for rent for less than $10 a day. One block from Thurman's Cafe and other local bars and restaurants.  Less than a 10 minute drive into the heart of downtown Columbus, The Convention Center, COSI, Arena district, The Brewery District, etc. The whole house is available to guests. Except basement door is locked. This townhome has a wall between it and 1 other home. Both homes are available to book for guests. Fantastic for groups that want to be close to each other but have there own space. Both homes share the patio and backyard grill when entertaining. We provide a convenient keyless entry. A few days before arrival each guest will receive a unique code that unlocks the Smartlock. Guests have access to the whole house. Door to the unfinished ba
host_about: Hi, I'm Tommy!  I met my wife Errin here in Columbus, OH.  We're proud to call this our home.  We enjoy a wide range of activities that Columbus has to offer.  Including riding our bikes on one of the many scenic bike paths offered around town; going to a Clippers or Blue Jackets game, Ohio State University football tailgating; grabbing a bite to eat at a Cameron Mitchell Restaurant; and my wife loves to shop at Easton Town Center and Tanger Outlets. I love a good book.  I spend my Saturday mornings on my front porch with a book in hand and a cup of coffee.  My favorite travel destination is Washington DC because I love history and could spend hours at the Museum.  My wife prefers the sunshine, warm sand, and the smell of the ocean. We hope that you choose our home during your stay.  We have put a lot of careful thought into the details to make it a home away from home whether you're a business traveler or in town for pleasure.

name: recently renovated 2 story.close to everything-B
description: enjoy all the best of columbus within walking distance to the ohio state university,the horseshoe,schottenstein ctr walking/bicycling path one block away.short distance to ohio state fairgrounds,mapfre (crew stadium) the short north clintonville and downtown columbus.

name: Urban B&B Retreat
description: This is an urban retreat in the center of downtown Columbus.  This bed and breakfast offers the conveniences of the city with Restaurants just three blocks away but is located on a quiet street with a beautiful court yard behind the building. This space is very unique because it is very secluded with a green space in the back of the building where you will enter the home but is in the center of downtown Columbus.  You will have access to the entire loft b&b along with a deck that overlooks the whole city skyline and a courtyard where you will be able to enjoy the flowers (in the warmer months), a little bit of nature and fire pit on nice evenings. This space is very comfortable and we aim to make your stay as stress free and relaxing as possible.  We provide all toiletries such as razors, deodorant Qtips, toothpaste, cotton balls, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, washer and dryer detergent and softener.  We also provide a stocked fridge with many breakfa

name: Bold Studio at 250 High
description: Columbus is a midwest delight - a booming city known for its passion for college football and its excellent theater, museums, music and culture. From the historic German Village to the lively restaurants and bars in Short North, you can enjoy it all from your Stay Alfred travel apartment. These bright, modern apartments are equipped with big ol' windows - so you can gaze out over the view of Columbus and get excited about all of the great things you'll do during your stay. Don't forget to bring your yoga pants - so you can find your zen at the yoga studio at the end of a long day of exploring. We believe in personal space. Prior to your arrival, your unit will be professionally cleaned and your self guided check in process ensures easy arrival with no long lines. Should you need us, we're here 24/7 with our guest services team and local folks on the ground. And if you don't need us, we'll stay out of your way. After all, this is your place in the city. Just three blocks west of your ap

Stay Alfred was created based on the idea of offering short term rentals at an unbelievable price while making the booking process easy and problem free. Stay Alfred acquires properties in high-end buildings and condominiums in the best locations to ensure your stay is satisfying and you want to come back. Since we value your return business, we always offer discounts to those who stay in any of our units time after time. We want you to feel at home when you stay with us and that's why you will always be greeted with a professionally cleaned unit and quality furnishings. name: Beautiful One Bed at 250 High

Ohio has always been home-base but we've also enjoyed living and working in the rural Southwest - on the Navajo reservation, and in the East African country of Tanzania for a number of years. Travel around Europe has been a favorite and we look forward to returning to Scotland for another Highland adventure someday soon.

High Street, German Village, and Downtown restaurants/bars are all a quick walk/uber from of our condo. We have parking directly outside the condo, an accessible fenced in backyard, washer/dryer, and all kitchen/bathroom ammenities provided. Location, location, location! We are located near the best Columbus has to offer. This is an ideal condo for couples, families, or groups of friends! We love this area & layout so much that we live in one of the other condos on the street. Our condo has been updated with brand new mattresses and furniture throughout the place. The house has 2 large bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, all located on the second floor. On the first floor, we have a pull-out couch, kitchen table w/ 4 chairs, and a large TV w/ cable.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

The home features tasteful decor, exposed brick walls, polished concrete floors, stainless steel appliances, white granite counters, all the while providing all the amenities for an easy & enjoyable trip, including: hi speed Wi-Fi, smart T.V with cable, towels + linens, shampoo + conditioner, breakfast bars + coffee/tea. 1 Queen Bed -PACK&PLAY AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST The entire unit I am always available via the airbnb app or text/call. The Short North is the most vibrant neighborhood in Columbus

name: Updated Olde Towne East 2BR -  5 Min to Downtown!
description: My property is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom brick townhouse style duplex with private entrances on each side of the building located in the Olde Towne East neighborhood of downtown Columbus, Ohio. Conveniently located close to (within 10 minutes) to downtown, the Short North arts district, and Ohio State University campus. Both bedrooms include memory foam mattresses.  There is also a queen sleeper sofa in the living room. One bedroom includes a large executive desk, great for business travelers or anyone that needs a workspace and there is extremely fast internet on the property (400MB/s) with a USB-C dock that can be connected to a laptop to use the monitor, mouse and keyboard. The kitchen is small but is sufficient for anyone that wants to cook their own meals. You are able to access the entire place. We are hands-off hosts but are available as needed! Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio and is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

Guests will have access to entire house Either myself or my friends David and Jewelie will be available at all times to answer any questions you may have The origins of the neighborhood date back to the 19th century where freed and escaped slaves from across the Confederate South began to settle in Columbus.   The City of Columbus initiated the King-Lincoln District Plan in 2001, a comprehensive revitalization plan aiming to improve the economic well-being and quality of life in the district.  Today the neighborhood boasts a diverse and involved community with immediate access to downtown Uber, Lyft, and Cota are convenient options with a Cota bus stop at end of street connecting to downtown

Enjoy the character and charm of this vintage brick building, with its original dark woodwork, hardwood floors, and exposed brick walls.  The building is shared with downstairs tenants - not a good place for noisy groups.  Plus... a RESERVED parking spot! Spacious second-floor apartment in a vintage brick building, located in the popular Short North Arts District and close to the OSU campus, Goodale Park, and downtown Columbus.  See the floor plan in the photos.  You will enter through the kitchen and step into the central living/dining space, with a TV area and a dining table.  All three bedrooms have QUEEN beds with memory foam mattresses.  The largest bedroom also has a convertible sofa bed which folds flat for sleeping an extra guest.  The couc
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We are a married couple in our 30s and we live in the "Short North" of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.   

Kate is from Cleveland, and Nat actually grew up in the Short North neighborhood, which has been through an incredible transformation over the last couple of decades!  Kate has also lived in North Carolina and Mississippi, and Nat spent some time in Chicago and Indianapolis - and now we are happily settled in Columbus with our dog Scout and a baby on the way!

We are both graduates of Ohio State (go bucks!) and for our day jobs, Kate is a physical therapist specializing in neurological rehabilitation and Nat is an IT project manager / handyman / stay-at-home dad.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

host_about:
I am a young professional in the Columbus Area, and I am excited to make your stay in Columbus the best it can be!
A little about me: I like sports, particularly soccer and ultimate frisbee. And in my spare time I enjoy cooking, reading, and sleeping through movies.
I have travelled all over the US, and have even made it over to Europe a few times for study abroad, service trips and just for fun :)
I graduated with a bachelor's degree in architecture from The Ohio State University, took a few years off as a preschool teacher, and now work as a designer and consultant in the home remodeling industry.
I can't wait to hear how you like this house and how I can improve as a host in the future. Thank you for considering!

description: Built in 2018, these units are brand and were designed with the traveler in mind. Enough space for a family or group of friends to settle in. Plus the added work space, high speed internet and quiet work areas through out the complex. Centrally located in Columbus, this unit is across the street from the Ohio State University. Minutes from downtown, short north, you can't beat this location.
host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

This spacious two bedroom unit comes with everything you need, enough room for the family but also a desk and great WiFi for those looking for a place to get some work done on business trips. Also equipped with full washer and dryer makes the place great for long stays! Guests will have access to the entire unit and also ever amenity the complex has to offer including two gyms, a vegas style resort pool and two club houses with some complimentary coffees and water! I want each guests to have the best experience
host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

name: GV SUMMER HAUS 3BR2.5B+2PATIOS+BALCONY 2carGARAGE
description: My Haus has got a lot of character. It's flush with creative accents and over-the-top 'touches' (think my big fat Greek wedding). It has marble everywhere (kitchen floors/counter, bathroom floors/counters, custom marble shower, marble entryway) Can't not mention the staggering "tiger-striped" hardwoods. Other than the numbing patterns, it has very inviting spaces with open floor plans, space for everyone to spread out and just relax. Conveniently located to everything. Literally can't go wrong! I pride myself on being very quick to respond and solve any problem - can be hands on if needed (if I'm in town) but have friends/family that can assist as well. This is my primary residence - so there may be a moment when I'll need to grab something I forgot (I will provide a 12 hour heads up if that's the case) Brick streets, early 20th century homes, tons of character a very small-town feel. Steps away from local shops and award winning restaurants - including the famous Thurman's Cafe 10 min
host_about:
I am a Columbus native and have lived here my whole life. I went to and graduated from THE Ohio State University where I studied finance with a specialization in investments - I am currently an investment advisor for a brokerage firm here in Columbus. This is my first real estate investment. 

Air BNB seemed like the right move for me personally as things changed in my life. I'm having a lot of fun opening up my house to others and being a host is very rewarding. I believe my house has a lot to offer and I hope you see the value in staying here. 

I look forward to hosting you soon!

name: Coming to Ohio, but Want to have that beach feel?
description: We are Beth and Scott.  We have part of a large upstairs you can use privately, which includes a very large bedroom (that makes you feel like you're at the beach), a private full bath right next to the guestroom, a private loft with a large screen TV for your use with a very comfortable reclining sectional and a treadmill! Our neighborhood is quiet with friendly people who take care of their properties .  Restaurants and shopping near as East Broad Street is just 1 mile away.

host_about: Fun, Clean, and Honest!

host_about:
After selling my first house (and my first flip!) last fall, I moved into an apartment with WAAAY too much room for my 3yo dog (named Ali) and me; so, I'm on here to fill two fully furnished bedrooms, one for a Queen and one for a King (with beds to match).

About my dog...
- I have the world's best dog, but the place is big enough to keep her apart from you (e.g. if you're allergic)
- Ali behaves like a therapy dog and has snuggled and entertained one guest's infant and one 90yo neighbor (i.e. I promise she'll get along with you)
- Ali would love to meet your furry friends (i.e. all dogs and cats are welcome)

About your stay...
- I'm a OCD-burdened Neat Freak, but I won't ask the same of you
- I'm not straight nor am I Republican, but, again, you don't have to be 
- I have a Jeep Grand Cherokee if you should need alternative transport: contact me with your details of where, when and for whom, and I'll get back to you with how and how much 
- I have a covered back porch where you're welcome to smoke, but it can't be indoors
- I'm open to all guests who are respectful toward my pup, my place and me :)

name: Northside Columbus Private Bedroom
description: Quiet private room in centralized location. This room has two single beds. We have an extra room and love to meet new people passing through! We will interact as little or as much as you would like. Ask us for recommendations we have lived in Columbus our whole lives! This house has 5 bedrooms, 4 of which are occupied for a few months then the house will be empty! all the current residents are welcoming and friendly. The house is tucked in the north side of Columbus. Within 15 minutes you can reach all Columbus major attractions. OSU, Arena District, Short North, Airport, Mapfre Stadium, and so much more! I will always be available for your questions comments or concerns This Neighborhood has plenty of food and shopping within walking distance. Very quiet family friendly community. Very close to bus routes all though Uber or Lyft is recommended.
host_about: I love to travel and meet new people, I'm Colombian and American and my wife is Brazilian and Portuguese. As we travel the world together we try to take a little piece from everywhere we go to add to our little Airbnb collection. We hope to bring more places and spaces that inspire culture yet make you feel at home as comfortable as possible. Our goal is to have a little home in each of our countries, that we can share with other explorers while we ourselves venture through this beautiful world.

name: Green Getaway in Suburban Jungle -priv. bed & bath
description: We are located in suburbs of Columbus, about a 15 minute drive to downtown, the airport, and the short north. Enjoy being close to everything with the peace and quiet of a stay in the burbs. Guests have access to their private bed and private full bath. Our basement is a second finished living room which is for guest use. Kitchen, dining room, and half bath on our first floor are shared. Happy to socialize with guests if they're interested, but also happy to respect personal privacy and space. You definitely need a car to get around, but Uber or lyft are always available. The bus line only runs twice daily to my area, so not very practical. You can Uber 5-10 minutes away and pick up a more full service bus line though, if needed.
host_about: I'm married and in my 30s, no kids. Husband and I enjoy traveling and exploring new cities!

description: The apartment is a hipster/boho chic one bedroom apartment situated in a nice quiet complex filled with young adults that includes a gym, pool, grill making it the perfect place for millennial traveling for work, those visiting friends who live in Columbus, visiting OSU for a game day, or a weekend away in one of the fastest growing cities in the country!  5 minutes to Grandview  8 minutes to the Convention Center  10 minutes to the heart of Short North  10 minutes to Ohio State Campus Guest have access to pool, workout facility, grill, and washer and dryer The guest(s) will have the apartment to themselves, but I will be in Columbus, and do my best to make myself available to guest. Available 24/7 via text/cellphone Grandview - a cute popular location for young adults - best spots are Balboa, Grandview Cafe,  Woodland's Tavern, DK Diner, and Stauf's to just name a few! I will have a long list of places during check-in! You can walk up to Grandview Ave. ( the main street in Grandview)

name: Clintonville:  Next to OSU, Short North, Downtown
description: Find comfort and walking distance  to restaurants, events, bike path, public transportation in beautiful, 100 year old  historic home in Clintonville-Columbus' most popular neighborhood.  3 bedrooms, hardware floors with cozy furnishings. Bring your furry friends safely with fenced in backyard.  Available for business stays or for fun get aways! Accomodations can include use of bikes from our bike shop and complementary doughnuts from Tupelo, our doughnut shop- a local favorite Tupelo Doughnut's doughnut truck. Entire house is available. We have washer and dryer in the basement however it is a basement so it is not fancy but it is clean. Use of backyard and nice porch on front of house Available by phone prefer text or messaging on Airbnb. We live a half a mile away so can be present if needed but preferred to be available but not intrusive Washington Post reports Clintonville/Columbus  the "hottest hipster market in the U.S. Public transportation via bus at end of street, Uber, bike p

name: Camp in Comfort C-Bus
description: Several camper options available. First is a 24ft 3200lbs Travel trailer to hit the road and go camping. Enjoy your camping in the comforts of a RV. With Queen bed, table that converts to bed, and bunks. ac and fridge.   2nd has additional sofa bed. You tow to the campsite of your choosing or I can tow within two hours of the Columbus area for fee. Starting $50 delivery and set up. Everything you need for your camping getaway.  Very clean and spacious. Queen bed, fold down sofa bed and table coverts into a bed for additional beds.  Working stove, microwave, fridge, freezer, ac, gas heat, hot water. Full kitchen and bathroom. Camper. Assist with pick up and drop off. Campsite selection.  Towing to local site for fee.  Any question or needs just ask. The campsite of your choosing or deliver for fee. Tow to any campsite or fair. Or I can tow for a fee starting at $50. Trailer weight. 4100lbs. 23ft length. and 2 5/16 ball size. Also ask about our last minute availability discounts and week
host_about: My wife Sarah and I enjoy the simple fun things of life; hiking, sports and friends. We love traveling and would love to hear more about yours.  We hope to see you soon

name: Comfy place to sleep
description: There are many different restaurants, Wendy's, Popeyes, McDonald, and taco Bell about 3 miles from the town house.  Please note that this is a smoking unit and I do have a . We just moved in and plan on decorating soon! It has 2 Windows for extra ! If you need help with anything, please let me know! I am able to get you a discount ride via Uber if you need it.  I am very close to the bus stop. I live on a very busy street.  Please access the alley for entry and parking.
host_about: Christian, quiet, and a very hard worker.  I need peace and tranquility, no drama!

name: The Downtown Dreamer - Central Condo Living
description: The Downtown Dreamer is the premier located condo accommodation in Columbus. Directly facing Goodale Park on its Southwest corner, its best in class location is a few minutes (250 feet to 1/2 a mile) walking distance to all of your Convention Center, Nationwide Arena District, Short North and Downtown recreational and business endeavors. Location is everything and this space allows you to experience it with all of the high end, top of the line finishes of a modern downtown, first floor condo. This space comes fully furnished with all of your modern lodging accommodations including a full kitchen with a full set of dishes, cooking utensils, high end dishwasher, oven, microwave and stove top. Our living area is furnished decoratively with plenty of seating arrangements, luxurious  sectional and a television set. This space is an office by day, equipped with four large desks, a printer/fax machine and considerable office decorations. The bedroom houses a closet for storage with a queen si

name: Extreme comfort &  cozy and vegetarian speciality
description: Extremely convenient , quiet and safe neighborhood, walking distance to Walmart and four other big grocery stores, Asian and Indian stores as well walking distance to park , multiple restaurants, gas stations two major highways I-270 and 315 , hiking trail , close to AMC theatre and almost every important stores of US including whole food market and Traders joe ! I do not eat meat so either prefer vegetarian guests or if they want can eat out .

name: Private Bedroom North of OSU Campus
description: FREE LAUNDRY FENCED-IN BACK PORCH FREE PARKING (on-street and TINY garage (space limited)) This is a 5 bedroom house. Students from the Ohio State University live here. We also have one dog, Wally. You have access 1 private bedroom in our 5 bedroom house. The room is fully furnished with bed, desk, and free breakfast/snacks. You will have passcode access to come and go as you please. We do have 1 medium-sized dog in the house. He will not bother you unless you want to pet him.
