name: Private Room near Downtown and German Village
description: Brand new bedroom in a 1,700 sq. ft. home close to Downtown Columbus and German Village. Although the kitchen and bathroom are shared you'll have these spaces to yourself most of the time. You'll have access to the first and second floors of the house except my bedroom and office. I am available as much or as little as you like! There is free on street parking in front of the house.

name: The Rock House
description: Newly renovated 4 room suite flooded with natural light in a Jazz Age Tudor home close to Bexley & Downtown Columbus.  Enjoy coffee, lounging or a meal on the shared back patio overlooking sprawling gardens with unique stone landscaping. 5 min to (CMH) Airport, 7 min to Arts/Theater District, Short North & 4th St Beer Trail, 5min to Bexley's Drexel Movie Theatre dining & shopping, 15 min to OSU Stadium & Campus, 1/4 mile to Ohio Bikeway Trails access. Your private space starts in the 1st floor tiled foyer leading to a spiral staircase up to second floor office, living room with kitchenette and bedroom. Keyless entry allows for flexible check in and easy access with room to store bicycles. Kitchenette includes refrigerator, microwave, dishes & flatware, and coffee & tea.  PLEASE NOTE: Please make sure you are physically able to navigate a spiral staircase to the main living area. The bright red door next to the driveway is your private entrance.  All the inside rooms pictured are your p
host_about: My wife Pam and I have lived in Columbus for over 30 years. Pam practiced law and I worked in the theater as a stagehand and business agent. We are hiking enthusiasts, love live music and travel. Pam is a top notch gardener and I played lead guitar for the James Gang.

name: love story cabine
description: Great environment, separate entrance, privacy, including: towels, sheets, dishes, shampoo, TV, wifi and more. Nice and cozy. Living room,  Kitchen  Bathroom and shower sleeping area in the second floor. Anywhere in the cabin is accessible. available great neighborhood, very close to the JCC and Beth-Jacob shull, church and it is right off road 70. Franklin park- very close by ( 5 min drive) beautiful park
host_about: married +3 .

name: Victorian Downtown home in Olde Towne East
description: Don't miss this opportunity to stay in this old Victorian only 5 mins to downtown Columbus.  It is a 10 min Uber ride to the convention center and 15 Min Uber ride to OSU.  It is only a block away from the bus line and close to many beautiful parks.  The location is central and perfect for any event in Columbus.  This house would be great for a family and is right next to a park for the kids. This bnb has all the historic details of an old Victorian with exposed brick and ornate fireplace but also has all the modern amenities with smart TVs, stainless appliances, central air conditioning and washer/dryer.  As you approach this massive house you will be greeted with a sweeping front porch where you can sit and enjoy everything urban living has to offer.  As you enter the house the open concept will connect you with the whole family.  The living space is open to the farm table in the dining space which is open to the kitchen. description: Beautiful two Bedroom loft apartment in the ebullient downtown of Columbus! Walking Distance to Everything the City has to Offer. Open Concept Living/Kitchen, two Bedroom and Sofa Couch, Sleeps up to 4 Guests. Perfect Space for Business Travelers, families, Those who Looking to Explore Columbus or Residents Looking for an amazing Alternative to a Hotel for a Night Out! Completely brand new unit with new furniture! Luxury apartment with a corian fully equipped kitchen- new stain steel appliances-dishwasher, gas oven, refrigerator and microwave!  queen size bed, full bed and Convertible Sofa couch. Large bathroom off the bedroom, multiple bars and restaurants within 2 minutes of walking! Only one mile from Nationwide Arena! Inside the building, in the front entrance we do have as well cool throwing axes place ! Available by texts, phones for any questions! One mile from Scioto MileIs Park, One mile away from Nationwide Arena, 1/2 mile away from Ohio Theater! Around the building only in s

name: Quiet Comfort Close MAPFRE/Fairgrds/Hospital/Dwtn
description: The house is close to nightlife, public transport, MAPFRE stadium, parks, OSU, downtown, and the Short North. It is so quite in this lower level bedroom. Just park your car in the driveway  and rest after a long day in the beautiful city of Columbus. You'll love staying here because of the kitchen, the coziness and comfort of the bed and the back yard. Both bedrooms in the house have  queen beds, one bathroom, one sofa, TV and hi-speed WiFi! Feel free to use the kitchen for storing food and cooking. It has everything you might need to prepare a quick meal.  Please use spices, kitchenware, dishes, glasses so you don't have to bring anything and just enjoy your stay.  There is a traditional coffee maker and a traditional tea kettle with provided  coffee, tea, cream and some snacks for your morning routine.    The bathroom with natural window light has plenty of fluffy towels, shower gel, shampoo/conditioner for your shower needs. Hairdryer is  under the sink.    All bedding I use to do t
host_about:
Welcome to Columbus, where we have a lot to see and to do. I enjoy learning and speaking new languages, listening music and reading books. My son is studying in Germany, and we love to travel. We both made a lot of friends and hope to meet more from around the Globe by hosting in our house. I believe you should treat people the way you want to be treated. With love and respect. 
We will do our best to make sure you have a very enjoyable stay!

name: The When-I'm-aWay
description: BEST PRICES IN COLUMBUS!  Garage access, Private Entrance, Automated Keyless Access, room-by-room Temp control, TV, Laundry, & full service kitchen.  This is a 4 bedroom house and the common area's are shared by other guests.  You will be designated the Best bedroom in the house while I am away.  It has a Comfortable Queen size bed, a desk, and a lock on the door for your Privacy. This is a Spacious room & will Comfortable fit 2 Extra Single Mattresses - 1 pictured & 1 floor Mattress. As the real estate saying goes, location location location. 5 minutes from the airport! The property is conveniently located between Easton and the Airport, and only about 10 minutes from downtown!  The property is two stories and also includes a basement. When you enter the property you will be in the living room. Upstairs you will find four bedrooms and the Full Bathroom. Your Bedroom is on the ground floor next to a half Bathroom and connected to the Garage for private entrance.  No other guests, have
host_about:
I was born and raised in Youngstown, a small city in Northeastern Ohio. After settling down in the great city of Columbus I fell in love with hosting on AirBnB!  

I work full-time for an engineering company doing survey work. I love the fact that I can be hospitable and host people from all around the world even while having a full-time Job. 

I'm big into fitness, reading, movies, and I'm always trying to reach bigger goals.
One of my favorite things to do is go to the movies and watch a good comedy, the seats in the Easton AMC theater are amazing!

I'm heavily involved in church and want to be a missionary one day, but right now I'm living on mission the best I can trying to serve anyone I can.  I love being hospitable to all and I do my best to exceed your expectations.

Other apps can be logged into with guest own login Older built home with big beautiful rooms. We don't provide paper towels, hair dryer, or can opener. Guest has access to all areas except

name: The Travelers Townhouse- Housepitality
description: This urban townhome is clean, basic, and affordable! Less than 10 minutes from downtown, this townhome is in the South of Main neighborhood. Our neighborhood is one in transition, but still has many boarded houses and a bit rough around the edges (so it may not be for everyone). Our space has a brand new kitchen and bathroom. This small space is great for 1 - 4 people (though up to 6 can fit with the air mattress). We welcome all travelers to your home away from home, the Travelers Townhouse. Our space is just one block off of Main Street, and is a somewhat quiet street. There are neighbors in close proximity, and can sometimes be heard from inside our apartment. The space has a large living room, with TV. Dinning room, and kitchen. The kitchen is stocked with dishes and cooking basics. Upstairs are 2 bedrooms, and bathroom. One large bedroom has a queen bed, memory foam mattress, and desk. The smaller bedroom has a queen bed and memory foam mattress. Our basement has a washer and drye
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Short North Gem - Spacious 2BR Home
description: This roomy two bedroom home is a part of Columbus history, and has just been lovingly updated. It boasts high ceilings, tall windows, and original hardwood floors. Modern updates include granite counters, stainless appliances, and a custom glass and tile shower. It was furnished with guests in mind, including cloud-like memory foam mattresses. We are steps from High Street, and with it many of Columbus' most popular bars, restaurants, galleries, sports and music venues. We think you'll love it! We spare no expense in making our home comfortable, safe,  and convenient for our guests.  The kitchen boasts modern appliances and washer/dryer units, and all the utensils and amenities you'll need to cook or dine in.  The bathroom is fully stocked with freshly laundered towels and toiletries, and the roomy bedrooms all feature mattresses made out of cloud-like memory foam.  The living room has comfortable sofas and an HD TV with Netflix, and if your group has more people than we have beds, we
host_about:
Hello!

My name is Mitchell, and I have lived in Columbus my whole life.  I am a graduate of Ohio State's Fisher College of Business, and have worked for several local Columbus businesses.  In my free time, you might find me playing guitar or rooting on the Buckeyes and Blue Jackets.

My girlfriend and I decided to start hosting on Airbnb because it seemed like a fun and rewarding project, and a great chance to share our favorite parts of the city with new people- And we were right!  It is our commitment to you to provide a safe, clean, and comfortable home.

name: Pet Friendly + Free Off-St. Parking + Short North!
description: Short North, Free Parking, need we say more?!  Of course we do! You're also looking for a stylish and cozy spot to relax while you're enjoying the hustle and bustle of Cbus. Located at the corner of N. High and W. 3rd our newly renovated apt is at the center of it all. Walk to dozens of restaurants, bars, & coffee shops. We're just a quick drive away from: Convention Center:0.9 mi Nationwide Arena & Express Live: 1.4mi OSU: 2.2 mi North Market: 1 mi Schottenstein Center:2.9 mi License: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ***You must be comfortable with stairs. This apartment is located in a third floor walk-up.*** ***While the interior of this apartment and building is brand new the exterior is still waiting for her face lift!*** ***All Guests must be accounted for in booking. Additional un-paid guests at the property are prohibited unless approved by Host prior to check-in*** ****Early check-in (1 hour before 3pm) OR late check-out (1 hour after 10am) will be an additional $25.00 and must
host_about:
Hello fellow travelers! 

Carson and Megan here. We're a couple passionate about traveling the world. Whether we are scootering around Columbus or Florence, Italy- we want to be fully present in the culture and surroundings we find ourselves in. Columbus is our hometown and we want you to love it as much as we do! 

If we're not using our travel points to fly somewhere around the globe, you'll find Megan training for her next marathon. She's a two-time Boston marathon veteran and pursuing a sub-3 hour marathon! If you're a runner, make sure to ask us about the best places to run in Columbus. I, Carson, love two things: rehabbing old houses and ultimate frisbee. 

Together we have one curious son who is growing up in this awesome city. We hope the time in our space gives you a glimpse of life in Columbus!

description: Located in the heart of the Short North, Harrison West and Victorian Village. Approx. 2,400 sq ft. 4 finished floors including basement and loft area. Great place for hosting larger groups. 5 private parking spaces next to house. Private back yard space. Home was just renovated with new carpet, fresh paint, new landscaping and yard, and newly decorated. Space is great for social get together, family stays and conveniently located to lots of fun places in Columbus. This is a private townhome connected to just one other townhome. Plenty of front porch sitting and a private fenced backyard great for grilling and corn hole. Guests will enter thru side door next to parking area that will have a code given for entry when booked. Guests can enjoy use of the whole townhome with finished basement, kitchen, living space, laundry room, 3 bathrooms, second floor with 3 bedrooms and a third floor with open concept. I am available and ready to help! 3rd Avenue is near the heart of Victorian Village

host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated.

name: Beautiful Historic Home in German Village Area
description: Beautiful historic home in desirable German Village, close to downtown and Nationwide Children's Hospital. Guest bedroom used for Airbnb, master bedroom is locked off. Walking distance to Schiller Park, and multiple restaurants/bars on picturesque brick streets. The large welcoming porch is a great place to sit and relax while people watching. A private back patio with grill, also offers a quiet space. Inside, while historic, offers modern updates such as upgraded appliances & fixtures. The bedroom has a new Gel-Infused Green Tea Memory Foam Queen Mattress, dresser,  TV, & small desk. My home is non-smoking,  clean and comfortable, feel free to use the kitchen and/or washer & dryer. Agadore (the cat) is friendly but not intrusive. Please be aware that while I will not be home during your stay, this is my primary residence and my bedroom is locked off. There are personal items in the home (refrigerator & bathroom) but I want my guest to feel at home while visiting. I can have someone co
host_about: Very easy going, love to entertain and garden. In addition to my flower garden I help grow tomatoes and peppers and can salsa. I am a member of the German Village Garten Club and volunteer regularly at Ronald McDonald House. Love a patio and live music!

name: Tulsa #2
description: North End Columbus, Busline only 2.5 blocks away.  Rooms are large, friendly people, and 3.5 bathrooms.  Wifi, cable in bedroom, two living rooms, and a dining room.  Free laundry, and two refrigerators.  Great Deal, single occupancy. The space is single occupancy and includes a locked bedroom and share of the rest of the large home. Can access any part of the home except others bedroom and the garage. Yes, help is provided by myself or others that work to provide the best stay possible. The neighborhood is on the north end of Columbus 10 minutes to Ohio State University.  15 minutes north of downtown or the airport 2 blocks to bus line.  Can park on the property or the street in front of home The place is very quiet and professional.  I.e., no parties or pets, please.
host_about: Nice guy

name: Huge New 4BR/2.5BA home w/ big back yard and deck
description: Our two- story house is a 4 bedroom, 2 and a half bath just minutes from Ohio State University, Maphre Stadium, Nationwide Arena, Nationwide Childrens Hospital. Located in a great neighborhood less than a mile from I-71. It has been completely updated throughout. The first floor has two large living areas, a large kitchen with all new appliances and a dining room. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms that hold 6 beds including a master bedroom with its own private full bath. The entire house, front and back yard. The garage is not accessible to guests. We live only minutes away incase you need anything we will be there as soon as possible. Located less than a mile from State Route 71 and about a 10 min drive to downtown Columbus, OH.

name: Mid-Century Modern Home minutes from Downtown
description: Remodeled beauty in historic and trendy part of Columbus which is only minutes from downtown. Enjoy the rich history of the neighborhood and become part of the trendsetting changes! Close to Franklin Park, easy access to the highway and minutes from shopping and the airport, you will love this fully renovated home with mid century modern floor plan, beautifully crafted details and a great patio for relaxing. You will not want to miss this marvelous home experience. As you enter the home you walk down a small hallway with an opening to the modernized living room and dining room separated by beautiful original pocket doors. The kitchen is a beautiful spaced farm styled layout with a moveable island and white cabinets with custom cabinet pulls. On the second level you will see the full, fully remodeled restroom and 3 spacious bedrooms with great lighting.  Additionally you will find the washer and dryer located conveniently next to the main bedroom. Each room is carefully decorated to pre

name: Luxurious Home, Heart of Historic German Village
description: This luxurious home is the premier located accommodation right in the heart of historic German Village of Columbus. This amazing location  puts you within walking distance of popular bars and restaurants like Club 185,  Lindeys, G Michaels and Alpine.  This home is just .3 miles to the south end of downtown, one mile south of Short North and a few miles to Campus and Grandview.  All appliances are up to date, new and this space has been fully renovated as of spring 2019.  Please be our guest! This luxurious home is the premier accommodation for those looking to capture the comfort of a beautiful, spacious home in modern fashion while being tucked off of the dreamy brick roads of German Village. This space comes fully stocked with all 'hotel' like accommodations you would expect at a 4 star venue. All appliances are up to date and new and this home was just renovated with its modern style in Spring of 2019. Please, be our guest and see just how sweet it is to relax in downtown fashion!

name: KING Bed, Nuff Said
description: **Ask about our 10% DISCOUNT.** This Chic Location is in the heart of all you & your Guests would need during your stay. name: Lovely Lower Level within our home
description: There is not a private entrance but once you enter through the front door, you'll have the whole lower level to yourself. There's a spacious living area with TV, a bistro table, cozy bedroom, modern bathroom, full-size refrigerator, and kitchenette. We live in a quiet neighborhood close to a metro park with lots of hiking/biking trails. And there's easy freeway access. We're 10 minutes from Polaris Fashion Place, 10 minutes from uptown Westerville and 15 minutes from Easton Town Center. Our neighborhood was built in 1970 and there are still a number of original owners who love it here. There is pride of ownership and a sense of community.
host_about: I'm a work-from-home life and marriage coach. My husband is a professional counselor. We are in love with our first grandchild but we'll try not to show you picctures! I love traveling, great food, the great outdoors, learning, live music and meeting new people! I enjoy a good conversation over a glass of wine. As a host I am friendly but will give you all the space you need.

name: Regan's Place: (Very Near Downtown)
description: I live in a lovely and charming (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Queen Anne's house just over a mile and a half from the heart of  Downtown. There are popular (and delicious) local eating establishments only a 5-10 minute walk from the house. My house is easily accessible to convention centers, as well as the Museum of Art, Topiary Garden, Ohio Theater, and more!    I provide light breakfast snacks on request.  Easy entry via lock box. Just a heads up:  I do store a few items in the bedroom. License Number: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) My home is full of charm.  A lot of people enjoy looking at the art. I have two separate  listings, each has a twin bed. My other listing: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/8578379?location=columbus%2C%20ohio&adults=1&check_in=2019-06-25&check_out=2019-06-26&source_impression_id=p3_1560796699_QANOk52ea2pt4kN6 You can access the bedroom and bathroom. If you want to use the kitchen, please request ahead of time. I really enjoy meeting people! and will help gu
host_about: I am a friendly person who enjoys getting to know others.  I love to read, work in the yard, sing, sing, sing and snuggle with my dog--when he let's me. I love tea, love Italy and enjoyed Ireland and enjoy movies shown at art cinemas. I don't watch much television but when I do it's usually PBS. I don't smoke.  I really enjoy travelling and have been on package tours and well as trips where I hunt out hostels.  I appreciate having different people around!

name: Newly Remodeled Southern Orchard  Apartment!!!
description: Completely remodeled and fully furnished Southern Orchard duplex near downtown and the Children's Hospital. The building was just giving a modern remodel, inside and out, with all new granite countertops, new flooring and all new appliances. This fully furnished Southern Orchard apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom which allows you to sleep up to 6 people comfortably.  The apartment is on the first floor and another tenant stays in the other apartment on the second floor. The one story apartment boast plenty of private and common area space for all to enjoy!  All the amenities you will need for a comfortable stay are provided. Whether you are staying a nearby loved one during their recovery or checking out downtown Columbus activities this location will be perfect for your stay!!!  The remodel included a newly fenced backyard for your outdoor enjoyment and private off-street parking!  There are two bedrooms in the home and each is furnished with a Queen bed. We also have included an
host_about:
I'm an easy-going owner and take pride in all things I do. I will always do my best to make sure my guests' stays are seamless so that you can enjoy everything that Lake Tahoe has to offer! 

I'm an avid Cavs, Indians, Browns and Buckeye fan and have lived in several states. If I'm not inside watching my teams you'll find me at the beach, on the water or skiing new mountains!

name: Single Bedroom Chic Home in Merion Village!
description: Charming home next to German Village and Nationwide Children's Hospital! Only 3 miles away from The Short North Arts District! Bars, shops, restaurants, breweries and more all within a short distance. THE Ohio State University and Nationwide Arena are also close by. This is a perfect area for visitors looking to be in the heart of city.

name: New York Loft Living in Columbus
description: Live like you're in New York, only in the heart of Columbus, Ohio. This Modern, light-filled space is dripping with style and comfort. From here you can walk to many of the great restaurants, breweries, and attractions Columbus has to offer. High Street/ Short North are a short 10-15 walk. Arena Crossing, North Market and Convention Center are also within walking distance. During your stay, you will have the entire unit. Relax on the private patio, complete with firepit and comfy seating. Or if you would like to take in the Columbus sunset. Take a trip up to the rooftop and watch the sunset over sweeping views of downtown from the community lounge space. The Pool at located by Hoof Hearted and go fitness is available to use with a 10$ fee which is charged at the pool. Guest are welcome to use the refrigerator, coffee maker and fresh ground bean will also be available to start your morning off. Depending on my travel, I will try and accommodate guest questions. Italian Village has many

name: DOWNTOWN HUGE  STUDIO WIFI & PARKING No CLEAN FEE
description: All guests are welcome to our comfortable & spacious 1 bedroom studio. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, our place is perfect for couples or solo travelers. This large space includes a queen size bed, closet, iron & ironing board, coffee maker, plush chair with ottoman, and office desk. This listing includes a private studio with access to additional shared living areas, such as: dining table and chairs, refrigerator, microwave, bathroom with shower, free parking, and WiFi. Guests are given their privacy and have the option to socialize with other guests or tenants of the property. 6 miles from CMH airport & 1.5 miles from downtown. Available transportation options available directly at this location include: bus station, UBER, and Turo.
host_about: Fun Loving and a True Professional

name: Updated Apartment In Walking Distance To OSU
description: Nicely updated apartment in highly desirable neighborhood.  Walking distance to Ohio State University (0.5 miles).  Short distance to downtown and shopping.  Free wi-fi, smart TV, and parking.  Apartment is located on the first floor with no steps. Parking is immediately in front of apartment.  Coin laundry on site.

name: Central RARE find - book In July for EXTRA 30% OFF
description: Centrally located is putting it lightly. This 1000 square foot, 2-level gem is Walking distance to High Street, Crew Stadium, Ohio Expo Center, one 24/7 gas station & 2 carry-outs, Suzie Q's Pool Hall, 4th Street Bar & Grill, & a coin-op laundromat. 5 minute drive to OSU Campus, Clintonville, Short North Arts District, Downtown and Interstate-71. Packed with amenities to make it feel like home. TV loaded with streaming services. Kitchen complete with skeleton bar, teas & fresh-ground coffee. We want this to feel like home.  When the seasons permit, I pick fresh flowers each morning on my dog walk and bring them to the space.  In the kitchen, we have loose leaf teas & fresh ground coffee, a blender for smoothies, and a skeleton bar setup to stir or shake to your hearts content (BYOB/spirits).  We also have fresh citrus, popcorn and oatmeal, olive oil, salt/pepper and all the basic gear to cook up a meal and save money on your travels. Kroger, Lucky's Market and 3 liquor stores are all a
host_about: Rounding 20 years experience in the realm of hospitality - I'll take good care of you. I have worked in front and back of the house, from opening establishments to cooking and bartending - I've leveraged my employment background to provide a unique stay for my guests.

name: Updated Grandview Townhouse!- Central Downtown/OSU
description: New listing! It's only a matter of time for the 5-star reviews to roll in for this property because it's all about location! Walking distance to all the attractions the historic downtown Grandview has to offer & only a short 1.5 mile uber to downtown/short north/OSU campus.  7 sleep comfortably w/2 queen beds, 1 full bed, & 1 cozy couch. There are TVs w/cable & Netflix in the living room & bedrooms, board games/cards/dice, & Coffee & bottled water are complimentary. Brand new washer & dryer. When you enter the home, you will walk into an open living and dining room setup that houses some cozy couches facing a brand new 65" TV and a cute dining table nestled under a dimmable light to set the mood however you like. As you enter the kitchen you will see a brand new experience granite countertops, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances and dish and cook ware for your use. While in the kitchen, you can help yourself to the large supply of cold bottled water and the Keurig coffee. You w
host_about: My name is Joe and I'm a working engineer/consultant in the Columbus area. I own and manage rental properties as a side business under my LLC - String Light Properties. I believe in giving people a quality place to live to make their lives more enjoyable - and who doesn't like string lights in their backyard? : )

name: The Buckeye Bungalow, One Mile from Downtown
description: The Buckeye Bungalow is the optimally located two bed room townhome, one mile directly east of downtown Columbus. Tucked in the historic, up and coming neighborhood  of Olde Town East, this space gives you convenient access to Downtown, German Village, Arena District, Convention Center, OSU Campus and Short North. Enjoy all the famous local eateries such as Yellow Brick Pizza, Olde Oak Tavern, Olde Town Grill and Angry Baker and venture a short car ride to all of Columbus' major attractions. Quaint, Buckeye themed first floor townhome. It features a large outdoor patio, full kitchen, living room and two private  bedrooms with one bathroom. Smart TV is equipped with Netflix and related streaming services. The living room is furnished with a sofa bed for additional guests. The kitchen comes fully stocked with all of your cooking essentials, a Kuerig machine for coffee and a small dining table. Our guests have access to everything in the town home as well as private access to the outdoor

name: Cabin themed Short North 1Bedroom Apartment
description: This cozy atmosphere emulates that of a cabin's vibe right in-between short north and OSU Campus,  it's perfect for Work and Family stays in Columbus. *SIDE NOTE We don't charge our guests a cleaning fee.  Please follow the checkout instructions before leaving.  YOU OR A FRIEND'S FIRST TIME BOOKING on Airbnb?  Use our referral link to receive $40 off your first reservation!   https://abnb.me/e/o7X6yZTg0P The apartment comes with 55inch Smart Tv with Netflix access and Hulu. There's parking in the back with a parking pass provided on coffee table inside. The first bedroom has a full bed.  The living room has a sofa futon for a third guest. If you want any advice on places to visit or things to do while in Columbus (pubs, nightlife, parks, nature...etc) please let us know.  Guests are always welcome to reachout to any of the hosts regarding questions about their stay or anything else. Since this airbnb is managed by a group of three cohost, best method of contact is through the airbnb ap
host_about:
HOMEWEC comprises of 3 friends and Co-founders, William, Emmanuel, and Christian that met at The Ohio State University during their junior year and upon crossing paths,  realized, they wanted to work towards becoming very respectable real estate agents. 
Our majors are Aviation, Aerospace engineering, and Human development and family science respectively. We are active travelers ourselves. Through our experience from many jobs which epitomize the importance of hospitality, we decided as a team to host this home and many others to come to provide exceptional hospitality and efficient home economics for our guests to enjoy a lovable living experience.

name: Comfy Queen close to downtown
description: Close to downtown for business.  Close to Arena district, bars , restaurants , shopping mall ,ECT. Guest are welcome to use kitchen for cooking their own food also living room available quiet place nice for reading and relaxing. Kitchen , living room , bathroom also a charcoal grill if they would like to grill . Mornings and evenings before bed I'm located near down town where everything is . 15 mins from shopping malls restaurants and fun activities. Your moments away from a great experience. Bus line accessible also taxi cabs , Uber , lyft, bicycles available close by children's hospital .
host_about: Hello my name is Sena I'm 25 years old I live close to downtown and I work down there as well , I'm pet friendly , I enjoy night out in my city and I'm fun.

name: Modern Luxury Private Room ? Mins to CMH airport
description: Enjoy the beautifully designed house for your stay in Columbus OH! A stunning 5-star room, tailored to perfection, filled with some excellent design and decor. Enjoy a state-of-the-art Smart TV in the living room while you lounge in your new suburban home. It's the ideal room retreat in a unique home, located to the east of the center of Columbus - 5 minute drive to Port Columbus Airport. Get ready to get inspired! This spacious, ideally located property offers a stay beyond your imagination. Facilitating several places to relax and your very own private room to seclude yourself. The quiet surroundings will easily make for a relaxing stay. Considering the location and facilities of the home we host lots of couples and solo travellers. This wonderful apartment has a spacious shared living room, a shared open kitchen and a bedroom fit for kings and queens. It also suits friends looking for a nice location. Comfortable and spacious, yet located conveniently for some suburban adventures.
host_about:
Hello! 

We are Dane and Alicia (DNA), we both are world travelers with a passion for real estate and hospitality, based in Columbus OH! Considering a deep-rooted passion for anything to do with hospitality and facilitating great customer experiences, Airbnb is the perfect thing to do! 

Not only do we love being Airbnb hosts, but we also love being on the traveling spectrum too. Have traveled a lot and am now doing more overseas travel!

We really enjoy the ability to share the experience of living in this wonderful house. Definitely check with us for amazing must visit locations, where to go for superb walks and wonderful experiences in Columbus! We love meeting new people from different walks of life, but as a host, we give my guests all the space they want.

Looking forward to hosting you soon,

Dane & Alicia

name: Glen Echo Hideaway-Newly Renovated
description: Entire space has been renovated & everything is new! Comfortable & QUIET space on a QUIET street which is conveniently located near a major highway, Mapfre Stadium, Ohio State University (OSU), & downtown Columbus. Bus stop to OSU & downtown is within close walking distance. Guests have their own private kitchenette, bathroom with large shower & a comfortable queen bed. There is a Smart TV which has access to Amazon, Netflix & Hulu. Clean, completely private & separate from our living space. Safe & quiet neighborhood, plenty of private parking. Enjoy our backyard, or sip your favorite beverage on the back porch. We do have a small dog, he is friendly & loves people, however, he does use the backyard. Please be sure to keep the gate closed at all times. I am usually in close proximity either at home or close by & reachable at all times if you have any questions or concerns. If I can help in any way by providing extra information about where you want or need to go please do not hesitate

name: Children's Hospital Home Away From Home
description: We are Conveniently located within walking distance to Children's Hospital. Our  home offers a comfortable and stylish place to come back to after a day of exploring Columbus.  If you're viewing this listing, you'll have access to 2 of our 4 bedrooms, and 1.5 baths! If you are interested in the additional rooms, contact us and we'll send you over to our larger listing! We are just a 5 minute Uber ride to the Short North Arts District, Columbus Convention Center,  and other downtown districts! This newly renovated 3 story home offers granite countertops in the kitchen,  2 stone fireplaces, family style dining, and bedrooms styled with comfort in mind.  Guests will enjoy access to a portion of the home. This includes 2 Bedrooms, 1.5 Bathrooms, Kitchen, Living Room, 2 car garage, and Dining Room.  The other rooms will remain locked during your stay.  The shared bathroom space is located on the second floor. Guest May access everything on the property, including the 2 car garage. The basem

name: BUNK BED SHARED DORM
description: ARE YOU A BOTTOM OR TOP BUNKER? COME AND FIND OUT! CLEAN GUESTHOUSE WITH SHARED DORM ROOM ACCESS TO KITCHEN LAUNDRY PORCH GYM AND LOUNGE THE SPACE INCLUDES AIR HOCKEY RADIO WIFI BED KITCHEN ENJOY THE HOUSE MI CASA ES TU CASA WE MAY CROSS PATHS AND CERTAINLY ON THE WEEKENDS GUESTS OFTEN GO OUT TO THE LOCAL MUSIC BARS AND OTHER DIVERSIONS A LITTLE PARTY AND A LITTLE CHILL. THIS NEIGHBORHOOD IS LITERALLY ALL WALKS OF LIFE. COTA BUS AND CABS OSU BUS STOP ARE ONLY A BLOCK AWAY. LIME AND BIRD SCOOTERS ARE EVERYWHERE AND ARE LOTS OF FUN. EASY BIKE ACCESS DIRECTLY IN FRONT OF HOUSE. THIS IS A COMMUNITY BASED GUESTHOUSE SO YOU'RE ENCOURAGED TO INTERACT WITH OTHER GUESTS AND IF YOU'RE A LITTLE SHY JUST SAY HI! %10 military discount (former or active)
host_about:
My Airbnb claim to fame is taking my family to harajuku district in Tokyo and staying in a studio apartment on the famous cosplay street before the Airbnb ban.

We have travelled using Airbnb in Japan, Taiwan, China, Mexico, Hawaii, and coming soon Ecuador. 

We are new to hosting and are learning daily and have had incredible experiences so far making lasting relationships with many guests. 

I like the great outdoors, Mexican and Chinese food, and Mario Lanza's

name: OSU SCHOLAR SPECIAL BUNK BED
description: We opened up our house to rockers for the sonic festival Bunk bed on second floor Breakfast included Air hockey  International rockers from all over the world are sharing the place and nobody is having a better time than us! 15 minute walk to the stadium Bars nearby  24/7 udf 2 blocks away Message me your info and any questions

name: Urban Chic 1br @ River | Parking + Pool + Balcony
description: Stay in the arts district of Columbus, away from the hustle and bustle of downtown but still only minutes away. Situated on the west side of the river places you near restaurants, shopping, museums, coffee shops, brew pubs, and parks. Adjacent to downtown and only steps from COSI, Scioto Mile and Genoa Park. Our suite in the revitalized community of Franklinton provides comfort and necessities in a convenient neighborhood to help you enjoy your stay in Columbus! Our one bedroom apartment with one queen bed, couch & air mattress has everything you need to enjoy your stay in Columbus! The kitchen is stocked with cookware to cook simple meals, granite countertops, and a Keurig coffee maker. There's a smart TV with Roku and Netflix (there is no cable) & free WiFi! A washer and dryer is available inside the apartment for your convenience. Enjoy a workout in the fitness center. We have a private garage for one vehicle to park. The apartment is located on the third floor and there is no eleva
host_about: Frontdesk offers trusted travelers exactly the stay they want - their kind of place, in their kind of neighborhood.

name: WW2-styled Bluebird Short Bus! w/air con, electric
description: **Student? Ask about extended stays- even if it doesn't let you book! If you want a unique traveling experience, look no further! This beautiful 1990 Bluebird is spacious with an air conditioner, outlets for your electronics, a bed that converts into a dinette, a long couch and a cooler!  You will have access to a shared studio apartment with a full kitchen and bath. This super cool bus sits in the shade behind the house and is lined with stickers of pin-up girls and USAF themes. It has a comfy couch AND a bed to accommodate yourself and a friend or two comfortably. A new addition, the AC unit, keeps the space nicely dehumidified and cool. Curtains all around for privacy, if you prefer. Pet friendly. A water pitcher with fresh filtered water is provided to keep you hydrated as well as a power strip to charge your essentials. You will have access to the main property which has a full bathroom and kitchen. Texting and calling, both are fine. Don't hesitate to shoot a text at any time if

name: Central Columbus - Large Urban Old-School Home
description: **Ask about our 10% DISCOUNT.** Welcome to Centrally Located Urban Large Home ...located near: - shopping malls - Universities (OSU, ODU & CSCC)  - OH Fairgrounds - Mapfre Stadium - Port Columbus Airport - Downtown/Convention Center - Great parks w/biking & walking paths - Ethnic restaurants & shops *LARGE Home with... Lots of room* Beds are as follows... Bedroom # 1 (Queen Bed) Bedroom # 2 (Queen Bed) Bedroom # 3 (Full Futon) Living Room (IKEA Full Futon) Guests have access to 1st & 2nd Floor. Basement is Off Limits (unless previously authorized to enter). HOST &/or CO-HOST will interact as much or as little as Guests request. Urban life with moderate traffic, pedestrians & inner-city nuances. You will need a vehicle (ie. Bicycle, Bus, Car, UBER/LYFT) while staying at this BNB. Public transportation via COTA Bus is located less than 1 Block away. FREE PARKING There are 2 Parking Spaces to the Rear of this AIRBNB.  You will park & enter via wooden gates to access the back door for entr
host_about: I am a life-long learner and enjoy a variety of experiences.  Currently a real estate Maven and Nurse... so naturally I have a passion for healthy lifestyle choices. I have three "furry" babies who help keep me grounded.  My favorite places involve sunshine, water and preferably flowers.  Welcome to our shared experiences!

name: A private 3 level townhouse with unique art!
description: Quiet Neighborhood, Convenient shopping, 10 min from airport *Full Kitchen *Roomy Living Room and Dining Space *Walking distance from The Goat (A full bar and restaurant available to the public on the premises - look for signs) *2 Queen size beds and full shower in one and and a bathtub/shower in the other room.  *No access to the pool or gym but there are plenty of walking trails and the Gahanna YMCA is about 3 miles away *The Goat *The Washer & Dryer located on the first floor *Walking trails *Full home (see house rules for limited exceptions) *Internet/Smart TVs in every room I'm available via text, email or call!

name: The Friendship House - Housepitality
description: Our charming Victorian house is the perfect spot to stay on your trip to Columbus! Enjoy an amazing location, better located than most hotels. Steps from the Short North and Italian Village, and a few minutes from Downtown Columbus. The king master suite has lots of space to spread out, and a bathroom to die for! Large kitchen for gathering and enjoying meals. Fenced in back yard for your pets. Come and make your memories at our house!
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: The Downtown Double! 2 comfy beds, great location
description: Get your own set of keys to this unique attic room which comes with two comfy memory foam double beds. Room also includes: - Air conditioning! - Closet & hangers - Laptop table - Fan - Alarm Clock - Mood lighting LED strip w/ remote - Original Shel Silverstein poetry books to flip through! Highway 270 and 670 are easily accessible, and the Airport is only 1.5 miles away. I am outgoing and can find something to relate to in everyone. I have a dark sense of humor and am difficult to offend. I am interested in art, politics, rap music, psychology, and philosophy.

"Birds born in a cage think flying is an illness."

name: Private room w/ 2 queen beds & loft w/ 1 queen bed
description: This space consists of a private bedroom with two queen beds and a loft with one queen bed. The bedroom is totally private. The loft is visible open the the stairs to the second floor so visible by us when we go to our bedroom. Other than that it's your own little oasis. In rare instances our third bedroom will be in use and the bathroom will be shared. I will let you know before you arrive if it'll be shared or not. Walking distance to a bar (The Goat) with a pool and volleyball courts! You'll have access to the bedroom, loft and bathroom. You should not need to access any other part of our home. We'll be here the majority of the time you are here, but will be out of your hair unless you need us for something. New, quiet, worry-free neighborhood! Parking is available on the street in front of the house. Our house is no more than 30 minutes from anything in Columbus!

name: Private bedroom in updated Merion Village home!
description: Welcome to my home in charming Merion Village! My home is recently updated and sits on one of the best blocks in the neighborhood. Walk to coffee shops, bakeries, Schiller Park, restaurants, and get to downtown in less than 10 minutes! Everything from the location to all the natural light coming from its many windows, this is a beautiful home filled with lots of character, beauty, and good vibes! Kitchen, living room, bathroom, laundry, backyard, front porch. I own and live in this house and am happy to share it with you! I'll always be willing to provide as much or little information you'd like about the area and all there is to do in Columbus. I work during the day Monday - Friday and usually keep busy in the evenings and through the weekend as well. When I'm home, I'm typically keeping things very low key. Residential neighborhood - lots of young professionals, young families - and tons of dogs out for evening walks! This is a super walkable area with tons of restaurants, bakeries a
host_about:
I'm a young professional living in the heart of Columbus for nearly 10 years. I enjoy living an active lifestyle; spending time outside or exploring new places to see, eat and drink around the city is what I love most when I'm in town. When I'm traveling - I enjoy similar things! 

I'm open minded, respectful and love meeting new people and sharing my home with others!

name: Pet Friendly + Park for Free + Brand New!
description: Short North, Free Parking, need we say more?!  Of course we do! You're also looking for a stylish and cozy spot to relax while you're enjoying the hustle and bustle of Cbus. Located at the corner of N. High and W. 3rd our newly renovated apt is at the center of it all. Walk to dozens of restaurants, bars, & coffee shops. We're just a quick drive away from: Convention Center: 0.9 mi Nationwide Arena & Express Live:1.4mi OSU: 2.2 mi North Market: 1 mi Schottenstein Center:2.9 mi License: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ***You must be comfortable with stairs. This apartment is located in a third floor walk-up.*** ***While the interior of this building is brand new the exterior is still waiting for her facelift!*** ***All Guests must be accounted for in booking. Additional un-paid guests at the property are prohibited unless approved by Host prior to check-in*** ****Early check-in (1 hour before 3pm) OR late check-out (1 hour after 10am) will be an additional $25.00 and must be approved by
host_about:
Hello fellow travelers! 

Carson and Megan here. We're a couple passionate about traveling the world. Whether we are scootering around Columbus or Florence, Italy- we want to be fully present in the culture and surroundings we find ourselves in. Columbus is our hometown and we want you to love it as much as we do! 

If we're not using our travel points to fly somewhere around the globe, you'll find Megan training for her next marathon. She's a two-time Boston marathon veteran and pursuing a sub-3 hour marathon! If you're a runner, make sure to ask us about the best places to run in Columbus. I, Carson, love two things: rehabbing old houses and ultimate frisbee. 

Together we have one curious son who is growing up in this awesome city. We hope the time in our space gives you a glimpse of life in Columbus!

name: Eli's College place
description: Just a typical college apartment with a free room that I'm renting out. The apartment is located on Ohio state's north campus. Very close to the Mapfre stadium which hosts the local club soccer team and many Columbus events. Great and cheap place to stay if you and a friend are visiting Columbus or Ohio state and want a chill environment to be surrounded by! FIRST TIME USING AIRBNB? USE MY CODE FOR A DISCOUNT OFF YOUR FIRST RESERVATION https://abnb.me/e/LMRuDKuVdX Living room is open to all guests as a lounge area. Make yourself a home! I'm a very social person and enjoy socializing with my guests if need be. I work a day time job at the hospital but I'm always available via text and phone along with email as well. You need a parking pass to park in the main parking lot  of the apartment, but there is free parking on the west side of the apartments that I can direct you to. So do not park in the main parking lot unless you wanted to be towed! I have posted pictures of WHERE TO PARK and
host_about:
Currently I am a first year pharmacy student at The Ohio State University. 
I attended the same university while obtaining my undergraduate degree in addition  playing  football there. I went on to sign a free agency contract with the Tennessee Titans, but was cut and now I'm just pursuing my doctorate in pharmacy!

If this is first time in Columbus I'm sure you'll love this spot!!! Master Bedroom with a spacious Living Area and Kitchen. 1 Full Bathroom attached. Kitchen, Bedroom, Living Area, Bathroom, Small Patio in the front, Parking. You will have complete privacy! Can contact me via cell anytime and I can meet up whenever required. Mostly available in the afternoon. One of the posh neighborhood of Columbus, with complete security and privacy. Its in the heart of Easton and everyone is very polite and sweet. Its a family place so its expected to be quiet unlike downtown.

This large sun filled studio is the perfect choice for a couples intimate stay-cation or a budget conscious group of three looking to explore the city on a cost effective mindset. designed to give you all the features of any larger apartment but creatively laid out to still provide tons of space. We have added an area for lounging, dining, cooking, etc. This is a street-facing studio in the heart of the action, so noise can be heard sometimes, particularly on weekends. Guests have a full run of the apartment, it is a private space. We are as avail
host_about: Providing guests with the best experience Columbus, Ohio has to offer! Being an Ohio State Buckeye has showed me how amazing this city is and how it is growing in the right direction. From football to restaurants to conventions, Columbus is a great city to visit any time of the year!

name: The Clintonville Explorers House - Housepitality
description: Experience the Clintonville neighborhood in Columbus in true form! This classic craftsman home is in a location that wont disappoint. It is just steps from the neighborhoods best restaurant/bar The Crest, and walking distance to many great things to do and see in Clintonville. Our house is a good place to stay for a small family or group while in Columbus exploring, or a business traveler looking for a house to themselves. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the front porch, or a picnic on the back deck! This charming home is in the process of getting a new family to move in! We currently are selling this house, and are offering it to traveling guests to enjoy in the meantime. Our house has some updated rooms, and some others that still show features from the original home. The kitchen is updated, but the bathroom and floors upstairs are older. Our current furnishings are minimal, but our guests should have all they need for short stay! We are a team of hosts here in Columbus that are just down t
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Cozy house in Columbus!
description: Private room with access to kitchen, living room, dining room, backyard, and small home gym.  Backyard has a fire pit and hammock set up.  Walking distance from German Village - excellent food, bars, and just overall cool vibe.  Note, two dogs live in this house and will interact with you.  Additionally parking is street parking but it's never an issue to find parking! Two dogs (both friendly!) live here.

name: 2 Queen Bed Flat in Heart of German Village
description: Completely remodeled NY-style flat in German Village. Totally furnished with 2 queen beds, 1 single, and sleeper sofa. Large kitchen with a "hangout" island. LED lighting throughout, with splashes of exposed brick. 2 Large bath's for each bedroom with luxurious walk in showers. Off-street parking! Within walking distance of all of the must-sees of German Village (Lindy's, Thurman's, Schmidt's). Easy 10 minute or less drive to Arena District, Brewery District, Convention Center. This is a completely remodeled home with plenty of charm! As with many older homes, there will be unique features and small imperfections that we hope you appreciate. The neighborhood is sensitive to noise and we ask our guests to be respectful and courteous during their stay and keep volume at a minimum.  There are two off street parking spots, one available for each unit. I am available by cell phone at all hours of the day, to provide for immediate availability. The neighborhood is in the heart of German Vill

description: This Old Towne East comfortable 1 Bedroom/1 Bath apartment is located near CMH Int'l Airport, I- (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , Franklin Park Conservatory,  Columbus Museum of Art, Lincoln Theatre, DT Columbus, Short North, COSI & Convention Center, to name a few.  GREAT location for travelers; air unit, central heat and ceiling fans.  TV in living area w/Amazon Fire stick access, WiFi & desk work station.  Comfortably accommodates 3-4 people.  Free off street parking behind building. Our place is private, cozy & a home away from home Guests will be able to access the entire space Available for any questions you may have! Our neighborhood is special because we are two blocks from the beautiful Franklin Park Conservatory and a mile or two from downtown Columbus and Short North. host_about: I am a happily married, God-fearing woman who loves to have fun, travel, shop and to make you smile :-)

name: Mound Street Apartment
Rare Downtown Apartment with Free Parking
description: A unique apartment in Downtown Columbus, which doubles as a speakeasy event space, with a full equipped stage, kitchen, and bar area. While ideal for parties and events seating up to 30 people, guests may lounge in the spacious living room that boasts a brand new 4K flat screen television in a theatre-like environment. Get a great night's sleep in a secluded bedroom with a brand new memory foam mattress, black out curtains, and iMac office setup, if helpful for the weekend warrior. During the weekends, this apartment doubles as a bespoke speakeasy for touring music acts and occasional fundraising  events - you'll notice the stage has been signed by hundreds of attendees of events across all genres of music, magic, and spoken word. Curtains provide an extra layer of privacy between the stage and living room, living room and kitchen, and kitchen and bedroom, while the living room itself boasts stadium style seating for more than 30 guests.  Guests can lounge comfortably in the room while
host_about:
During college, I spent two years on the road as a musician, stayed at hostels and couchsurfed all around the US and Europe. Throughout my travels, I founded a few businesses and non-profits and made Columbus my base. I'm also currently a Senior Management Consultant at Kalypso. I travel internationally for technology projects, speak at conferences on music industry, and help smart cities initiatives find cultural impact.

As a traveler, I continue to seek out beautiful AirBnB's in cities all around the world. As a host, I enjoy creating the kind of environment that I would want to have for myself in Columbus. It's a place where travelers and professionals can stay in comfort, equipped with constantly refreshed amenities. It's in the heart of downtown, near all of the excitement of bars, theaters, restaurants, and conferences, yet still cozy and peaceful.

name: Very Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment
description: Modern day style large one bedroom apartment, great spacious kitchen for cooking, quiet gated  community, salt water pool access, gym access, club house access, 5 minutes from Polaris Mall, abundance of great restaurants in the area, 15 minutes from downtown, nice outdoor patio. The place is all yours. You will be able to contact me with any questions you may have at any time. The abundance of great shops and unique restaurants makes it hard for me to leave the Polaris area. Not much of a place for walking or taking a bus. It is a pretty busy area. If you plan on going anywhere outside of the Polaris area, I would factor in about 15 extra minutes if you are leaving during rush hour.

The building was just giving a modern remodel, inside and out, with all new granite countertops, new flooring and all new appliances. This fully furnished Southern Orchard apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom which allows you to sleep up to 6 people comfortably. The apartment takes up the entire second floor with a private balcony and above another rental unit. The one story, second floor apartment boast plenty of private and common area space for all to enjoy! All the amenities you will need for a comfortable stay are provided. Whether you are staying near a loved one during their recovery or checking out downtown Columbus activities, this location will be perfect for your stay!!! The remodel included a newly fenced backyard for your outdoor enjoyment and private off-street parking! There are two bedrooms in the home and each is furnished with a Queen bed. We also have includ
host_about:
I grew up in a small town near Columbus, OH. I've lived in several US states and have traveled all over the world. I currently live in Lake Tahoe but Ohio will always have a place in my heart and I'm glad to share my home with you! 

I am an easy-going owner and take pride in all things I do. I will always do my best to make sure my guests' stays are seamless so that you can enjoy everything that Columbus has to offer!

Love traveling, sports, meeting new people and most importantly love life!

This home is a mile away from downtown, a few miles from Short North, Campus and Grandview. All appliances are up to date, new and this space has been fully renovated as of spring 2019. He is in high school now.  I am very involved in the Lacrosse community and am on the Board of Directors of the Westerville lacrosse Club.  We have lived in Columbus since 2012, and own our own home in the Bradywine area.

description: This condo was just fully updated throughout! Located in the absolute BEST location in Columbus. It is a studio located on on High Street with free parking! It scores a 92 on WalkScore = Walkers Paradise! You are steps from all of the action. Less than a mile south from OSU Campus, less than a mile from the Columbus Convention Center, and steps from all of the best bars and restaurants Columbus has to offer! Our place is completely updated and all furnishings are brand new! There is a brand new memory foam mattress and all new furniture throughout the place. Studio sleeping space with full bathroom and full kitchen. You have the whole place! Our place is located in the Short North/ Italian Village neighborhood. Italian Village offers a plethora of breweries, coffee shops, and restaurants tucked within the neighborhood borders. The Short North is a mile of the best art galleries, restaurants, nightlife, pubs, and shops! You also are less than 1 mile to OSU campus, the convention center,
host_about:
I was born and raised in Columbus, Ohio. I went to college at Ohio State where I played football and studied finance. I worked in Chicago for 4 years in real estate finance. After four years, I left that position to start my own business back in Columbus.  

While working on getting it off the ground, I started listing my place in Chicago on Airbnb (and still do!). Hosting on Airbnb has been a part of my life ever since. I love hosting guests in my hometown of Columbus and my second home Chicago! I truly take pride in making sure that people have a great experience while in the city. As a small business owner myself, I am always eager to point guests in the direction of the best local establishments.  

Personally, I love to travel, anything Ohio State, skiing, trying new restaurants, grabbing beers with friends, cooking, working out at our fitness studio StudioTorch, and jumping on our Short North Trolley Co. events. I hope to have the opportunity to host you soon - cheers!

The kitchen is stocked with cookware to cook simple meals, stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. Enjoy coffee made from the Keurig. There's a smart TV with Roku and Netflix (there is no cable) & free WiFi! Wood style flooring throughout and floor to ceiling windows allowing for lots of natural light. host_about: Frontdesk offers trusted travelers exactly the stay they want - their kind of place, in their kind of neighborhood.

name: Vintage 3BR @ Short North Arts District + Parking
description: New from trusted Airbnb Superhosts Kate & Nat: this "vintage" apartment in a 100+ year old building is a quick walk to the excitement of the Short North, yet tucked away on a quiet tree-lined street.  Enjoy the charm of the original wood trim and decorative fireplaces.  Building is shared with upstairs tenants - not a good place for noisy groups.  Plus... a RESERVED parking spot!  17-min walk to Convention Center. 20-min walk to Nationwide Arena & Express Live. 24-min walk to Ohio State. Spacious first floor apartment in a vintage brick duplex building, located in the popular Short North Arts District and close to the OSU campus, Goodale Park, and downtown Columbus.  See the floor plan in the photos! You will enter through the kitchen at the back of the building. This leads into the central living/dining space, with a TV area and a dining table.  All three bedrooms are accessed from the central living room.  Note: the front bedroom was originally a living room (the exterior door to the
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We are a married couple in our 30s and we live in the "Short North" of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.   

Kate is from Cleveland, and Nat actually grew up in the Short North neighborhood, which has been through an incredible transformation over the last couple of decades!  Kate has also lived in North Carolina and Mississippi, and Nat spent some time in Chicago and Indianapolis - and now we are happily settled in Columbus with our dog Scout and a baby on the way!

We are both graduates of Ohio State (go bucks!) and for our day jobs, Kate is a physical therapist specializing in neurological rehabilitation and Nat is an IT project manager / handyman / stay-at-home dad.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Live on High Street~Short North w/parking
description: If you want to be within walking distance of anything and everything this is the bnb for you. This 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath condo has a great back deck and is located on High Street in the Short North. It has private parking options in the back on Pearl which is hard to come by in this area. It is a 8 minute walk to the Convention Center, a 15 minute walk to Nationwide Arena, 2 min walk to Goodale Park, and a 5 minute uber from OSU campus, German Village, and Nationwide Children's Hospital. This apartment is perfect for business, families, and anyone looking to enjoy the city of Columbus in absolute style. It has private off street parking options in the back that are first come first serve. The back deck area is really quite nice to have 6 months out of the year. The unit is fully equipped with a washer/dryer, fridge, microwave, oven, and coffee brewer. The bedroom is very large and contains one Queen memory foam bed with a large closet with shelving for all your clothing needs. I live right
host_about: I am from Springfield, OH and went to college at OSU where I traveled abroad in Barcelona. I moved to Chicago for a couple years and got some corporate experience in a fun city. I then moved back to Columbus where I live currently in the Short North with my beautiful fiance. I help run my family's coffee and vending business, called Sheehan Brothers. I love traveling, golfing, eating and most importantly The Buckeyes!!

name: German Village Retreat+Experience True Columbus
host_about:
Hello travelers! STR Capital Fund is a Columbus, Ohio Airbnb Management Company.   We have units throughout Columbus that fit any travelers needs. We base our company on a core set of values 
1. We treat each guests how we would want to be treated. 
2. Traveling can be stressful, we want you to be right at home when you arrive. 
3.  Cleanliness is key, we use a professional cleaning company between each stay. 
4. Customer service, we will go above and beyond for each guest so they have a memorable stay. 
5. We want you to have a great time, we have a full time hospitality specialist who's only focus is guest experience. From dinner reservations to flowers in the unit, we will do our best for each guest!

Thank you for reading a little bit about about our company. If you have any other questions or just want to talk feel free to send an inquiry!

description: Beautiful three bedroom home located in Clintonville, a beautiful, residential neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio. Just North of Ohio State Stadium. Near all main highways and very easy access downtown via the highway or the boulevard. Walking distance to many shops, bars and restaurants.  Perfect for families, large groups, or business groups. Fully furnished with everything you may need. Free Wifi. Linens and towels are provided. Sofa couch pulls out into full size bed! Convenient street parking! We are a message away if you need any help during your stay! n leafy, residential Clintonville, laid-back cafes, gastropubs, and indie shops selling records and locally made crafts are clustered on N. High Street and Indianola Avenue. A paved bike trail, winding along the Olentangy River through several parks, connects to Downtown Columbus and northern suburbs. The Park of Roses features thousands of rose bushes, plus herb and perennial flower gardens.
host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners, Nick and Billy (pictured with Brian Chesky, founder or Airbnb).
We are originally from Canton, Ohio and now reside in the Cleveland area. We both graduated from The Ohio State University and started hosting on Airbnb in 2013. We started Cleveland House Hotels, which is a short term vacation property company in 2015.  We have a full time cleaning staff and maintenance person on hand to take care of any issues.  We also have our reservations specialist, Georgia who will be the one responding to your requests.

Niko (Nick) has been in the hospitality business for many years, having worked in hotels and restaurants.  He owns a small diner in Old Brooklyn called Gus's Family Restaurant.  He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.  

Billy is a co-founder and CEO of Cleveland House Hotels.  Billy is a successful real estate investor and has been in the sales business for over 15 years.  He loves traveling and spending time with his son, William.  

Georgia is our reservations and marketing specialist.  Georgia graduated from Cleveland State University in Marketing.  She enjoys creating her own art and loves spending time with her dog Mario.

description: Beautiful studio apartment in the heart of the Short North with a great layout and tons of natural light. Well stocked kitchen with all supplies to prepare meals. Walk to everything in this neighborhood that is so close to tons of restaurants and points of attraction. Enjoy this studio apartment all to yourself. This large sun filled studio is the perfect choice for a couples intimate stay-cation or a budget conscious group of three looking to explore the city on a cost effective mindset. designed to give you all the features of any larger apartment but creatively laid out to still provide tons of space. The king bed is offset in the room to be seen as the centerpiece but not to be the only thing to do when staying in for the evening. We have added an area for lounging, dining, cooking, etc. This is a street-facing studio in the heart of the action, so noise can be heard sometimes, particularly on weekends. Guests have a full run of the apartment, it is a private space. We are as avail
host_about: Providing guests with the best experience Columbus, Ohio has to offer! Being an Ohio State Buckeye has showed me how amazing this city is and how it is growing in the right direction. From football to restaurants to conventions, Columbus is a great city to visit any time of the year!
